text: The arrogance and brutality of the ruling class – is nothing less than breathtaking . April 9 2020 , Business Insider : “ JJ Americans will not have jobs to return to after the NN NN ends , according to JJ US presidential candidate Andrew Yang ” : “ JJ Americans will not have jobs to return to after the NN NN ends … ” “ We ’re VBG to VB something IN 10 NNS of NN in 10 weeks … ” “ The fact is RB now this NN is the perfect environment for NNS to VB rid of NNS , bring in robots and machines , and figure out how they can operate more efficiently . ” “ Universal basic income is VBG to become the topic , not just here in the NNP NNPS , but Spain ’s adopting a version of a minimum income . Legislatures IN Europe are all very , very much focused on this . ” “ We ’re VBG to VB the progressive Amazonification of our NN as Amazon ’s CD of the only businesses out there that ’s hiring more and more . You ’re seeing more robots are in grocery NN aisles cleaning after we all supposedly VBP home … ” “ CD thing I ’ve been saying is that we ’re VBG to VB something IN 10 NNS of NN in 10 weeks , because businesses are being put in a position where it makes sense to speed up a lot of the automation that they were considering investing in . ” “ The fact is RB now this NN is the perfect environment for NNS to VB rid of NNS , bring in robots and machines , and figure out how they can operate more efficiently . ” “ My kids are at home just IN everyone else ’s kids and they ’re getting taught RB … they ’re VBG to be JJ , JJ families that actually VBP a different determination where they actually VBP , “ Hey , this JJ thing is working well . ” “ If you can find a NN to , frankly , VB yourself useful from afar , that ’s VBG to be something that unfortunately we all have to VB about more and more . ” “ I VBP at this point it ’s actually VBG to need to be a bit higher than that , because the $ 1,000 a month is enough for baseline needs for at least most of us , but the NN is VBG to become RB more inhuman and punishing , both during this NN and afterwards . ” “… I ’d be looking at something higher than $ 1,000 a month that MD be more robust & helping NNS not just be able to meet their needs , but RB have a real path forward . ” “ we ’re VBG to be dealing with the consequences of this NN for NNS to come , and we need a Marshal Plan style initiative to rebuild the NN … helping create that vision for what NNP in 2022 , 2023 , is VBG to look IN after we have a NN in place . ” March 31 2020 , Business Insider : “ NN APOCALYPSE : More than 110,000 restaurants expect to close up forever in the coming weeks , with millions out of work and the industry ’s future uncertain . ” And while the Amazonification of our NN ploughs full steam ahead , independent shops and services are pounded into dust , while JJ services are shut down , opening the door for further privatization . While prepping the citizenry for coming and required “ certifications ” , the deliberate and violent contraction of the NN continues . The decimation of small enterprise with monetary wealth directed , again , upward . McDonald ’s , Starbucks and Walmart ( “ essential services ” ) remain open while small business is forced to remain closed . On April 13 2020 , Amazon announced they MD hire Amazon will hire an additional 75,000 workers to keep up with its soaring volume of JJ NNS . A brilliant idea : We all live on $ 1,000 a month – when Klaus Schwab , Andrew Yang , Bill NNP , Mark Zuckerberg , Elon Musk , Bezos , FW al. – live on $ 1,000 a month . The rich are dangerous , calculating , insane hypocrites . April 12 2020 , Business Insider : “ Pope Francis VBZ it might be ‘ NN to consider a universal basic wage ’ in Easter letter ” : The Pope ’s collaboration with corporate NN Microsoft and the Vatican Bank is deep into JJ impact investing . Citizens are on UBI [ Universal Basic Income ] will still require privatized JJ services – a massive impact NN . [ Source ] Impact investing is predicated on turning NNS into investments as JJ capital . [ Further reading ] Oct 18 2019 , Slate MoneyBox , Andrew Yang Keeps Talking About the Fourth Industrial Revolution . What the Heck Is That ?: Jan 31 2019 , Wrench in the Gears , “ Good Guy in Davos ? Not So Fast ” : March 26 2020 , The London Freepress : “ Keep it quiet , but universal basic income is coming ” : July 31 , CD , NNP NNP Forum , “ We should let the robots take our jobs – and then pay us all a basic income ” : “ As developments in artificial intelligence and robotics advance , there is VBG to be a severe and swift disruption of JJ working classes . ” “ UBI , an JJ proposition in which a sum of NN is regularly paid to a population , MD be a vital bulwark against the unintended consequences of automation in the workforce . ” “ NNS will profit significantly from workforce automation , so the private sector will be able to afford shouldering this burden , while at the same NN still making greater profits . ” “ After all , a full - NN NN has needs : 30 minutes for lunch each day , vacation and sick NN , toilet breaks , and NN benefits , to name a few . Meanwhile , an automated worker MD only require an initial installation and the occasional repair or upgrade . ” “ The BCG report stated that a JJ welder today is paid RB $ 25 an hour ( including benefits ) versus the equivalent operating cost of RB $ 8 for a robot . ” “ In 15 NNS , that gap will widen RB more dramatically , ” the report VBZ . “ The operating cost IN hour for a robot doing similar welding tasks MD plunge to as little as $ 2 when performance improvements are factored in . ” “ This trend will only continue to accelerate . McDonald ’s , an early pioneer of automation , is already replacing JJ workers with automated kiosks . They expect a 5 % to 9 % return on investment in just the JJ NN ; in 2019 they expect this return to balloon to double digits . ” “ And this is only CD sector : PricewaterhouseCoopers estimates that 38 % of US jobs will be in danger of being replaced by automation by 2030 . ” “ NNS that automate their workforces should be taxed on these JJ massive profits , and some of the resulting capital given back to workers by the NN in the form of UBI . ” “ While the idea of a UBI is popular — Mark Zuckerberg , Elon Musk , and Bill NNP have all championed it — how exactly MD a universal basic income be engineered ? “ JJ swaths of laborers are VBG to lose their jobs , leading to unprecedented levels of unemployment . ” March 18 2020 : Over 500 academics and JJ figures called on governments to implement universal basic income via an open letter : “ It is NN for governments to enact emergency universal basic income , ensuring that everyone in their jurisdiction has enough NN to buy the food and other essentials they need to survive . ” McKinsey places the number of jobs to be replaced by automation at close to 50 % by 2030 . The NNP - CD NN provides an opportune moment to push the envelope of automation forward . April 9 2020 : “ JJ statistics reported by UNESCO reveal that since the last week of March roughly 1.7 CD students from pre-primary to tertiary education levels are out of school , affecting 91.3 percent of all enrolled learners and including every student in 188 NNS that have mandated nationwide closures . With most schools set to remain closed through the rest of the current academic NN , the scale of these closures is unprecedented in the history of NN capitalism . ” We must recognize we live in a capitalist JJ NN that serves capital RB & foremost . Further , it is imperative to recognize that the UN & UN agencies , inclusive of the WHO ( WEF / NNPS ) , exist in name only . The WEF is at the helm of a consolidation of JJ NN . January 2020 , NNP NNP Forum : “ The notion of an educator as the knowledge - holder who imparts wisdom to their pupils is no longer fit for the purpose of a 21st - NN education . ” March 2020 , McKinsey & Co : “ Beyond NN : The path to the next normal ” : Robots Will Cut 25 % of US Jobs in 4 NNS , Transform Workforce April 4 , 2020 : “ This NN has optimized the “ testing ” of robots and drones in broad daylight … Zoom ’s NN conferencing platform has detonated in popularity as stay - at - home commands have cleared the globe and some of the credit for having the option to keep up with demand goes to automation … ’ We have automation set up so we can rapidly scale our foundation , the network as well as the compute infrastructure with next to no JJ intercession ’… the organization is getting enthusiasm for purchasing robots to clean office spaces , production floors , retail locations , grocery NNS , airports , lodgings and cafés . ” [ Source ] March 23 2020 , CNBC , “ Inside the hospital in China where NN patients were treated by robots ” April 7 , 2020 : Morningstar : “ Spain to become JJ JJ NN to introduce Universal Basic Income ” . Here it is important to note that RB on March 11 , 2020 , the NNP NNP Forum announced a partnership with the WHO ( a UN agency ) to form the NNP - CD Action Platform – a task - force comprised of over 200 corporations at launch , which as has “ soared to 726 “ , as of March 28 , 2020 . This is in addition to the NNP NNP Forum partnership with the NNP Nations on June 13 , 2019 . This is the consolidation of JJ NN , happening in real NN . April 7 2020 , CNN : “ Grocery NNS turn to robots during the NN ” : March 25 2020 , CNN : “ Robots MD VB us combat future pandemics . Here ’s how experts wish they MD VB us now ” : In addition to the Fourth Industrial Revolution 2020 reset , we have the coming “ JJ Deal For Nature ” to be implemented at NNS end , or perhaps sooner under the pretext of emergency measures . The feigned concern for NN and biodiversity by those that serve them , is , to be blunt , complete bullshit . There is nothing to be VBN within the Fourth Industrial Revolution dystopia in regard to nature – other than her financialization and objectification . She too will be placed on the blockchain . Here , NN ’s arrogance is on full display – with plans to cover the NNP ’s NN with artificial forests and drone bees , while cordoning off what they have not yet plundered – for their own personal leisure . Source : UNLOCKING THE INCLUSIVE GROWTH STORY OF THE 21ST NN : ACCELERATING NN ACTION IN URGENT TIMES , August , 2018 , NNP NNP NNP ( NNP Resources Institute ) The Fourth Industrial Revolution , the monetization of nature , is being rolled out in lockstep with the deployment of central bank digital currency ( CBDC ) . This is a JJ transformation of the JJ NN . Consider nature “ valued ” at 125 trillion vs. GDP at 85.9 trillion ( 2018 ) . “ Natural Capital ” accounting will replace GDP . “ NNP hysteria provides cover for introducing UBI , a grand theft from the working class … . Notorious fraudster Johann Hari is now touting the UBI scam as an “ anti- depressant . ” [ @cordeliers on NNP ] “ Subsidizing low - wage work depresses wages by essentially allowing employers to pay less than a livable wage , so EITC - type benefits are at least in part a transfer to employers , rather than workers . ” April 3 , 2020 , The Wall Street Journal : “ Henry Kissinger – The NNP NNP Will Forever Alter the NN Order ” : “ Basic Income , when all is VBN and done , is a vision for nothing more than the means to be a customer in an unjust society that decides what is for sale . ” “ It ’s RB about the commodification of JJ provision . Your payment MD actually be less conditional and somewhat larger but , as you shop through the privatized remains of the JJ infrastructure , with inadequate means and very few rights , you are dramatically worse off … … it is sometimes asserted that an adequate NN of provision must be put in place simply because we are moving toward a “ workless future . ” In such a society , it is suggested , masses of NNS who have been displaced will have to be provided for and the capitalists will have to VB IN Elon Musk , of Tesla Motors and support BI because it is the only sensible and rational solution . To imagine such responsible provision for the future is to place undue faith in a NN VBN on the making of profit . If they wo n’t stop building pipelines in the face of JJ catastrophe , there ’s little reason to expect them to worry too much about sensible solutions to technological displacement . There simply is no post - capitalist capitalism and no JJ policy innovation that is VBG to bring it about … I am suggesting that our movements need to challenge , rather than come to terms with , the neoliberal order and the capitalist NN that has produced it . For all its claims to be a sweeping measure , the notion of progressive BI is a futile attempt to VB peace with that NN . In reality , RB that compromise is not available . The NN of BI that governments are working on in their JJ policy laboratories will not ‘ end the tyranny of the labour NN ’ but render it more dreadful . The agenda of austerity and privatization requires a NN of income support that renders NNS as powerless and desperate as possible in the face of exploitation and that wo n’t VB if it is relabelled as “ Basic Income ” . ” When we all start to literally starve ( some already have , and JJ more have been for decades ) , perhaps then – we will eat the rich . The question is this ? Do you still VB that these NNS actually give a flying fuck about your NN ? The Fourth Industrial Revolution cannot come into fruition without the 5G infrastructure that will run the Internet of Things . “ Smart ” cities must be understood within the context of JJ policing and the JJ industrial complex . Cybersecurity will be the battle NN of the twenty - JJ NN . The future , is now on our doorstep : All “ JJ capital ” is to be controlled Cory Morningstar is an independent investigative journalist , writer and JJ activist , focusing on JJ ecological collapse and political analysis of the non-profit industrial complex . text: NN - VBN facts from a trusted source can do a lot to VB quiet the fears of NN - hesitant NNS and VB them VB healthier choices . Misinformation and fear are some of the biggest reasons NNS are refusing to VB their kids vaccinated . Getty Images Rebekah Ficco was terrified of NNS . She experienced a miscarriage with her JJ pregnancy , and when she was able to VB pregnant again , she was determined to protect her baby . “ I did n’t VB to do anything to jeopardize this , so I poured into reading , ” Ficco told Healthline . “ And when you ’re a JJ parent , you come across all this information . And I just started seeing more and more about NNS . ” For Ficco , there was nothing scarier than the thought of losing her child . And when she read about accounts on the NNP Adverse Event Reporting NNP ( VAERS ) of NNS dying of SIDS shortly after their vaccinations , she panicked . “ I had experienced just a very minor piece of what it ’s IN to lose a child … but I knew I never wanted to be in their NNS , ” Ficco VBD . Still , she was n’t completely against NNS until after her daughter was born and they went to the JJ pediatrician appointment . “ I had n’t completely decided CD NN or the other , ” she explained , stating that her daughter had n’t received the hepatitis B NN at birth , but did VB the vitamin K shot . When she brought her questions and concerns to her daughter ’s pediatrician , though , the response she received pushed her straight into the anti-vaccination camp . “ The nurse and the NN were both very pushy and judgmental , and it just made me feel IN everything I ’d read must be true . They must be getting paid by JJ pharma . I walked out saying I MD never vaccinate my kids , ” she VBD . Ficco ’s initial hesitation to vaccinate her child is n’t uncommon . In fact , experts VBP more than 60 percent of JJ NNS feel this NN . L.J. Tan , chief strategy officer of the Immunization Action Coalition ( IAC ) , told Healthline , “ When we talk to NNS about NNS , they RB fall into three categories . RB you have the folks IN myself — 20 to 30 percent of NNS who are vaccinating because they VBP in the NN . ” Conversely , he explained there are then 5 to 10 percent of NNS who are so resistant to NNS , nothing anyone VBZ will ever VB their minds . “ But then there ’s the JJ group in the middle , the 60 percent who are hesitant but who we VBP to try to educate , ” he VBD . Ficco was initially CD of those . And had it not been for how that JJ NN ’s appointment went , it ’s possible she MD have been convinced to vaccinate her NNS entirely on schedule . How doctors talk to NNS about NNS Healthline spoke to 20 NNS who fall into that NN - hesitant 60 percent . We asked them to explain their concerns and to bring us their questions . The surprising result was that no CD NNS had the exact same concerns . JJ were worried about unique family histories , or random connections they ’d read about RB . According to Tan , this is true of NN - hesitant NNS in general . While JJ might VB this group has fallen victim to the debunked research of — avoiding NNS simply out of fear of a now - disproven link to NN — most of the NNS we spoke with never mentioned that as an actual concern . Instead , they all had their own worries when it came to the NNS meant to protect their NNS . “ It often becomes a NN by NN and parent by parent conversation , ” Tan explained . “ That ’s why it ’s a hard conversation for doctors . ” But with pediatricians often serving as the front line in addressing these concerns , finding a NN to do so without pushing scared NNS away is crucial to ensuring the factual information gets out there . That ’s part of what Tan advocates for through the IAC . “ What we ’re trying to do is give physicians room to answer those questions confidently , and to ease those concerns , giving them the tools to address specific questions , ” he VBD . Of the NNS that spoke with Healthline , JJ VBD they became concerned about vaccinations after reading reports on VAERS . NNS read about NNS of adverse reactions and VBD they determined for themselves that that was proof NNS posed a NN NN . The problem with this conclusion is that VAERS is a passive reporting NN , according to Tan . “ We encourage everyone who thinks they MD have had any reaction to a NN at all , whether it ’s causal or not , to report it to VAERS so that we can then VB any possible links , ” he VBD . But that means that JJ of the reports MD not actually be linked to the NN . In fact , Tan told CD story of a VAERS report where a JJ woman had died after receiving the JJ papillomavirus ( HPV ) NN . The problem ? She died in a car accident — information that was only VBN after further investigating the report . Several NNS that spoke with Healthline RB brought up concerns about the Gardasil NN , which has been VBN to prevent cervical cancer , saying it had n’t been RB RB enough or tested thoroughly enough for them to feel it ’s safe . But Dr. Sean O’Leary , spokesperson and chair of the NNP Academy of Pediatrics committee on infectious NNS , explained that simply is n’t the NN . “ More than 100 CD doses have been given in the last 15 NNS . It ’s CD of the best studied NNS we have in terms of safety because it has been studied in response to some of the unfounded concerns , and we VBP that it ’s very safe and very effective , ” he VBD . Another concern NNS voiced was the idea of overloading NNS ’s immune systems with too JJ NNS at once . Several had opted for alternative NN schedules in order to avoid this . But as Dr. O’Leary explained , “ The immune NN responds to thousands of things every day , so the amount of proteins that it responds to in a NN is a drop in the bucket . ” Tan agreed , pointing out that NNS have a bigger immune response to things IN scraping their knee , playing in the mud , or RB eating the food their NNS prepare for them than they do to NNS . “ You are being exposed to far more antigens in your daily NN than you are from NNS , ” he explained . “ In the past , NNS MD have had a lot of antigens — the smallpox NN is a good example . But our current NNS are very finite and controlled , and as our technology has improved , the amount of antigens you VBP from a NN now is very small . ” This is part of the reason both experts strongly advocate for vaccinating on schedule . O’Leary explained that it ’s important to VB JJ NNS their NNS as early as possible , because JJ of these NNS are more severe for younger NNS . “ RB , it ’s kind of torture , ” he VBD in reference to extended NN schedules . “ Infants feel NN with three shots or CD in a similar fashion , that ’s been studied using biomarkers . When you spread them out , you ’re subjecting them to multiple different painful episodes instead of just CD . ” That was the realization Ficco eventually came to . “ The NN is that I was terrified , ” she VBD . “ The misinformation out there struck me RB in my terrified JJ - mama heart . ” It was n’t until her sister - in - law started an anti-vaccine blog that Ficco began to reconsider her own position on NNS . “ NNS were taking her advice and opinion as fact and that RB slapped me in the face . I realized I had been reading and making choices for my kids VBN basically on her blog , just from different NNS with different platforms , ” Ficco VBD . Once that realization hit , IN the NN her oldest daughter was nearly 3 and her youngest was 6 months , she took them to the pediatrician to begin getting their vaccinations . “ My girls have recently been completely caught up , ” she VBD proudly . Today , Ficco VBD her biggest regret is that she allowed her earlier choices about vaccinations to be guided by fear instead of NN . “ The biggest thing I ’ve learned in this journey is that correlation does not equal causation , and to RB consider the source of what you ’re reading before you take anything as fact , ” she VBD .

text: NNS worldwide are racing to develop potential NNS and drugs to fight the JJ NN , called NNP - NNP - 2 . Now , a group of NNS has figured out the molecular structure of a key NN that the uses to invade JJ NNS , potentially opening the door to the NN of a NN , according to JJ findings . Previous research revealed that coronaviruses invade NNS through so - called " spike " proteins , but those proteins take on different shapes in different coronaviruses . Figuring out the NN of the spike NN in NNP - NNP - 2 is the key to figuring out how to target the NN , VBD Jason McLellan , senior author of the NN and an associate professor of molecular biosciences at the NNP of Texas at Austin . Though the NN uses JJ different proteins to replicate and invade NNS , the spike NN is the major NN NN that it uses to bind to a receptor — another NN that acts IN a doorway into a JJ NN . After the spike NN binds to the JJ NN receptor , the viral membrane fuses with the JJ NN membrane , allowing the genome of the NN to enter JJ NNS and begin infection . So " if you can prevent attachment and fusion , you will prevent entry , " McLellan told Live NNP . But to target this NN , you need to VB what it looks IN . Related : VBG viral : 6 JJ findings about viruses Earlier this month , NNS of NNP - NNP - 2 . Using that genome , McLellan and his NN , in collaboration with the National Institutes of NNP ( NIH ) , identified the specific genes that code for the spike NN . They then sent that gene information to a NN that created the genes and sent them back . The group then injected those genes into mammalian NNS in a lab dish and those NNS produced the spike proteins . Next , using a very detailed microscopy technique called cryogenic electron microscopy , the group created a 3D " map , " or " blueprint , " of the spike proteins . The blueprint revealed the structure of the molecule , mapping the location of each of its atoms in NN . " It 's impressive that these NNS were able to VB the structure so quickly , " VBD Aubree Gordon , an associate professor of epidemiology at the NNP of Michigan who was not a part of the NN . " It 's a very important step forward and MD VB in the NN of a NN against NN - NN - 2 . " Stephen Morse , a professor at Columbia NNP 's Mailman School of NNP NNP who was RB not a part of the NN agrees . The spike NN " MD be the likely choice for rapid NN of NN antigens " and treatments , he told Live NNP in an email . Knowing the structure MD be " very helpful in developing NNS and antibodies with good activity , " as MD producing higher quantities of these proteins , he added . The NN is sending these atomic " coordinates " to dozens of research groups IN the NN who are working to develop NNS and drugs to target NNP - NNP - 2 . Meanwhile , McLellan and his NN hope to VB the map of the spike NN as the basis for a . When foreign invaders , such as or , invade the NN , immune NNS fight back by producing proteins called antibodies . These antibodies bind to specific structures on the foreign invader , called the antigen . But producing antibodies can take NN . NNS are dead or weakened antigens that train the immune NN to create these antibodies before the NN is exposed to the NN . In NN , the spike NN itself " MD be either the NN or variants of a NN , " McLellan VBD . When you inject this spike - NN - VBN NN , " NNS MD VB antibodies against the spike , and then if they were ever exposed to the live NN , " the NN MD be prepared , he added . VBN on previous research they did on other coronaviruses , the NNS introduced mutations , or changes to create a more stable molecule . Indeed , " the molecule looks RB good ; it 's RB well behaved ; the structure kind of demonstrates that the molecule is stable in the correct confirmation that we were hoping for , " McLellan VBD . " So now we and others will VB the molecule that we created as a basis for NN antigen . " Their colleagues at the NIH will now inject these spike proteins into NNS to VB how well the proteins trigger antibody production . Still , McLellan thinks a NN is likely about 18 to 24 months away . That 's " still quite fast compared to normal NN NN , which might take UH 10 NNS , " he VBD . The findings were published today ( Feb. CD ) in the journal .

text: In the early days of CD , proponents of NN were deeply concerned . Donald NNP , who has RB espoused a debunked link between NNS and NN , was set to enter the White NNP . He met with JJ activist Robert Kennedy Jr. , who has for NNS argued that NNS can VB a range of developmental and other NN conditions . Kennedy emerged to report he ’d been asked to chair a commission into NN safety . But seven months later , no such commission has been appointed and the NN - mired White NNP has declined to VB whether the plan has been shelved . STAT contacted Kennedy to VB where plans stood . He MD only speak on condition that STAT publish the interview in a Q&A format . He argued that his assertions — which are disputed as a misreading of the scientific literature by JJ mainstream NNS — have been misquoted and misrepresented in the NN . Here is STAT ’s conversation with Kennedy . It has been lightly edited , for length and readability . The question I VBP to ask you relates to the NN safety commission that you had announced in January that you were VBG to head , after you met with then NNP - elect NNP . It ’s been a number of months now , and there has n’t been any further JJ announcement . And so we ’ve been wondering : Where does this stand ? I ’ve had no discussions specifically about the NN safety commission , probably since February . I ’ve spoken to the White NNP about other issues of NN safety and had a number of follow - up meetings . Can I ask you who you met with ? Well , I ’ve met with high - level officials in the White NNP . They ’ve arranged meetings for me with HHS and White NNP officials and agency officials . Various agency officials , including [ NIH Director ] Francis Collins and his deputy , Lawrence Tabak , I VBP . And I met with Tony Fauci , who ’s at the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious NNPS . Linda Birnbaum , who ’s at the National Institute of NNP NNP Sciences . Diana Bianchi , at the Eunice Kennedy Shriver National Institute of Child NNP and NNP NNP at NIH . And over at FDA I ’ve met with Peter Marks , the director of [ the Center for Biologics Evaluation and Research ] and some other officials there . I ca n’t remember everybody at this point , all of the NNS that we ’ve met with . And this is since the NN of the administration ? Yeah . The White NNP officials and the HHS officials accompanied me . I did it at their request . At “ their ” request ? Who is they ? So you VBD you ’ve had no discussions since February about the NN safety commission ? Not specifically about the commission . OK . Do you VB that idea is dead ? Or do you VB it ’s in abeyance ? You ’d have to ask the White NNP . It MD be that it ’s evolved . I ’ve been told that the NN is still interested in this issue and that he wants me to have further meetings with the regulatory agencies and with the White NNP . IN I VBD , I have not talked to anybody in the White NNP about the commission . Do you VB there ’s a possibility the commission is VBG ahead but not with you on it ? Again , you ’d have to ask the White NNP . Do you VB to talk about NN safety NN at all ? I have n’t finished asking questions about this . Are you disappointed that so far there has n’t been a commission set up to do what you VBD you were VBG to be doing in January ? The commission was not my idea . I was asked to chair a commission and I agreed that if the commission were created that I MD do that , I MD sit on it . [ But ] that ’s up to the White NNP how they VBP to handle this issue . It was n’t my idea . I am happy with any steps that are taken to VB NNS safer and to improve the scientific integrity IN the process . To reform the process so that NNS are subject to the same kind of safety scrutiny and safety testing that other drugs are subject to . We need to , prior to licensing NNS , we need to do gold standard safety testing , IN every other NN approval requires . We need to do double - blind placebo testing . Because particularly when it comes to injecting aluminum or mercury into babies , the consequences MD be latent . In other words , they MD not manifest or diagnosed to age 3 or 4 . So the current protocols , which require testing for NNS of sometimes as little as 48 hours , are not VBG to disclose the kind of dangers that the NN and the regulators ought to VB about . The hepatitis B NNS that are currently approved had fewer than five days of safety testing . That means that if the child has a seizure on the sixth day , it ’s never seen . If the child dies , it ’s never seen . If the child gets food allergies or ADD or ADHD , which do n’t manifest for four or five NNS or are n’t diagnosed or NN , which RB is n’t diagnosed until age 4 , the regulators will never VB that prior to licensing the NN . If something happened four or five NNS out from an event , how do you VB which event to attribute it to ? Well , the answer to that question , of course , is double - blind placebo testing . You have a NN group and you have a NN group . Sir , that ’s done all the NN . That is done all the NN . NNS are tested that NN all the NN . You ’re wrong about that . It is not required for NNS . So most of the NNS — and I VBP this is surprising to you , and it ’s shocking to most NNS , because journalists VBP yourself assume that NNS are encountering the same kind of rigorous safety testing as other drugs , including multiyear double - blind placebo testing . But the fact is that NNS do n’t . And the reason for that is they ’re classified as biologics . I ’ve read a lot of NN studies . And they are double - blind placebo tested . No , you ’re wrong about that . … But in any NN , none of them have more than a few months of double - blind placebo testing , which will not allow you to spot illnesses IN NN that are n’t diagnosed before five NNS . Second of all , in most NNS , for example the Gardasil NN , they do n’t VB true placebos . MD we move actually back to the questions that I wanted to ask ? [ Inaudible ] aluminum adjuvant that ’s highly neurotoxic . So how can you VB whether , if you do n’t VB a true placebo , how can you determine whether the NN is safe . So I had some questions I wanted to ask you , and in a Q& A that ’s the NN it works . I ask some questions , you answer the questions or do n’t answer if you VBP . I was wondering , in the NN since you spoke to the NN in January and he asked you to chair the NN safety commission , the senior HHS positions have been filled . All of them are on the record as supporting NNS . I was wondering if that ’s disappointing to you . Well , I VBP regulators that are willing to look at the NN . And who are conversant with the safety NN , who are conversant with the vast scientific literature that is now published , available on PubMed , which indicates that JJ — particularly mercury and aluminum in NNS — need to be reassessed . And as I VBD , I ’ve been having meetings with the regulators to urge them to do that kind of testing . I did VB to ask you as well if you had any qualms doing this work for NNP NNP . His administration is taking some steps at the EPA that NNS who are concerned about the environment find very unsettling . Given that , I was wondering if you had any qualms about working with him , because you ’re so renowned as an environmentalist . I do n’t VB NNP NNP ’s JJ policies , and I MD not endorse them . I MD VB that NNP NNP ’s administration is essentially destroying 30 NNS of my work on JJ issues , and the work of JJ other NNS . And I ’ve written extensively about that . And I VBP NNS understand that my position is clear and that my work on NN safety and JJ NN and child safety is not an endorsement of NNP NNP ’s JJ policies . Have you made your position VBN to him ? Have you had the chance to express those views to him ? Well , in my initial meeting with him , we had that discussion . And he knows my position . And he ’s VBN my position for JJ NNS . … I do n’t VB there ’s any question with him or with any member of the administration that I ’m opposed to [ EPA Administrator ] Scott Pruitt and I ’m opposed to walking away from [ the ] Paris [ Agreement ] . … If NNP NNP asked me to serve on a commission on fracking or on pipelines or on JJ NN , I MD do it . Can I just ask — and I VBP this will be my last question — you ’ve mentioned mercury a lot of times . Thimerosal [ a mercury - VBN preservative ] is not in most NNS given to NNS at this point . And in fact has not been in childhood NNS in the NNP NNPS since 2001 , I VBP . You VBP , studies have RB shown that since it ’s been taken out , NN rates have increased , which MD suggest that there is n’t a correlation , and that ’s what most NNS VBP . But why do you keep talking about mercury when NNS are n’t getting exposed to it in childhood NNS ? That is an industry talking point . That just simply is n’t true . Mercury was taken out of three pediatric NNS , DTaP , Hib , and hepatitis B in 2003 . But the same NN it was , CDC recommended NN shots for pregnant NNS and for NNS 6 months of age and during every NN of NN . And for most of the past 15 NNS , virtually all of those NN shots [ inaudible ] . … Since 2004 , so that MD be , I guess , 13 NNS , most NN shots were loaded with mega doses of mercury . Thimerosal is only in [ NN NN packaged in ] multidose vials . It ’s not in NN that ’s packaged in a syringe already and it was never in FluMist , the live attenuated NN . Well , here are the numbers . And the numbers VBP every NN . I VBP in 2012 , there were 185 CD doses of NN doses manufactured in this NN . And I VBP fewer than 10 CD were thimerosal - free . Over 90 percent had huge , huge doses of mercury . Not trace amounts as the industry likes to claim . Trace amounts means less than 1 microgram . They contain 25 micrograms , which is 25 times trace amount and over 100 times what EPA ’s safe exposure levels are . … So today , in the last three or four NNS , that number has been reduced to 48 CD . Which number has been reduced to 48 CD ? I VBP this NN there were 150 , RB 150 CD NN doses manufactured and 48 CD of those , or a third , were loaded with mercury . And when you VBP this NN are you talking about CD - 17 ? Or are you talking about the coming … CD . That ’s a national NN NN RB there . Mercury is 100 times more toxic , neurotoxic , than lead . Why MD you inject that into a little baby or pregnant NNS ? It ’s insane . There ’s been an Institute of Medicine report … No , no . No , IOM ’s 2004 report did not exonerate mercury . The only thing that IOM did is it looked at a series of epidemiological studies that had been recently created by CDC and VBN upon , and they only dealt with CD issue , which was NN . So all of the other injuries that are VBN to be caused by thimerosal , including ADD , ADHD , SIDS , speech delays , language delay … none of these have ever been studied .

text: NN encompasses a broad range of conditions characterized by challenges with JJ skills , communication and repetitive behaviors . NN is a spectrum disorder , meaning the NNS can be classified in terms of their position on a scale . NNP Speaks points out there is not just CD type of NN but JJ subtypes influenced by a combination of genetic and JJ factors . Each individual has a distinct set of strengths and challenges affecting how they learn , VBP and problem - solve . In some NNS , NNS with NN spectrum disorder ( ASD ) require significant support , while others can live independently and hold high - functioning positions . Several factors are thought to influence the NN of the condition . It ’s widely VBN that autistic NNS often suffer from gastrointestinal ( GI ) problems , with those experiencing the worst GI problems often having the most severe NNS of NN . Recent research again highlights the intriguing link between the gut and the brain , and how dysfunction in the gut - brain axis influences ASD traits . In most NNS , NNS of ASD appear by age 2 or 3 , although NNS of associated developmental delays MD appear RB earlier . In the late 1970s , NNS discovered pairs of identical twins often shared ASD , demonstrating the condition has a genetic component . However , genetics are by far not the only , or RB primary , NN factor . Research from Stanford NNP School of Medicine , published in 2011 , which again looked at twins , discovered fraternal ( dizygotic ) twins were more likely to share an NN diagnosis than identical ( monozygotic ) twins . Fraternal twins share only half their DNA , while identical twins share 99.99 % , which means something other than genetics is responsible for the higher rate of double diagnoses among fraternal twins . According to the NNS , JJ factors are the most likely culprit . In conclusion , they stated that “ Susceptibility to ASD has moderate genetic heritability and a substantial shared twin JJ component . ” This is not an entirely surprising finding . There is no such thing as a genetic epidemic ; hence genetics simply cannot be VBN as an explanation for the exponential growth in NN NNS . Indeed , research published in 2008 VBD de novo mutations ( JJ mutations that spontaneously arise ) associated with NN were present in just 1 % of NNS diagnosed with NN . Instead , the majority of NN NNS appear to result from the activation or expression of a number of different genes , and there are several epigenetic and JJ factors that can trigger them . Among them : • Toxic exposures , such as the heavy metals aluminum and mercury from contaminated sea food and NNS , toxic microbes such as viruses and mold , glyphosate and electromagnetic fields from cellphones and Wi-Fi , just to name a few . • Brain inflammation triggered by encephalitis following NN , defective placenta , immature NN - brain barrier , immune response to the mother to infection while pregnant , premature birth and toxins in the environment . • Gut inflammation triggered by an imbalanced microbiome . Contributing factors include C-section , abnormal microbiome in the mother , bottle - feeding with infant formula and a processed food diet . Russian neurologist Dr. Natasha Campbell - McBride believes brain toxicity stemming from gut toxicity , otherwise VBN as Gut and Psychology Syndrome ( GAPS ) , is a key factor that sets the stage for NN , especially when NNS are added into the mix . According to Campbell - McBride , toxicity flowing from the child ’s gut clogs the brain with toxicity , preventing it from performing its normal function and process sensory information . As mentioned , recent research confirms and further strengthens the NN that the gut plays an important role in the NN of ASD . According to this NN , published in the journal NNP Research : In other words , genetic mutations VBN in both the gut and the brain MD be a primary culprit . Mutation in the neuroligin‐3 R451C has previously been shown to alter synaptic function in the hippocampus and cortex , resulting in impaired JJ behavior . Other research has shown neuroligin - 3 mutations can RB trigger “ specialized cognitive abilities ” seen in some autistic NNS . Previous research has RB linked the mutation to gut dysfunction . Lead investigator Elisa Hill - Yardin , associate professor at RMIT NNP in Melbourne , NNP , told Neuroscience NNP : The featured NN builds on earlier research , including unpublished JJ work by Swedish , Danish and French NNS . Neuroscience NNP reports : RB without a genetic component , the gut microbiome appears to play an important role in ASD . In a 2013 PLOS CD NN , NNS analyzed the microbial content of fecal samples from 20 healthy and 20 autistic NNS , finding distinct differences between the CD groups . As reported by NNP NNP Today : The NNS noted the autistic NNS ’s gut microflora had reduced richness and diversity , which are essential factors in creating a bacterial community capable of dealing with JJ assaults . In other words , having an imbalanced gut microbiome MD render these NNS more susceptible to the adverse effects of JJ toxins . CD of the lead authors told NNP NNP , “ We VBP that a diverse gut is a healthy gut , ” and suggested that antibiotics , which MD eliminate beneficial bacteria and have been VBN to be administered more often in the JJ three NNS of NN among autistic NNS compared to nonautistic NNS , MD play a key role . The GAPS protocol MD be the answer for JJ Campbell - McBride ’s research shows there ’s a profound dynamic interaction between your gut , brain and immune NN . She has developed what might be CD of the most profoundly important NN strategies for preventing NN . In her research , Campbell - McBride discovered that nearly all of the mothers of autistic NNS have abnormal gut flora , which is significant because newborns inherit their gut flora from their mothers at the NN of birth . Establishing normal gut flora in the JJ 20 days or so of NN plays a crucial role in the maturation of your baby ’s immune NN . Babies who develop abnormal gut flora are left with compromised immune systems , putting them at higher NN for suffering NN reactions . If your baby has suboptimal gut flora , NNS can become the proverbial “ last straw ” — the trigger that “ primes ” his / her immune NN to develop chronic NN problems . The good NN is you can rather inexpensively identify GAPS within the JJ weeks of your baby ’s NN , which can VB you VB better - informed decisions about vaccinations , and about how to proceed to set your child on the path to NN . The entire process for identifying NNS who MD be at NN for developing NN from a NN is described in her book “ Gut and Psychology Syndrome , ” but to sum it up , in her practice she starts out by collecting a complete NN history of the NNS , and their gut NN is assessed . Then , within the JJ few days of NN , the stool of the child is analyzed to determine the NN of the baby ’s gut flora , followed by a urine test to check for metabolites . Together , this can give you a picture of the NN of your child ’s immune NN . These tests are available in most laboratories IN the NN . If the test results are normal , the NN of NN after NN is significantly reduced . If you find that your baby has abnormal microflora , or begins to develop NNS of NN , the GAPS program should be started immediately , as the younger the child is when you start the NN , the better the results . The child RB should not be given any NNS until their gut microbiome tests normal . Identifying abnormal gut flora early on is crucial to protecting your child ’s NN Campbell - McBride reversed her own son ’s NN using dietary changes and detoxification , and her hypothesis is in my view CD of the most relevant . I VBP her GAPS nutritional protocol is important for most NNS these days , as a majority have poor gut NN due to poor diet and toxic exposures , but it ’s particularly crucial for pregnant NNS and JJ NNS . The best NN to prevent GAPS in the JJ place is for the mother to avoid all processed foods , sugar , antibiotics and birth NN pills before conception as these VBP yeast and fungi to grow and RB VB leaky gut . This can then be followed by breastfeeding and avoiding the NN of antibiotics during ( intrapartum ) and after delivery . Another important factor is vitamin D deficiency — especially in conjunction with damaged gut microbiome . Optimizing your vitamin D levels and your gut flora before and during pregnancy MD be CD of the most important prevention strategies discovered to date . text: At 15 months JJ , Michelle Cedillo was a bright - eyed , cheery toddler who cooed her favorite words IN “ mommy ” and “ kitty . ” That month Michelle had a routine NN against NNS , mumps and rubella . She came down with a fever that lasted four days and , according to her NNS , resulted in a drastic NN . “ She did not respond to her name any longer , ” VBZ her mother , Theresa Cedillo . “ She did n’t look at us . She did n’t talk . ” Michelle was later diagnosed with a severe NN of NN — the neurological disorder that affects CD in 150 JJ NNS — and , 11 NNS later , her NNS are still trying to figure out what went wrong . On June 11 a claim filed by the Cedillo family against the Department of NNP & NNP Services , which maintains a fund to compensate NNS injured by NNS , went to NN in Washington , D.C. The family claims that thimerosal , a mercury - VBN preservative once common in childhood vaccinations ( it was phased out starting in 1999 as a precautionary measure but is still VBN in some NN NNS ) , in addition to their daughter ’s MMR shot , somehow triggered her NN . Their NN before the nation ’s so - called NN NN is the JJ of 4,800 claims linking NN and childhood shots to be heard by the three judges . The results are being closely watched by thousands of families desperate to understand what NNS have so far been unable to explain : What causes their NNS ’s NN ? The debate has already turned bitter , including at the leading advocacy group , NNP Speaks , where cofounders Bob and Suzanne Wright have clashed with their daughter Katie , who insists vaccinations caused her own son ’s NN . “ There ’s a lot of kids in this NN who have literally been poisoned by the recommended NN program in the NNP NNPS , ” VBZ Wendy Fournier of the National NNP Association . The Cedillos ’ attorney Kevin Conway , whose firm is handling about 1,200 NN NNS , VBZ the mercury in thimerosal from numerous shots , for such NNS as hepatitis B and diphtheria , suppressed Michelle ’s immune NN at a vulnerable stage of NN . Then , according to the family ’s claim , Michelle received a NN NN in late 1995 , which because of the child ’s weakened immune NN was able to travel through her bloodstream to the brain , where it caused inflammation and brought on NN . The family RB blames the NNS NN for Michelle ’s severe gastrointestinal problems . Because of the thimerosal , VBZ Conway , “ she was unable to clear the NN NN in that NN [ from her NN ] . ” Attorneys representing the NN are likely to attack the Cedillos ’ NN on several fronts . text: Equine Internists at the Ohio NNP NNP , College of Veterinary Medicine Recommend NNP of Horses for West Nile NNP As most NNS in Ohio are aware , the JJ positive West Nile NNP ( WNV ) bird was detected in July , 2001 . This NN was detected in the tissues of a dead blue jay from Lake County , Ohio . That finding establishes that WNV has arrived in Ohio . Since the NN is present in Ohio , and the most at NN populations are crows , blue jays , horses and NNS , we need to work at preventing this NN from affecting these NNS . According to the Ohio WNV Work Group , most of the efforts at preventing WNV infection are directed towards mosquito NN . This can be accomplished by eliminating standing NN : NN MD collect in JJ tires , tin cans , plastic containers , ceramic pots , or similar containers . Clean roof gutters so they drain properly in the spring and fall , clean and chlorinate swimming pools , outdoor saunas and hot tubs , and if not in NN , keep empty and covered . Drain NN from pool covers . VB the NN in bird baths at least once a week , turn over plastic wading pools , and wheelbarrows , etc. when not in NN . Non-toxic NNS such as mosquito dunks can be VBN to prevent maturation of the mosquito larvae in standing NN that cannot be readily eliminated . The USDA has recently approved a conditional license for a WNV NN for equids , including horses . Dr. Dave Glauer , NNP Veterinarian , has approved the NN of the NN in Ohio . The NN will be available starting in September of 2001 . The NN is made with a killed NN and has limited efficacy NNS , however , a similar NN for Japanese Encephalitis NN , which is closely related to WNV , has been VBN for JJ NNS . The efficacy of the Japanese Encephalitis NN has been reported at ? 80 % . NNS of WNV in horses occurred as late as October in 2000 in the eastern US . Therefore , internists at The Ohio NNP NNP , College of Veterinary Medicine recommend that if the NN is available , horses should be vaccinated twice this fall . The NN requires an initial dose and a second dose 3 to 6 weeks later . Horse owners who are interested in vaccinating their horses for WNV should contact their local veterinarian . Veterinarians are being encouraged to place orders so the NN will have some indication of the demand for the NN . As part of the safety NN of the NN , 649 horses and ponies were vaccinated . Systemic or local reactions occurred in very few of the vaccinated horses : 3 horses had localized NN reactions ( swelling and soreness ) , 2 horses were reported to have a fever following the initial NN only , and 2 horses had other reactions ( mild diarrhea within 8 hours of injection in 1 horse and 1 horse was treated for colic within a few hours of the initial NN ) . According to the report filed by Fort Dodge NNP NNP , the NN did not induce any severe local or systemic adverse reactions in 98.5 % of the vaccinations , therefore , the NN appears to be safe . Horse owners planning to export their NNS should be aware that vaccinated NNS MD not meet the import requirements of receiving NNS due to the presence of anti-WNV antibodies in NN . While these antibodies are present transiently , presence of the antibody when the horse is due to be exported MD result in denial of permission to import . In horses that do become clinically ill , the NN infects the central nervous NN and causes signs of encephalitis . JJ signs of encephalitis in horses include loss of appetite and depression , in addition to any combination of the following : fever , weakness or paralysis of hind limbs , impaired vision , ataxia ( incoordination ) , head pressing , aimless wandering , convulsions , inability to swallow , circling , hyperexcitability , or coma . Differential diagnoses for neurologic NN in the horse include rabies , botulism , equine protozoal myeloencephalitis ( EPM ) , cervical vertebral myelopathy ( CVM ) , equine herpes ( EHV1 ) , equine degenerative myelopathy ( EDM ) and other encephalitides such as western equine encephalitis ( WEE ) , eastern equine encephalitis ( EEE - reportable in Ohio ) and Venezuelan equine encephalitis ( VEE - reportable in Ohio ) , should all be considered . JJ of the reported NNS have similar JJ signs to commonly diagnosed neurologic NNS , particularly EPM . VB Ohio NNP NNP Web NN for aids in differential diagnosis . Horse owners are encouraged not to become complacent once their horses have been vaccinated . Elimination of mosquito breeding sites and personal protection are still important . Another important role the horse owner MD play in our efforts to prevent WNV is to continue to report dead bird sightings to their local NN department . The local NN department will determine if those dead birds should be transported to the Ohio Department of Agriculture for pathologic examination .

text: The most effective NN of preventing the NN is with an influenza NN . Every fall you should be immunized against strains that have developed since the previous outbreak . If you are vaccinated against three or more strains , you MD still come down with NN , but NNS are likely to be milder than they MD have been had you not had an influenza NN . Influenza NN is available through physicians and JJ - NN facilities and JJ NNS provide NN NNS on - NN for their workers . Because influenza is a serious threat , the CDC recommends NN for everyone 6 months of age and older and others at high NN of NN complications : • Those with chronic JJ conditions , such as diabetes and asthma • NNS with a weakened immune NN , IN those with HIV / AIDS The seasonal NN NN is available in three forms . CD is the injectable NN made from an inactivated NN . This form is RB given as a single injection and is approved for NNS 6 months of age or older . Another form is given as a nasal spray called FluMist . This form of the NN is a live and weakened form of the NN and is approved for all healthy NNS 2 - 49 NNS of age who are not pregnant . If you are pregnant you can only receive the injectable form . The CDC RB has recommended the nasal spray NN for healthy NNS 2 NNS and older without preference over the NN shot . Hong Kong 's Hang Seng index jumped 2.06 % , as of their final hour of trade , with shares of HSBC soaring about 3.5 % . text: JJ NN : Nations requiring the most NNS tend to have the worst infant mortality rates A JJ NN , published in NNP and Experimental Toxicology ( http://het.sagepub.com/content/earl…), a peer - reviewed journal indexed by the National Library of Medicine , VBD that nations with higher ( worse ) infant mortality rates tend to give their infants more NN doses . For example , the NNP NNPS requires infants to receive 26 NNS — the most in the NN — yet more than six U.S. infants die IN every 1000 live births . In contrast , Sweden and Japan administer 12 NNS to infants , the least amount , and report less than three deaths IN 1000 live births . The authors of the NN , Neil Z. Miller and Dr. Gary Goldman , conducted a literature review to determine the immunization schedules for the NNP NNPS and all 33 nations with better infant mortality rates than the NNP NNPS . The total number of NN doses specified for infants aged less than CD NN was then determined for each NN . The 34 nations were then organized into NN pairs consisting of total number of NN doses specified for their infants and infant mortality rates . A scatter plot of the NN pairs provided evidence of a positive correlation : infant mortality rates and NN doses tend to increase together . Nations were RB grouped into five different NN dose ranges . The mean infant mortality rates of all nations within each group were then calculated . Analysis showed “ a high statistically significant correlation between increasing number of NN doses and increasing infant mortality rates . ” It is instructive to note that JJ developing nations require their infants to receive multiple NN doses and have national NN coverage rates ( a percentage of the target population that has been vaccinated ) of 90 % or better , yet their infant mortality rates are poor . Infant mortality rates will remain high in nations that cannot provide clean NN , proper nutrition , improved sanitation , and better access to NN care . Nations with higher ( worse ) infant mortality rates give their infants , on average , more NN doses . This positive correlation , derived from the NNS , elicits an important inquiry : Are some infant deaths associated with over - NN ? Is it possible that some nations are requiring too JJ NNS for their infants and the additional NNS are a toxic burden on their NN ? Stock up with Fresh Food that lasts with eFoodsDirect ( AD ) There is some evidence that a subset of infants MD be more susceptible to SIDS shortly after being vaccinated . For example , Torch VBD that unvaccinated babies who died of SIDS did so most often in the fall or winter while vaccinated babies died most often at 2 and 4 months — the same ages when initial doses of DPT were given to infants . He concluded that DPT “ MD be a generally unrecognized major NN of sudden infant and early childhood death , and that the risks of immunization MD outweigh its potential benefits . ” It appears as though some infant deaths attributed to SIDS MD be NN related , perhaps associated with biochemical or synergistic toxicity due to over - NN . All nations have an obligation to determine whether their immunization schedules are achieving their desired goals . He has devoted the last 25 NNS to educating NNS and NN practitioners about NNS , encouraging informed consent and non-mandatory laws . Mr. Miller gives talks on NNS both locally and nationally . Past organizations that he has lectured for include the International Chiropractic Pediatric Association , the International College of Integrative Medicine , NNP NNP / Generation Rescue , the Hahnemann Academy of NNP NNP , and the NNP of Virginia . In June 2011 , Mr. Miller will be giving a NN seminar at Dr. Gabriel Cousens ’ Tree of NNP Rejuvenation Center . Mr. Miller has a degree in psychology and is a member of Mensa . text: Regardless of pressures placed upon NN manufacturers , it is unlikely that influenza NNS will ever VB as they consistently contain toxic ingredients as part of their formulas . It is simply the nature of what a NN NN is and consequently something that should never be administered to any living being . If we examine influenza NNS for the 2011 /2012 NN NN , we find the exact same level of toxicity in these NNS as their predecessors . FOR ALL THE ABOVE NNS : Pediatric NN ( MD lead to toxicity ) Safety and effectiveness in the pediatric population have not been established . Ineffective evaluation protocols in NNS above 6 months of age . VB MD lead to toxicity . Ineffective adverse event evaluation for these NNS in all teens / NNS under 18 NNS of age . VB MD lead to toxicity . Pregnancy Potential harm to fetus not studied or examined . Nursing Mothers Potential excretion of toxic ingredients in mother ’s milk not studied or examined . Carcinogenesis , Mutagenesis , Impairment of Fertility No studies on carcinogenic or mutagenic potential or for impairment of fertility . Pharmacokinetics Bodily absorption , distribution , metabolism and excretion of any of these NN ingredients have not been studied . Note that at least 3 of the NN NNS above contain the toxic mercury derivative Thimerosal . Regardless of your position on NNS , can we honestly justify injecting these toxins into any JJ being ? Earlier this NN NNS bass player Arni Arnason VBD that the band were heading to a “ a farm or a barn … somewhere in England ” to work on their third album . At the end of 2013 , frontman Justin NNP claimed the band MD n’t be releasing their third album any NN soon , explaining that they had already started writing the follow - up to 2012 ’s ‘ Come Of Age ’ , but in a “ solitary manner ” . He commented : “ We ’ve always written in quite a solitary manner so we ’ve actually already started writing the next record . I kind of feel by admitting that NNS are VBG to expect it sooner than perhaps we ’re ready to put it out . ” He added : “ We ’re not set on releasing it any NN soon . text: The 2010s are over , and the double - 20s are about to begin . CD phrase that I 'd VB to never hear again is " post - NN era , " an idea that has gained prominence during the past decade , especially the last few NNS . CD dominant theme of post - truthery is that every NN has a NN to his / her own interpretation of the facts , and that these alternative interpretations–or " alternative facts , ” as NNP adviser Kellyanne Conway famously called them –deserve to be taken seriously . They do n't . And yet , IN most of the pseudoscience that I 've been writing about for NNS now , we have to continue calling out nonsense for what it is , because some of it is harmful , and RB deadly . Politics is a never - ending font of post - truthery ( or truthiness , as Stephen Colbert defined it in 2005 ) , but here I 'm concerned about NN . Today I 'll highlight three anti-truth campaigns that have caused great harm over the past decades , in the hope that they will soon fade away . Among serious NNS , NN is not being questioned . Indeed , the essence of NN is the search for objective NN . Sometimes , though , a scientific discovery threatens to undermine the NN or profits of an influential industry , and that 's when industry resorts to denialism ( which is essentially the same thing as post - truthiness ) . Perhaps the most well - documented example of organized NN denialism dates back to the 1950s , when accumulating evidence made it clear that smoking causes cancer . The tobacco industry did n't VB to admit this , RB though their own internal research supported it , because it meant that their main product was killing their customers , which in turn was terrible NN for their business . In response , Eventually , after decades of lawsuits and literally millions of smoking - related deaths , the industry was forced to admit the NN and pay out billions of dollars in settlements in the U.S. Nonetheless , JJ NNS still smoke , and RB as recently as CD , the largest tobacco NN in the U.S. , Philip Morris , was still trying to deny the NN about cigarettes . My second example is more recent , and potentially RB more harmful to the JJ NNS . You might have already guessed it : I 'm talking about NN NN denialism . For several decades , the evidence has been building that the NN is getting warmer . A series of reports from the Intergovernmental Panel on NNP NNP ( IPCC ) warned , in increasingly confident terms , that NNS were the primary NN of recent NN , mostly due to our NN of fossil fuels and the NN they emit into the atmosphere . The current IPCC report VBZ unequivocally that NNS have already caused 1° C of NN , and that the NN will increase rapidly over the next several decades . Scientifically , these facts are not in dispute . The NN is already experiencing more severe storms , unprecedented floods and droughts , and die - offs due to NN oceans ( such as the massive and tragic die - off of coral in Great Barrier Reef ) . However , the fossil fuel industry sees JJ NN as a threat to their profits . Rather than invest in JJ , cleaner forms of NN , JJ NNS such as Exxon - Mobil and billionaire coal magnates such as the Koch brothers have poured countless millions of dollars into disinformation campaigns to cast doubt on the NN of NN NN . Prominent among these efforts is The Heartland Institute , a fossil - fuel - funded organization whose main mission is to cast doubt on the NN of NN NN . ( Heartland has RB worked to cast doubt on the link between smoking and cancer . ) NN NN denialists learned from the tobacco NNS that it was possible to delay NN action by decades , simply by casting doubt on the NN . Unfortunately , their campaigns have been working . For NNS , JJ U.S. politicians denied that the NN was getting warmer . As that argument has become increasingly harder to VB with a straight face , they 've changed their strategy , and now they might admit that the NN is heating up , but deny that JJ activities are responsible . They 're still wrong . The goal of this denialism is , simply put , to protect the profits of fossil fuel industries . However , NN does n't care if you VBP it or not . The NN is getting hotter . NNP just had its four hottest days in recorded history . The unprecedented heat wave has led to hundreds of fires through much of the NN , threatening every major city on the continent . There 's no reason to VB this wo n't keep happening . NN NN denialists are only fooling themselves –after being duped by NN and coal NNS . My third and final example is CD that has frustrated me for 15 NNS now , and it ’s CD that just wo n't VB away : the anti-vaccination movement . This is CD of the most frustrating examples of post - NN wrongheadedness , in part it seems so unnecessary , and because so JJ NNS have been harmed as a result . RB , let 's be clear about the facts : NNS are CD of the greatest boons to JJ NN in the history of NN and medicine . NNS VBD to die by the millions from smallpox , polio , and a dozen other infections that are now almost completely preventable by NNS . Smallpox was 100 % eliminated from the NN in 1980 , in CD of humankind 's greatest JJ NN triumphs . Polio has now been eradicated from nearly all NNS , and a NN that started in 1988 has now reduced polio to just a few NNS and fewer than 100 NNS worldwide . Both of these successes are due to NNS . JJ other NNS , including NNS , chicken pox , and bacterial meningitis , have been reduced so dramatically by NNS that physicians in the U.S. and Europe almost never VBP a NN . This graph shows the dramatic effect of the NN NN , which was introduced in the U.S. in the early 1960s : The graph shows the number of reported NNS , but actual NNS were much higher , likely RB 4 CD NNS IN NN by CD estimate . These are the facts . So what happened ? The modern anti-vax movement , led by a small number of extremely vocal , extremely self - confident individuals , began in 1998 with the publication of a fraudulent NN ( later retracted when the fraud was uncovered ) claiming that NNS caused NN . The NN was led by JJ physician Andrew Wakefield , who later lost his JJ license because of his fraud , which included misleading his co-authors and mistreating patients . Nonetheless , this NN was picked up and amplified by several celebrities with JJ followings , including JJ Playboy NN and MTV host Jenny McCarthy and political activist Robert F. Kennedy Jr , the nephew of JJ US NNP John Kennedy . RFK Jr . Anti-vax activism is all over the web today , despite JJ efforts to quash it . Countless claims of " my child got sick after his NN jab " are presented as proof that NNS VBP harm , and under post - truthism , we 're supposed to take such claims seriously . These stories can be especially difficult to respond to , because JJ NNS are dealing with NNS who have genuine NN problems –including autism–and the NNS often truly VBP what they are saying . Thus it wo n't do to tell them to be quiet and VB away : their NNS RB do need JJ care . They 're simply wrong in believing that NNS have anything to do with their childrens ' problems . Their beliefs are amplified by NNP groups and websites whose sole purpose is to echo and amplify the mistaken claims of anti-vaxxers . RB though there was never any good evidence that NNS VBP NN , NNS have conducted dozens of studies involving literally millions of NNS to answer precisely that question , and the evidence is very , very clear : NNS do not VB NN , nor do they VB any other systematic neurological or behavioral problems . NNS do prevent NNS , though , and unvaccinated NNS can and will VB sick . Recent experience has RB given us , tragically , JJ examples of NNS who died from entirely preventable infections , because their NNS did n't vaccinate them . These tragedies did n't have to happen . Every era is the age of NN . The idea that we 're in a " post - NN era , " despite being repeated thousands of times in articles , essays , and op - eds over the past decade , is a commentary on NNS 's ability to fool themselves , not on the NN of the NN . NN describes the NN as it is , and those who choose to deny it might win a short - term argument , but in the JJ term , they will always lose . Finally , on a more positive note , I 'm somewhat heartened by efforts to educate college students on how to recognize and counter bogus ideas , such as the NNP of Washington course , Calling Bullshit , created by Carl Bergstrom and Jevin West . ( Yes , that RB is its title . ) As the professors wrote : If you 're interested , they 've made the lectures available as free videos on NNP . Labelling an era as post - anything has always , to me , suggested a lack of substance , as if the era is defined only by what came before it . The NN of " post - " RB ignores that fact that the next era will need a name too . Should we expect " post - post - NN " to come next ? And what MD that look IN ? Let 's hope that the 2020s will give us a return to simple respect for NN . The future of civilization might very well depend on it .

text: The Facts : In a recent lawsuit , the CDC admitted in federal NN that they have no studies , evidence or NN proving that NNS do n’t VB NN . Reflect On : Why did they lie for NNS about this ? For NNS they claimed that the studies had been done , the evidence was clear , and that there was a consensus : “ NNS do n’t VB NN . ” Yet , this was a lie . Despite months of demands , the CDC failed to produce a single specific NN in response to these FOIA requests . ICAN was therefore forced to sue the CDC in federal NN , where the CDC finally conceded , in a stipulation signed by a Federal NN judge , that that it has no studies to support that any of these NNS do not VB NN . In short , the CDC provided a list of studies that were to claim NNS did not VB NN , only , none of these studies proved that . Part of the list was a recent review by the Institute of Medicine ( IOM ) , which was paid for by the CDC . This NN performed a comprehensive review of studies relating to the DTaP NN . It was looking to determine whether or not the NN does or does not VB NN . The IOM was unable to identify a single NN to support that DTaP does not VB NN . What they did find was a single NN that did show an association between DTaP and NN . In turn , those that questioned NNS were called anti-vaxxers , unscientific and extreme about their views , yet were they wrong to claim that NNS MD VB NN and that they do n’t feel they are safe ? It does n’t seem to be the NN when you consider that a look at the NN and evidence available suggests it ’s highly likely that vaccinees do play a role in NN . This , as we VBP now , has not been debunked nor fully proven . The detail that hits close to home for us here at CE is that fact - checkers have been handing out JJ claims about our NN content , stating that “ NNS do n’t VB NN . ” This has led to a reduction in our reach and the near - complete destruction of our business due to demonetization . All the while , the NNS who owned them , and their cronies fought to claim these NNS were unscientific , liars and wrong . Are we seeing this now with NNS ? text: The Official NNP Personnel Files ( OMPF ) , held at the National Personnel Records Center ( NPRC ) , are administrative records containing information about the subject 's JJ service history . JJ OMPFs contain both personnel and JJ active duty NN records , but the service branches discontinued retiring the NN record portion to the NPRC in the 1990s . In the past , all of the JJ services retired the individual NN record , along with the personnel record , to the NPRC upon a service member 's separation from service . The Army and the NNP Force retired its NN records with the Official NNP Personnel File , while the Department of the Navy ( including the Navy , Marine Corps and Coast Guard ) retired these files separately to the NPRC until the 1980s . NN records cover the outpatient , dental and mental NN NN that JJ members received while in JJ service . NN records include induction and separation physical examinations , as well as routine JJ care ( NN / dental visits , lab tests , etc. ) when the patient was not admitted to a hospital . In comparison , JJ ( hospital inpatient ) records were generated when active duty members were actually hospitalized while in the service . Typically , these records are NOT filed with the NN records but are generally retired to the NPRC by the facility which created them ( VB JJ records for more information ) . JJ records from the Department of Veterans Affairs ( VA ) are RB not included . In the 1990s , the JJ services discontinued the practice of filing NN records with the personnel record portion at the NPRC . In 1992 , the Army began retiring most of its JJ members ' NN records to the Department of Veterans Affairs ( VA ) . Over the next six NNS , the other services followed suit . In 2014 , the JJ services dicontinued the practice of retiring the records to the Department of Veterans Affairs ( VA ) . In order to determine where a JJ record is located , please VB the chart below : Veterans who plan to file a claim for JJ benefits with the Department of Veterans Affairs ( VA ) do not need to request a copy of their JJ NN record from the NPRC . After a claim is filed , the VA will obtain the original NN record from the NPRC . In addition , JJ NN records were lent to the Department of Veterans Affairs prior to the 1973 Fire . Veterans who filed a JJ claim should contact the Department of Veterans Affairs ( VA ) in order to determine if their record is already on file . The VA Toll Free # is : 1-800-827-1000 - it will connect the caller to the nearest VA office .

text: While JJ JJ parliamentarians have been outspoken in their disgust at the “ horrific ” CD - sided atrocity being clearly observed in the Israeli slaughter of Palestinian demonstrators last week , most of their U.S. counterparts appear to have lost their ability to express themselves over the egregious JJ rights violations being committed by the Israeli Army in Gaza . Sixty - CD unarmed Palestinian demonstrators were shot dead and nearly three thousand more were injured by gunfire and tear NN versus no Israelis killed or wounded while a leading Knesset parliamentarian has assured the NN that the Army has plenty of bullets left to kill all the Gazans if necessary . The White NNP , however , has obviously not seen the NN footage of the slaughter , and was instead celebrating the opening of the JJ NNP Embassy in Jerusalem intended to coincide with the 70th Anniversary of the creation of Israel , which some might RB refer to as the 70th anniversary of the ethnic cleansing of the Palestinian Christians and Muslims . Donald NNP tweeted that it was a “ great day for Israel , ” apparently having missed watching the slaying of the Palestinians by split screen as the largely JJ Jewish celebrants yukked it up with a broadly grinning Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu . A short NN later someone named Raj Shah at the White NNP told reporters at a press briefing that “ The responsibility for these tragic deaths rests squarely with Hamas . Hamas is intentionally and cynically provoking this response ” as “ a gruesome and unfortunate propaganda attempt . ” And meanwhile over at the NNP Nations , JJ Ambassador Nikki Haley vetoed a Russian proposal seeking an investigation into the carnage , explaining that that Hamas , aided of course by Iran , was to blame for the violence . “ I ask my colleagues here in the Security Council : who among us MD accept this type of activity on your border ? No NN MD . No NN in this chamber MD act with more restraint than Israel has . ” She then walked out when Riyad Mansour , the Palestinian Permanent Representative to the NNP Nations began to speak . NNP son - in - law Jared Kushner , who was part of the Jerusalem delegation , RB as violence was erupting in Gaza forty NNS away , RB knew whom to blame , saying “ As we have seen from the protests of the last month and RB today , those provoking violence are part of the problem and not part of the solution . ” He was not talking about the 200 Israeli snipers firing into an unarmed crowd of Gazans . To be sure , some Democratic Congressman have expressed horror over what has been taking place . Barbara Lee , Betty McCollum and Bernie Sanders have all spoken up . Sanders VBD that “ Israel should be condemned . ” Congressman Mark Pocan declared that “ There are better ways to deal with the tensions in Gaza than bullets . ” Pocan and Raúl Grijalva , Pramila Jayapal , Keith Ellison , and Hank Johnson all expressed shock and dismay at “ the lethal force VBN by Israeli troops against mostly unarmed protesters demonstrating at Gaza ’s border . ” They asked Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu ’s NN to “ show utmost restraint , allow for unfettered JJ attention for those who have been wounded , and ease the 12 - NN blockade on Gaza , which has contributed to grave food insecurity , unemployment and a humanitarian NN for Gaza ’s CD CD inhabitants . ” Congressmen Johnson and Pocan as well as Dan Kildee of Michigan have recently called for the Israeli NN to permit them to enter the Palestinian region to VB what is happening on the ground there . The three congressmen visited Israel in CD but were blocked from crossing into the Gaza Strip by the Israeli Coordination and Liaison Administration , which operates the borders and entry points , limiting who can enter and leave as well as the flow of such essentials as food supplies . It might astonish some Americans to learn that Israel can stop any U.S. Congressmen from entering Gaza , which Tel Aviv illogically claims is no longer under its NN RB though it has turned the area into an outdoor prison camp . CD notes particularly the lack of RB a single Republican concerned over the completely disproportionate carnage in Gaza . Senator Rand Paul , who CD referred to Israeli controlled Gaza as a “ concentration camp , ” is notable by his absence . Senators Ten Cruise , Lindsey Graham , Dean Heller and Mike Lee ( a bit of a surprise that , but he is a Mormon ) were all part of the official delegation , which RB included a number of GOP NNP members as well as Florida governor Rick Scott . Regarding the Democrats , it has RB been observed that the party base does not any longer support the philo - Israel policies embraced by the Clintonesque Democratic National Committee leadership . Those congressmen who have spoken out certainly deserve the NN ’s support when they find Israel ’s behavior just too much to take .
