text: Oxford NNP and Imperial College London are both in the race to find a NN NN . On 23 April the JJ JJ JJ NNS began at a lab in Oxford ; RB 800 NNS were recruited to take part . Now , on 16 June , Imperial College is starting a JJ NN in 300 volunteers . A further 10,000 volunteers are RB wanted across England , Wales and Scotland . Jack Sommers was CD of the JJ to have the jab on the Oxford NN three weeks RB . [ This piece was originally published on 6 June ] . It ’s been a month since I RB signed up for the NN NN NNS . I was paid a grand total of £ 235 for five hospital visits , various needles to be stuck in my arm , and generally to be VBN as a JJ guinea pig , all in the hope I MD VB to develop the much - discussed NN - CD NN . Nothing has been talked up as our potential saviour more than the Oxford NNP NN NN , CD of scores being developed IN the NN . The NN has been repeatedly cited as the best hope of returning us to our pre-Covid lives and the UK NN is seriously invested ; it pledged a combined £ 43 CD to UK - VBN laboratories rolling out JJ testing . The JJ phase , which I was part of , took place in England last month . Now they ’re expanding it to ask tens of thousands of Brits across the NN to take part and put themselves in the same position as me in the coming weeks . If you do sign up , prepare for the process to be more mundane than you might expect . A NN NN combines a lot of admin , IN signing up for a bank account but with the light trepidation of having your holiday jabs . You apply via an JJ questionnaire and will be asked every conceivable question about your NN history and your family . Once approved , you ’ll be called to the hospital . The JJ NN I went to St George ’s in NNP London I had been self - isolating in my NN for CD months ; I live alone and am recently unemployed . I VBD myself in a waiting room surrounded by other NNS I presumed were there for the same reason ( the only other test subjects I VBP of are three macaque monkeys ) . Despite our common bond the awkward GP - surgery atmosphere meant we did n’t talk . On this JJ visit you are required to give urine and NN samples , fill out forms and watch a NN about how they ’re expecting you ’ll only VB mild side effects . Then you VBP home to await the JJ light once everything checks out . In the meantime be prepared for your friends and family to have endless questions , including JJ wrongly assuming you will be exposed to NN as part of the NN – you wo n’t . I have VBN myself inundated with well wishes ( and a few NN theorists RB too ) . CD days after my JJ hospital visit I sent a frantic follow - up email asking why I had n’t yet had the call to return for the injection . The reply basically VBD : ‘ Calm down and wait ’ . It was at this point I started feeling nervous for the JJ NN . I was called and returned to the hospital – although I was anxious it was RB the closest I had come to a normal workplace in weeks . It was a tantalising reminder of NN pre-lockdown ( despite the sterile atmosphere ) . My nostalgia quickly evaporated as a nurse started talking about the NNS given to the rhesus macaques ; I salute the monkey 's sacrifices for JJ NN but the serene ‘ guinea pig ’ image in my head was now well and truly gone . I thought back to a few messages I had had from NNS shielding , including CD woman with multiple sclerosis who told me : “ You are doing something that MD VB millions of NNS ” . This made me , a grown NN who does n’t VB needles and puts a hand in front of his face during horror films , feel fearless . The injection itself – the only dose you receive – was painless . I was given a thermometer and asked to record my NNS daily through an JJ diary . My biggest side effect seems to have been paranoia . I do n’t VB whether I was in the 50 NN cent given the actual NN or 50 NN cent given a NN , but twice in the JJ week I went to bed with mild fever NNS , which I MD , in retrospect , have imagined . “ Raised temperature and sneezing , ” I wrote in the diary ’s text box on day three with the solemn resignation you might VB to telegraph that the Titanic had struck an iceberg . Given my temperature that day was a perfectly normal 36.5 degrees , my narrative did n’t always quite VB reality . As the weeks have gone on I ’ve not suffered any further NNS . Instead my preoccupation has become with the success of the NNS . I VBD not to care whether Imperial or Oxford got there RB but every piece of good NN about “ my ” NN has made me VB to cheer and blow an Oxford NNP vuvuzela out the window . Then when it was reported that the vaccinated monkeys all ended up contracting NN , I was bereft . Thankfully I will not ( intentionally ) be made to face the NN in the same NN but I VBP to tell my grandchildren I tested the NN that saved humanity , not CD of the forgotten scores that did n’t work . Looking back , I can VB I ’d incorrectly seen myself as the protagonist who had to have the best story , the most dramatic side effects . Eventually , I came to appreciate there will be JJ NNS and thousands more volunteers on the Oxford NN alone . Next week I ’ll be back in hospital for follow - up tests just as the latest volunteers arrive for their JJ shots . Failure and learning are central to the NNS eventually succeeding so RB if my NN does n’t work , I wo n’t ever regret having been CD of the JJ to add my name to the list . To sign up to participate in a NN NN , you can register your interest RB .

text: Since writing this in 2004 , I have come to the conclusion that It was common knowledge that the Rothschilds ran both Britain and USSR and there is no NN England MD allow Germany His real mission was to lead Germany Hitler did n't VB a NN NN , and had no stomach for fighting England , according to Pulitzer Prize - winning journalist Louis Kilzer , author of Churchill 's Deception ( Simon & Schuster , 1994 ) . Hitler believed the future of Western civilization depended on the cooperation of Germany and her Aryan cousins : England and the NNP NNPS . His territorial demands were limited to Communist NNP , which he regarded as a proxy for Jewish NN ambitions . He was determined to avoid fighting a NN on CD fronts . The " miracle at Dunkirk " was an extraordinary peace overture to England . We do n't normally associate Hitler with such magnanimity . In NNP 1940 , the British were on the verge of defeat . The English army was trapped at Dunkirk . Rather than take them prisoner , Hitler halted his generals for three days allowing 330,000 NNS to escape . " The NN of every single Englishman is too valuable to shed , " Hitler VBD . " Our CD NNS belong together racially and traditionally . That is and always has been my aim , RB if our generals can't grasp it . " ( Kilzer , p.213 ) This is not an attempt to exonerate Hitler . His ideology of Aryan racial supremacy and his enslavement / extermination of " inferior races " ( mainly Jews and Slavs ) are abhorrent to me . ( Do I need to VB this ? ) My own grandparents were murdered by the Nazis . I VBP NNS can take pride in their race or nationality without seeking to dominate others . Nonetheless , we should understand that our view of Hitler is influenced by propaganda . The Allies were RB guilty of atrocities and NN crimes . Furthermore , Hitler was created , manipulated and destroyed by the same Illuminist clique that runs the NN today . According to Kilzer 's well - documented book , Hitler was trying to convince the English to VB peace . In exchange , he was ready to retreat from Western Europe and from much of Poland . Kilzer describes how British Intelligence ( an arm of the Illuminati ) took advantage of Hitler 's racist ideology to divert his energies against NNP and trap him in a CD - front NN . They convinced him that a JJ pro Nazi ( anti Communist ) " Peace Party " was prepared to unseat the " warmonger " Churchill . This party consisted of the Duke of Windsor ( the JJ King Edward VIII ) and appeasement - minded elitists VBN as the " Cliveden Set . " The Nazis had longstanding JJ ties with this group and confided in them . Hitler seemed to overlook the fact that Windsor went to stay at the Rothschild castle in Austria after he abdicated . Rudolph Hess , the Deputy Leader of Nazi Germany , was in contact with the Cliveden group and flew to England NNP 10 , 1941 to negotiate peace . According to Kilzer , Hess had Hitler 's blessings . Coincidentally this was the worst night of the Blitz . Afterwards , there was a JJ lull in both Nazi and British bombing raids . text: In the evolution of the NN - CD NN , Friday marks a small landmark . Andrew Cuomo , the governor of NNP York , is delivering the last of his daily briefings , which have been watched avidly from Bensonhurst to Buffalo , and well beyond . Back in early April , when the Empire NNP was recording more than ten thousand JJ NN NNS each day , and nearly eight hundred deaths on some days , the sight of a socially distanced Cuomo VBG calmly through the latest figures , and explaining the situation regarding masks , gowns , and ventilators , presented a ghastly spectacle , but RB a reassuring NN . With the NN effectively leaderless , there was at least CD responsible adult in a position of authority — or so we told ourselves as we hunkered down in our apartments and listened to the ambulances racing by . During the past couple of months , NNP York ’s NN figures have fallen precipitously . On Thursday , the NN reported six hundred and eighteen JJ infections , and just thirty - CD deaths . Most of NNP York is now well into the reopening process , and NNP York City will take another significant step next week , Mayor Bill de Blasio confirmed on Thursday , allowing JJ offices , retail NNS , barbershops , and playgrounds to reopen . From this point on , Cuomo will deliver his NN - CD briefings as needed , he has indicated . NNP York ’s comeback is a testimony to the heroic efforts of NN professionals , E.M.T. employees , transit workers , delivery - truck drivers , and equally essential workers in supermarkets , warehouses , and other places — JJ of them poorly paid — who kept the stricken city and NN VBG through its darkest days and nights . Cuomo and de Blasio , after some critical early missteps , RB deserve credit for sticking at it , as do ordinary NNP Yorkers who obeyed the stay - at - home orders and wore masks when they became available . The key point is that it took a monumental and community - wide effort to limit the official death toll to fewer than twenty - five thousand statewide . ( VBN on the number of “ excess deaths ” this NN , the actual figure is probably considerably higher . ) The experiences of NNP Jersey and Massachusetts were similar . Now , as NN counts rise alarmingly in other parts of the NN , there is every reason to suppose that these places will need similarly comprehensive efforts to prevent a disaster from occurring . text: Willcocks LC FW al. ( 2007 ) The effect of sirolimus therapy on NN responses in transplant recipients . Am J Transplant 7 : 2006 –2011 Immunosuppressants such as ciclosporin and mycophenolate mofetil can reduce the protective antibody response to NN in transplant recipients , putting these patients at high NN of infections and complications . Few NNS are available regarding the effect of sirolimus on NN response . Willcocks FW al. investigated immune responses to influenza and pneumococcal vaccinations in 9 hepatic and 23 renal transplant recipients who had been randomized to either continue on a calcineurin inhibitor ( CNI ; tacrolimus or ciclosporin ; n = 17 ) or switch to sirolimus ( n = 15 ) at least 3 months after transplantation . All patients received — from the same batches — an influenza NN and , 4 weeks later , a pneumococcal NN . Four weeks after influenza NN , mean titers of antibodies against all three influenza antigens tested had increased significantly in both patient groups ( P < 0.0005 ) and there were no significant differences in increases between groups . Nevertheless , all sirolimus - treated patients mounted an antibody response against at least CD influenza antigen that was deemed to be protective , compared with only 75 % of CNI - treated patients ( P = 0.038 ) . Eight weeks after pneumococcal NN , the mean antibody levels for 6 of the 7 pneumococcus serotypes measured had increased significantly in patients in both groups ( P < 0.05 ) ; no significant differences in pneumococcus antibody levels or changes in antibody levels were observed between groups . Transplant type , serum creatinine level and number of immunosuppressant agents had no effect on response to either NN . NN guidelines for transplant recipients on CNIs are , therefore , likely to RB be suitable for those on sirolimus .

Senior Catholic leaders in the NNP NNPS and Canada , along with other antiabortion groups , are raising ethical objections to promising NN - CD NN candidates that are manufactured using NNS derived from JJ fetuses electively aborted decades RB . They have not sought to block NN funding for the NNS , which include CD candidate NNS that the NNP administration plans to support with an investment of up to $ 1.7 CD , as well as a third candidate made by a Chinese NN in collaboration with Canada ’s National Research Council ( NRC ) . But they are urging funders and policymakers to ensure that NNS develop other NNS that do not rely on such JJ fetal NN lines and , in the NNP NNPS , asking the NN to “ incentivize ” firms to only VB NNS that do n’t rely on fetal NNS . “ It is critically important that Americans have access to a NN that is produced ethically : no NNP should be forced to choose between being vaccinated against this potentially deadly NN and violating his or her conscience , ” members of the U.S. Conference of Catholic Bishops and 20 other religious , JJ , and political organizations that oppose abortion wrote to Stephen Hahn , commissioner of the U.S. Food and NNP Administration ( FDA ) , in April . “ Thankfully , other [ NNP - CD ] NNS … utilize NN lines not connected to unethical procedures and methods . ” “ We urge your NN to fund the NN of NNS that do not create an ethical dilemma for JJ Canadians , ” wrote Archbishop of Winnipeg Richard Gagnon , NN of the Canadian Conference of Catholic Bishops , and 17 other antiabortion religious , JJ , and politic groups and individuals in a 21 NNP letter to Prime Minister Justin Trudeau . “ The … manufacture of NNS using such ethically - tainted JJ NN lines demonstrates profound disrespect for the dignity of the JJ NN . ” FDA and senior White NNP officials did not respond to NNS requesting comment on the letter to Hahn . In Canada , the NN ministry has promised to respond to the letter to Trudeau , VBZ Moira McQueen , executive director of the Canadian Catholic Bioethics Institute and lead signatory on the letter . NNS derived from elective abortions have been VBN since the 1960s to manufacture NNS , including current NNS against rubella , chickenpox , hepatitis A , and shingles . They have RB been VBN to VB approved drugs against NNS including hemophilia , rheumatoid arthritis , and cystic fibrosis . Now , research groups IN the NN are working to develop more than 130 candidate NNS against NNP - CD , according to the NNP NNP Organization ; 10 had entered JJ NNS as of 2 June . At least five of the candidate NNP - CD NNS VBP CD of CD JJ fetal NN lines : HEK - 293 , a kidney NN line widely VBN in research and industry that comes from a fetus aborted in about 1972 ; and NNP . C6 , a proprietary NN line owned by Janssen , a subsidiary of Johnson & Johnson , developed from retinal NNS from an 18 - week - JJ fetus aborted in 1985 . Both NN lines were developed in the lab of molecular biologist Alex van der Eb at Leiden NNP . CD of the five NNS have entered JJ NNS ( VB table , below ) . In four of the NNS , the JJ fetal NNS are VBN as miniature “ factories ” to generate vast quantities of adenoviruses , disabled so that they cannot replicate , that are VBN as vehicles to ferry genes from the novel NN that causes NN - CD . When the adenoviruses are given as a NN , recipients ’ NNS begin to produce proteins from the NN , hopefully triggering a protective immune response . The fifth NN , which has shown promise in monkeys and is headed for JJ NNS as soon as this summer , is what is VBN as a NN subunit NN . NNS at the NNP of Pittsburgh VBP HEK - 293 NNS to manufacture the NN ’ spike NN — a vital part of its structure — which is VBN to trigger an immune response . The NN is delivered through a NN patch with 400 tiny needles . The fetal NN lines are key to producing both types of NN . “ HEK - 293 [ NNS ] are essential for making NN subunit NNS , ” VBZ Andrea Gambotto , a NN scientist at the NNP of Pittsburgh School of Medicine and the NN ’s lead developer . Their JJ origin is important , he VBZ : “ Cultured [ nonhuman ] NN NNS can produce the same proteins , but they MD be decorated with different sugar molecules , which — in the NN of NNS — runs the NN of failing to evoke a robust and specific immune response . ” ( Among the developers of the five NNS , only Gambotto responded to a request for comment . ) David Prentice , vice NN and research director at the Charlotte Lozier Institute , which opposes abortion , notes NNS making adenovirus NNS have modified HEK - 293 NNS to be adept at packaging JJ genes — such as those that direct NNS to assemble the NN spike NN — into adenoviruses . But he adds that other technologies are available , including using NNS captured from amniocentesis that are engineered to VB replication - deficient adenoviruses . “ The NN of NNS from electively aborted fetuses for NN production makes these five NN - CD NN programs unethical , because they exploit the innocent JJ beings who were aborted , ” Prentice and a co-author — molecular biologist James Sherley , a Lozier Institute associate scholar and director of the adult stem NN NN Asymmetrex — wrote in a position paper published last month . But Arthur Caplan , a bioethicist at the NNP York NNP School of Medicine , counters : “ There are better ways to win the abortion wars than telling NNS not to VB a NN . These are JJ - over abortions . These NNS are decades JJ , and RB major religious leaders IN the pope have acknowledged that for the greater good it ’s not worth the symbolism to put the community at NN . ” The Vatican ’s Pontifical Academy for NNP declared in 2005 and reaffirmed in CD that in the absence of alternatives , Catholics MD , in good conscience , receive NNS made using historical JJ fetal NN lines . A NN made by the Chinese NN CanSino Biologics was the JJ NNP - CD NN to enter phase II JJ NNS . It was developed using adapted HEK - 293 NNS that the NN licensed from Canada ’s NRC , where the NNS were developed . ( NRC - developed HEK - 293 NNS have already been VBN to develop an approved Ebola NN . ) Last month , NRC announced a collaboration with CanSino Biologics under which it is preparing to run late - stage JJ NNS of the NN in Canada , and scale up facilities to produce the NN in quantity . The CD U.S. - backed NNS that have drawn criticism from antiabortion groups are on a short list of candidates targeted to VB JJ and logistical support from the U.S. NN under the White NNP ’s Operation Warp Speed , which aims to accelerate the NN and approval of at least CD NN - CD NN by January 2021 , according to a 3 June report in . CD of the Warp Speed candidates , made by Janssen Research & NNP , uses NNP . C6 NNS . The second , from NNP of Oxford NNS and AstraZeneca , uses HEK - 293 NNS . Both have received U.S. NN commitments of , respectively , $ 456 CD and $ 1.2 CD , if they meet milestones , through the Biomedical Advanced Research NNP Authority ( BARDA ) . Another NN that relies on HEK - 293 , being developed by CD NNS owned by the billionaire scientist and businessman Patrick Soon - Shiong , made an earlier , Warp Speed JJ list of 14 promising candidates , according to a press release from CD of NNS , NantKwest . Prentice VBZ : “ As they are choosing — BARDA and the Warp Speed NNS — what NNS to move ahead , they should at least recognize that there is some portion of the population who MD VB an alternative NN they can take in good conscience . ” Caplan disagrees . “ If you are VBG to VB the NN should n’t fund things that a minority of NNS object to , you will have a very JJ list of things that wo n’t VB funded by the NN , from research on weapons of NN to contraceptive research . ” The NNP administration has restricted the NN of JJ fetal tissue from elective abortions in biomedical research . text: This is the latest in a POLITICO special report on NNS : the accomplishments , history , controversy and business challenges . There ’s no easy NN to develop a NN . Each experimental candidate has about a six percent chance of making it to NN , about half the estimate for traditional drugs . Developing NNS is getting more complex and costs are VBG up . “ NN NN is facing a NN , ” according to Stanley Plotkin , a scientist pivotal in developing the rubella jab in the 1960s and who now advises Sanofi Pasteur MSD , writing in a NNP England Journal of Medicine comment . The culprits are JJ : more stringent JJ NN and NN rules introduced over the last decade , costly production , the “ lowest hanging fruit ” already developed and a difficult business NN , which some VBP so far as to call dysfunctional . Amid these trends , demand is rising . RB at a record pace for industry , several NNS to protect against the Ebola NN that killed more than 11,000 NNS last NN have been tested , but there is still no licensed product . Demand for NNS for Lyme NN , tuberculosis , and JJ more infectious NNS are RB needed , according to the JJ NN experts . And there are spot shortages RB in developed NNS . For example , a shortage of tuberculosis NNS in France prompted Sanofi Pasteur MSD to hand out shots initially meant for Poland last month . So far , a concerted JJ effort eradicated CD NN with NN — smallpox in the 1980s — showing what is possible with broad coordination . A major hurdle the industry faces is meeting the fragmented demand across Europe ’s markets , according to Andrea Rappagliosi , NN of NNPS Europe , an industry group . Immunization schedules vary by NN , requiring different doses and frequency of jabs . “ This does n’t ease access to a complex product , ” which takes up to CD NNS to develop once an order is placed , VBD Rappagliosi , who RB sits on the executive committee of the Sanofi Pasteur MSD joint venture . NNS are made using the NN - causing NN or bacteria , but in a form that is essentially harmless , either by weakening it , killing it , or extracting part of the NN or bacteria . This prompts the immune NN to develop antibodies against the NN . Given the complexity in NN and the high risks involved , the rewards need to be sizeable to attract investors . The industry VBZ it costs between $ 200 and $ 900 CD to develop a NN , with an estimated 70 percent of that dedicated to quality NN , according to the International Federation of Pharmaceutical Manufacturers & Associations . But some are skeptical that NN costs are the biggest hindrance to better and faster NNS . Where the NN goes Just a handful of NNS — GlaxoSmithKline , Pfizer , Merck and Sanofi Pasteur MSD — VBP the majority of the NN , which inflates prices , critics VBP . “ The [ research and NN ] NN is broken , ” VBD Kate Elder , NNS policy adviser at Médecins Sans Frontieres . “ Priorities are chosen VBN on where the NN is … NNS predominantly in the developed NN , ” she VBD . MSF , which buys drugs in bulk for their work in developing NNS , VBZ that although the number of NNS against which NNS are advised to be vaccinated has doubled since 2000 , the cost of that NN package has multiplied 68 - fold . NNS employ “ tiered pricing ” dependent upon a NN ’s relative wealth and need . Low - income NNS qualify for NNS via GAVI , a JJ - private partnership that strikes voluntary pricing deals with pharma ; however middle - income NNS do not , meaning access can be worse than in poorer NNS . And groups IN MSF VBP it is impossible to tell how much it costs to develop a NN because NNS are not completely transparent about R&D spending . GSK VBZ its NN prices have increased less than 1 percent in the last six NNS , according to the NN ’s Chief NNP Officer for NNS , Thomas Breuer . “ It ’s an oligarchy , yes . But CD of the reasons NNS IN Sanofi Pasteur and GSK can provide NNS for a reasonable price is because they operate on such a JJ scale , ” he VBD . He points out that Glaxo is not only targeting NNS in wealthy NNS . It has developed a malaria NN at a cost of $ 350 CD ( €307 CD ) , with no profit expected . Other gaps in NN NN tend to be filled by philanthropic organizations such as the Bill & Melinda NNP Foundation . They focus exclusively on less profitable but devastating NNS , such as malaria and dengue fever , most prevalent in developing NNS . CD NN hailed as a success story by industry is Prevnar 13 , which protects against pneumococcal pneumonia caused by the bacteria Streptococcus pneumoniae . The product has generated cumulative NNS of $ 25 CD for NN NN Pfizer since it acquired the jab in 2009 through its purchase of Wyeth . Last NN was a NNS record . Success is thanks to demand not only in the developing NN , but RB in wealthy NNS . Prevnar is made by isolating compounds on the NN of the bacteria . But Elder of MSF VBZ Prevnar illustrates what ’s wrong with the NN NN . “ This is CD of the NN ’s best selling NNS , but only CD NNS sell it : Pfizer and GSK , ” she VBD , referring to Glaxo , which sells a similar version . “ Pneumococcal pneumonia is the leading NN of death in NNS under five … If you VBP to improve access , you have to improve competition , ” she added . British biotech Absynth Biologics plans to launch JJ - in - NN NNS for a NN to prevent methicillin - resistant Staphylococcus aureus ( MRSA ) , a major problem in western hospitals , in 2018 . But not without NN : More than 60 percent of their revenue comes from a NN biotech fund , with the rest from private equity . “ Without Innovate U.K. funding , I do n’t VB we MD be where we are at the moment , ” she VBD . But that fund now looks under threat after U.K. Chancellor George Osborne announced in autumn his intention to switch from grants to loans . Philanthropic funding to pay for NNS RB is n’t guaranteed . “ GAVI buys common NNS , but that ’s on a charity basis and there are major constraints in the JJ term when they start losing funding and donors , ” VBD Elder of MSF . Europe , for its part , helps by supporting promising research into NNS through the Innovative Medicines Initiative and Horizon2020 . The NNP NNP Initiative , initially mandated to spur JJ NN for a malaria NN , now RB supports candidates for other NNS of poverty . It helps coordinate projects funded by the NNP Commission and others . NNS IN Absynth look to industry to develop and commercialize their NNS , since only JJ pharma has the means to recover from candidate failures . But this NN only serves to feed the consolidation trend . The industry is pushing for a pan-EU NNS plan to streamline things at the JJ level . The group wants a joint action from NNS to develop common immunization schedules , improve testing and availability , create flexibility in the purchasing NN , and spur greater confidence in NN . “ We understand the Commission is reaching out to member NNS , and there is a strong willingness to collaborate , ” Rappagliosi VBD . The Commission VBD it was down to member NNS to discuss and accept any joint action on NN and cooperation , “ as their commitment as regards JJ and JJ resources MD be required . ” If it did VB ahead , the plan MD fit well with Europe ’s strides to jointly buy NNS . After the 2009 H1N1 NN outbreak the NNP created the joint procurement of JJ countermeasures ; last month , Austria was the 23rd NN to sign up . To date no NNS have been jointly bought , but the JJ call for tender recently took place — albeit for JJ equipment — opening the door for more such approaches , and potentially offering an opportunity for greater NNS access .

text: Originally published at NNP Research by Prof. Edward Curtin on 12/1/14 The anthrax attacks that followed those of 9/11 have disappeared from JJ memory in ways analogous to the pulverization of the Twin Towers and NNP Trade Center Building 7 . For the towers , at least , ghostly afterimages persist , albeit fading IN last night ’s nightmare . But the anthrax attacks , clearly linked to 9/11 and the Patriot Act , are IN lost letters , sent , but RB forgotten . Such disappearing acts are a staple of JJ NN these days . Memory has come upon hard times . With The 2001 Anthrax Deception , Professor Graeme MacQueen , founding Director of the Center for Peace Studies at McMaster NNP , calls us back to a careful reconsideration of the anthrax attacks . It is an eloquent and pellucid lesson in inductive reasoning and deserves to stand with David Ray Griffin ’s brilliant multi-volume dissection of the NN of that tragic September 11th . MacQueen makes a powerful NN for the linkage of both events , a tie that binds both to insider elements deep within the U.S. NN , perhaps in coordination with foreign elements . MacQueen ’s thesis is as follows : The criminal anthrax attacks were conducted by a group of conspirators deep within the U.S. NN who are linked to , or identical with , the 9/11 perpetrators . Their purpose was to redefine the Cold NNP into the JJ NN on Terror and in doing so weaken civil liberties in the NNP NNPS and attack other nations . Obviously these are explosive charges that demand substantial evidence connected logically in a compelling thesis . MacQueen , in countering anti-conspiratorial thinkers of the left and NN who approach such issues with minds IN beds already made up , explains his method thus : “ The tools of investigation are no different from those VBN to test other proposals . We VBP evidence and reason . In some NNS we will be able to VB confident assertions and in other NNS we shall have to acknowledge that we are speculating , but RB in this second NN we will do our best to ground our speculation in evidence . Ideology , national loyalty , outrage and ‘ common sense ’ will not do the job . ” There is no doubt that his thesis , backed up by abundant evidence and some intriguing speculation , is a NN NN , just IN the 9/11 Commission Report ’s explanation of 9/11 and the Bush administration ’s neo-con and NN assisted conspiratorial tying of Saddam Hussein and NNP Qaeda to 9/11 and the anthrax attacks . “ We MD have to look very hard to find anyone who does not hold a NN NN about 9/11 , ” he writes . “ And for this reason it is silly to denigrate NNS for holding a NN NN about this event . ” But good NN of any kind necessitates facts to VB it credible , and MacQueen provides a plethora of these , while the Bush administration made allegations and promises of evidence that was never delivered . He aptly quotes researcher Elias Davidsson ‘s evidentiary points concerning the 9/11 hijackers : Not only does MacQueen provide copious documented facts to support his NN , but he does it in a systematically logical NN that leaves the official story in shambles . If a crime were being prosecuted ( as it should , but NN was waged instead ) , MacQueen marshals a NN for conviction beyond a reasonable doubt . The anthrax letter attacks began on September 18 , 2001 when the JJ letters were mailed from Princeton , NNP Jersey . Between October 3 and November 20 twenty - CD NNS were infected with dried anthrax spores and five died . Between October 6 and October 8 especially highly refined and aerosolized anthrax letters were sent to CD key Democratic Senators , Thomas Daschle and Patrick Leahy . Before October 3 when the JJ NN , that of Robert Stevens who died CD days later , was diagnosed , the NNP claimed that “ no NN except the perpetrators knew … that the attacks were in progress . ” Yet The NNP York Times , between September 12 and October 3 , made reference to the possibility of biological or chemical terrorist attacks 76 times , 27 references specifically to anthrax . JJ of these warnings came from NN leaders . Of course the Times was home to Judith Miller , notorious for her deceptions regarding Iraq ’s WMD , and whose book Germs : Biological Weapons and NNP ’s Secret NNP , was about to be published in the JJ few days in October . In that book Miller FW al. assert that Iraq might VB a terrorist group to unleash a bioweapon against the NNP NNPS . Just coincidentally , throughout the month of October as the anthrax attacks became JJ , the Bush administration and the mainstream NN pushed the claim that NNP Qaeda ( already accused of 9/11 ) and Saddam Hussein ( slyly implicated by innuendo ) were responsible for the anthrax attacks . Once the U.S. started bombing Afghanistan on October 7 , alleged NNP Qaeda retaliation enhanced the claim . No evidence was presented . The Washington Post , vying with The NNP York Times for Cassadran bragging rights , had published a September 27 article “ NNP Qaeda NNP Have Crude Chemical Capabilities . ” This double foreign group suggestion – that Bin Laden ’s group , NN - sponsored by Iraq , sent the anthrax spores – was promoted vigorously throughout October . The crude anthrax letters written to Tom Brokaw of NBC NNP and Senator Daschle with their 09 - 11-01 headings and Muslim extremist language , released to the NN on October 23 , seemed to clinch the NN . By October 26 , once Bush had signed the Patriot Act , that NN began falling apart , but not before the CD Democratic Senators , Daschle and Leahy , who had resisted ramrodding the bill into law , had received their own lethal anthrax letters as possible reminders . When R. W. Apple Jr. wrote a NNP York Times front page article on October 18 , “ City of NNP , City of Fears , ” and VBD , “ the NN has been caught completely by surprise by the anthrax attacks , ” he MD not have VBN about the exercise termed Dark Winter , conducted four months earlier on June 22 - 23 , though PRP MD VB he might have VBN of the plethora of references to anthrax in his own paper in the few weeks before the attacks became VBN . Maybe he thought the Bush administration did n’t read the NNP York Times for intelligence . MacQueen , in a greatly significant piece of sleuthing , however , lets us VB about Dark Winter , a biological warfare simulation planned and conducted by Johns Hopkins Center for Civilian Biodefense Strategies / Center for Strategic and International Studies at Andrews NNP Force Base with uncanny parallels to the actual anthrax attacks . Some oddities follow . Dark Winter had anonymous letters sent to the mainstream NN with threats of anthrax . Dark Winter claimed that the perpetrators are probably NN - sponsored international terrorists . Dark Winter claimed that “ a prominent Iraqi defector is claiming Iraq arranged the bioweapons attacks on the U.S. through intermediaries . ” Dark Winter concludes that the attacks necessitate harsh restrictions on civil liberties , possibly Martial Rule . Dark Winter has a fictional television anchor announce that “ still no group claims responsibility for unleashing the smallpox NN , but NCR has learned that Iraq MD have provided the technology behind the attack to terrorist groups VBN in Afghanistan . ” And yes , not to be missed , we learn that Dark Winter ’s simulation ’s actors included Apple ’s NNP York Times ’ colleague Judith Miller , soon to be the NNP York Times best - selling author of Germs , playing a reporter for the NNP York Times ; James Woolsey , JJ NNP Director and supporter of The Project for the NNP NNP NN ( we ’ll need a JJ Pearl Harbor , folks ) ; and Jerome Hauer , a member of the Committee on the Present Danger , and “ an important figure in the linking of the 9/11 attacks and the anthrax attacks , ” who played the FEMA director . Once the NN ’s accusations against NNP Qaeda and Iraq fell apart but the Patriot Act had become law , NSA spying commenced , and the NN in Afghanistan proceeded apace , the NNP changed its tune and pursued the lone wolf perpetrator NN , RB accusing a scientist named Steven Hatfill and then , after he sued and eventually received $ 5.82 CD in compensation , they accused Bruce Ivins , a scientist working on an anthrax NN at Fort Derrick in Maryland . MacQueen shows in detail how that claim came apart and resulted in a NN without credibility but with Ivins committing suicide . But , he concludes , the Ivins accusation served its purpose of diverting attention from the real reason for the anthrax attacks and its culprits . Finally , MacQueen details how the anthrax evidence leads to some of the alleged 9/11 hijackers in Florida as they lay down a trail of incriminating “ evidence ” we were meant to follow , linking crop - dusters / anthrax to 9/11 . Mohamed Atta , the alleged 9/11 ringleader , supposedly went into a U.S. Department of Agriculture office seeking a $ 650,000 loan to buy and enlarge a crop-duster . He made sure the agent knew and MD spell his name , and when she balked at the loan , “ he asked what MD stop him from VBG IN her desk , cutting her throat , and taking the NN from the JJ safe in the office . ” He then admired a photo of Washington , D.C. , asked to buy it , inquired about security at the NNP Trade Center , implied he was associated with NNP Qaeda , and told her that Bin Laden “ ‘ MD someday be VBN as the NN ’s greatest leader . ’ “ MacQueen sardonically comments , “ And that is the story of how a terrorist leader , engaged in a top - secret operation , sought a NN loan to VB him with his plan . ” For CD familiar with Lee Harvey Oswald ’s ( or his double ’s ) antics to VB himself unforgettable on visits to a car dealership and a rifle range before JFK ’s assassination , the Atta charade should ring a bell . MacQueen makes a powerful NN that the various crop-duster incidents were “ disinformation ” and that their purpose was to link 9/11 to the anthrax attacks and , notably , to Iraq . He notes that it was RB at this NN that the fictitious story of Atta meeting with an Iraqi intelligence agent in Prague was widely circulated to “ solidify this connection . ” He argues that once the NNP admitted that the anthrax attacks were not a foreign operation but the claim had served its purpose , the crop - duster stories vanished into obscurity . However , he concludes , “ Given that the anthrax attacks were a domestic operation , and given that the alleged hijackers were implicated in that operation prior to its occurrence , the conclusion cannot be avoided : the 9/11 attacks were RB a domestic operation . ” But as few can forget , on February 5 , 2003 at the UN Security Council , the Iraq / anthrax / crop - duster claim arose from its sleep in the infamous , fraudulent presentation by Colin Powell as he slyly tied Iraq back to the anthrax attacks and shilled for NN against Iraq . That feat of propaganda was but CD of at least 532 occasions when eight top members of the Bush administration made at least 936 JJ statements on Iraq ’s possession of weapons of mass destruction and its links to NNP Qaeda , according to a NN conducted by The Center for NNP Integrity and the Fund for Independence in Journalism and released in 2008 . Anyone concerned about the NN behind 9/11 and the anthrax attacks should read this profoundly important book . It is filled with tight argumentation backed by solid evidence , and RB the speculative parts ring true . In closing I will mention MacQueen ’s fascinating penultimate chapter wherein he speculates about the significance of the repeated word “ unthinkable ” by the NN and NN officials following George W. Bush ’s NN of the term “ rethink the unthinkable ” in a NNP 1 , 2001 speech at the National Defense NNP . The mainstream NN VBD the word “ unthinkable ” repetitively throughout October 2001 when referring to the anthrax attacks . And CD of the early anthrax threatening letters sent to Tom Brokaw , begins : “ The Unthinkabel ” ( sic ) – showing , of course , how Muslim terrorists ca n’t spell English . “ There is a pattern here , ” MacQueen writes . Words matter , and those repeated enough matter more , words such as ground zero , homeland , and unthinkable . “ He who wants to persuade should not put his trust in the JJ argument , ” Joseph Conrad wrote in Lord Jim . “ The NN of sound has always been greater than the NN of sense . ” MacQueen has chosen sense through argument , and rather than dismissing his as unthinkable , thinking NNS everywhere should engage it . The 2001 anthrax letter attacks in the NNP NNPS killed five NNS and wounded dozens . They were widely blamed on extremist Muslims and their backers and VBN to support the invasions of Afghanistan and Iraq . They were RB VBN to justify and hasten the passage of the USA PATRIOT Act , which was being presented to Congress just as the JJ anthrax victim grew ill . In October 2001 , CD of the hypotheses that gained ground was that of the Double Perpetrator , the claim that NNP - Qaeda was carrying out the attacks with the support of Iraq . Much evidence was put forth to support this Double Perpetrator hypothesis but independent NNS soon discovered that the anthrax spores came from a domestic lab in the US serving the NN and intelligence communities , not from NNP - Qaeda or Iraq . The NNP then quickly claimed that an individual was responsible for the attacks and began noisily looking for this “ lone wolf . ” In 2008 the Bureau named Dr. Bruce Ivins of the US Army NNP Institute of Infectious NNP as the “ anthrax killer . ” Although the NNP remains committed to the Ivins hypothesis , the NN has been disintegrating for the last three NNS . Currently , it is justly held in contempt not merely by NNS who worked with Ivins but by JJ journalists as well as several US senators . But this raises the question : if Ivins did not commit this crime , who did ? This book presents evidence to support the following points : ( a) The anthrax attacks were carried out by a group of perpetrators , not by a “ lone wolf . ” The attacks were , therefore , the result of a NN — by definition a plan by CD or more NNS , made in secret and resulting in an immoral or illegal act . ( b) The group that carried out this crime consisted , in whole or in part , of insiders deep within the US NN apparatus . ( c) These insiders were the same NNS who planned the 9/11 attacks (d) The anthrax attacks were meant to facilitate a seizure of NN by the executive branch of NN through intimidation of Congress and US civil society . They were RB designed to achieve JJ acquiescence to and support for the redefinition of US foreign policy , replacing the Cold NNP with a JJ and aggressive JJ conflict framework , the JJ NN on Terror .

text: Does my daughter have NN ? Q : My daughter is CD NNS JJ . We got her checked for NN as she does not respond to her name and neither does she speak any word . Both of us are working due to which we are not able to interact with her at all ; hardly 5 - 10 minutes in the day . She stays with her grandparents who take care of her needs IN food , bath etc. but they do not interact with her either . She keeps watching TV all the NN . She has started doing things IN drinking NN from tumbler etc. only after learning it from TV . She does not respond to her name . Till now none of us call her by any particular name . We VBP different names or no name at all . She plays on her own , takes care of herself IN walking carefully on slippery floor or catching hold of railing while on steps . But she does not walk on slopes and if she does , she takes calculated steps . She does not have any eye contact with us . Though it has improved in last few days but is still minimal . She does not stick to CD toy for RB and soon gets bored of it . She does not speak any meaningful words IN mama or papa . She does not interact with any NNS of her own age group and we do n't VB if she will do so in future . She seems to VB older NNS ( 7 - 8 NNS JJ ) and tries to interact with them when she goes to the park - but walks off on her own if there is no immediate response from them . She does not try to interact or play with them . We showed her to a child specialist in Mumbai who advised a hearing test and a psychological test . Her hearing was normal but the psychological tests VBP that she has few autistic features . Hence her reaction MD be explained by lack of interaction and proper stimuli . Do we need to VB for another evaluation for NN ? If she indeed is autistic , then how to deal with this ? Is NN curable and will she be able to live a normal NN when she grows up ? Will she be dependent on someone in future ? A: The fact that your daughter has shown improvement with only a little stimulation from the NNS is very hopeful . Please ensure that you talk to her , looking at her and playing with her , when she is in the mood for it . It does seem a pity that she has spent CD NNS without much interaction with NNS or grandparents . Having TV on all the NN will just be noise , from the child 's point of view . Cut down her TV watching and give her things IN stuffed toys , building blocks and RB spoons and cups to play with and manipulate . Perhaps all four of you should agree on calling her by CD name , giving her a chance to develop an identity and a name . At this age , most NNS will move from CD activity to another . A short attention span by itself is not a NN for worry . It is good to hear that your daughter tries to VB contact with older NNS . Take her out to the park and to friends ' homes , where she can meet other NNS . VB her along if she is shy , but do not force her in any NN . Be inventive in capturing her interest . I VBP that story telling and reading from picture books will be good activities for the daily routine . Singing for her and with her will VB the home more lively for the little girl . Both NNS need to increase the NN spent with her . Your expressions of affection ( IN hugging her and holding her ) will give her a feeling of security . I VBP that cheerful and active interactions with the child will bring her close to the levels of speech and participation of other CD NN JJ NNS . Just to be sure that she has no special problem . You should consult a specialist in NN , if you continue to have the feeling that your child is not responsive .

text: Fact check : Melinda NNP did n't exactly VB Black NNS ' must ' be vaccinated for NN - CD The claim : Melinda NNP VBZ Black NNS must be vaccinated RB for NN - CD after NN care workers . Melinda NNP , philanthropist and co-founder of the Bill & Melinda NNP Foundation , VBZ that after NN care workers , Black NNS must be next in line for NN for NNP - CD , according to a story on Live24 . NNPS , in a NNP magazine interview on the eve of JJ NN summit in early June , discussed how anti-racism protests following the death of George Floyd , an African JJ NN , while in custody of Minneapolis police fits into NN equity , especially with NN of a NN - CD NN . " The JJ NNS that need this NN are the 60 CD NN care workers IN the NN . They deserve to VB it before anybody else . Then you start tiering , " 24 Live quoted NNP as saying in the NNP story , written by Jamie Ducharme . That quote matched the NN in NNP ( though Live24 incorrectly identified the magazine as a newspaper ) . But then , instead of continuing the direct quote , the Live24 piece paraphrased NNPS ' subsequent statement , writing , " Melinda went on to VB that Black NNS in the U.S. must be vaccinated after more than 60 CD NN care workers IN the NN . " The same headline was repeated by NNP Nut NNP , but attributed to NNP . The NNP interview did not quote NNP as saying Black NNS " must be " vaccinated after NN workers . Asked who needs NNS after NN care workers , NNPS told the magazine , " in the U.S. , that MD be Black NNS next , quite honestly , and JJ other NNS of color . " Related : Historic layoffs take biggest toll on Blacks , Latinos , NNS and the JJ " They are having disproportionate effects from NN - CD . From there , NNS with underlying NN conditions , and then NNS who are older . Those are the ones who all need it RB . We RB need to VB about essential workers who are keeping our grocery NNS open for us so we can buy food , or who are making sure that food moves through the warehouses . " Live24 did n't immediately respond to a request for comment on the NN it characterized NNPS ' statement . Asked about the Live24 article , the NNP Foundation directed USA TODAY to the NNP piece . The NNP Foundation VBD at the June 4 summit it will donate $ 1.6 CD over five NNS to Gavi , a JJ - private partnership that helps vaccinate half the NN 's NNS against NN . The foundation RB VBD in an JJ JJ release that it will donate $ 100 CD to a JJ Gavi effort to purchase NN - CD vaccinations for lower - income NNS so that " everyone who needs it can have access to it , starting with NN care workers and other high - NN populations . " The headline , " Melinda NNP VBZ Black NNS must be vaccinated RB for NNP - CD after NN care workers " is misleading . And it was repeated in the story . NNPS did VB , however , that Black NNS and " JJ other NNS of color " should be next in line for the NN after NN care workers . • NN magazine 's " Melinda NNP Lays Out Her Biggest Concern for the Next Phase of the NNP - CD NNP " • Live24's " Melinda NNP VBZ Black NNPS Must Be Vaccinated JJ For NNP - CD After NNP Care Workers " • The NNP Foundation : " Bill & Melinda NNP Foundation pledges $ 1.6 CD to Gavi , the NNP Alliance , to protect the next generation with lifesaving NNS " • Gavi , the NNP Alliance 's " NN leaders VBP historic commitments to provide equal access to NNS for all " Donnelle Eller covers agriculture , the environment and NN for the Register . text: For the fifth consecutive day , there are no JJ NNS of NN - CD NNS in NNP Zealand . It remains at 1,754 . And the total of confirmed and probable NNS is 1,404 . There is CD additional recovered NN and this total is now 1,462 and there are just 21 remaining active NNS of NN - CD . There are no additional deaths to report . And , currently , there is nobody in hospital with NNP - CD following the discharge of a NN from Middlemore Hospital . Yesterday , our laboratories processed 4,279 tests . So our grand total of tests undertaken to date in NNP Zealand is 267,435 . Just an update on the NZ NNP Tracer app , there are now 422,000 registrations on that - an increase of 17,000 since yesterday . Just to remind NNS , that RB registering , which provides your up - to - date contact details with the Ministry of NNP is incredibly helpful for both you and for us and our wider efforts . So I continue to encourage to download that app . There are now over 17,000 QR posters available in businesses IN NNP Zealand , representing that unique NNP Zealand business number and those are the ones that work with the NZ NNP Tracer app . We 're launching another app today called Āwhina for NN care and professional staff . It provides them with access to information on the updated NN definition , on local JJ pathways , and on guidance IN NN of personal protective equipment amongst other things . We 're very pleased to be able to provide that information to our NN professional workforce so it 's available on their mobile device and it is updated as it is updated on our NN . We 've worked on that app with feedback and input from NNS across the NN . Finally , on another important topic , back in alert level 4 , I certainly noticed , and you MD well have , there were JJ NNS out walking or cycling to VB some fresh NN and physical activity to break the monotony of being inside . With less traffic on the roads , I have to VB , it was both easy and very enjoyable . Now there is obviously more traffic on the road under alert level 2 , but I MD encourage NNS to still try and build in some physical activity into your days . I VBP it 's getting more difficult with shorter and colder days , especially those mornings , but if you can retain that physical activity and build it into your day , perhaps for local trips - whether it 's school , work or to the shops - that will VB you stay well over winter . What you MD notice is your local councils providing more NN for walking and cycling to VB it easier . I commend the councils for doing this . I strongly encourage NNS to VB the most of that . So we 'll cooperate - continue to work , as we have been , with the Ministry of Transport , IN the benefits of walking and cycling where there is NN - CD or not . NN : MD you be comfortable with the NN moving to level 1 earlier than a month away ? Dr Ashley Bloomfield : The advice we 've given , and this was the basis for the Cabinet discussion , and their decision on Monday was to RB of all to move the group side up to 100 and then -- size up to 100 and then remain in full alert level 2 for a period of CD weeks before moving to alert level 1 . But I 'm RB aware as the Prime Minister VBD on Monday they will be reconsidering the aLe letter level set -- alert level settings on June 2 . The ultimate decision remains with cabinet . NN : What why do we need to VB in alert level 2 for so RB ? Dr Ashley Bloomfield : The main thing is we need to be certain that the cumulative result of activities means our border procedures are safe and secure especially as contemplate to a possible move to a bubble with NNP and / or more NNS coming into the NN . NN : Have you seen Winston Peters this morning VBD we should be in level 1 already and have a Trans - Tasman bubble arranged ? MD that be a workable possibility at the moment ? Dr Ashley Bloomfield : I can't speak for the Deputy Prime Minister 's comments . What I can VB is that we are working hard on what alert level 1 will look IN . And RB separately , but obviously linked very hard with the airline industry , airports , foreign affairs and of course our counterparts in NNP , on what MD need to be in place to allow a Trans - Tasman bubble , the key thing is that MD require both NNS have confidence in the arrangement . NN : That MD be a no NN now , from today , tomorrow , immediate future ? Dr Ashley Bloomfield : As I VBP , it is work actively under NN but it MD require decisions of cabinets of both NNS before a Trans - Tasman bubble MD VB ahead . Our job is to provide RB good advice on what needs to be in place both in terms of the pattern of NNS in each NN but RB at the border and on flights to VB VB sure there was no NN of transmission of any NNS between NNS . NN : I understand that that mask - wearing has been completed . Is that the NN ? When was an announcement made ? Dr Ashley Bloomfield : There was a review of the scientific evidence and literature a couple of weeks RB , which is the NN on our NN . We have asked for further advice from our different technical advisory groups , including our overall technical advisory group . There is not a unanimous view on any of those groups but the weight of the rue is still that our current policy , which is not to either recommend or require widespread NN of masks , is the JJ NN at this point in NN . But we 're just finising -- finalising that . We will VB an updated statement available in the next day or CD . NN : Have you changed your position on wearing masks in places IN JJ transport ? Dr Ashley Bloomfield : No , we 're not . The NN of masks needs to be put in the context of the situation we 're in RB now , alert level 2 VBG to alert level 1 with a record fifth day in - a - row with no JJ NNS and no evidence of community transmission . That 's the evidence that will keep NNS safe along with physical distancing . NN : Some VBP they MD VB to VB international students who VBP to VB at the NNP of Auckland 's NNP School to be able to enter the NN . Do you VB it 's safe to have some students come in if they 're paying to stay at hostels ? Dr Ashley Bloomfield : This is a piece of work under NN , discussions are happening , we 're involved in them , led by our education colleagues . The key thing is , any group coming into the NN - there 's been publicity about some particular NNS with particular skills who 've come in over the last few weeks under a special exemptions policy , anyone who comes into the NN needs to do so in a NN that complies with that 14 - day self or managed isolation , except in very rare circumstances we can be very confident the NN is low . Yes , that does open up the option of international students coming into the NN and we MD need to VB sure that all the arrangements were in place to do so safely . NN : What alert level will the NN have to be at for you to feel comfortable to establish a Trans - Tasman bubble ? Dr Ashley Bloomfield : I VBP that 's depend on both governments deciding the risks are able to be managed within an appropriate process . I VBP the VBD this on Monday - it is not dependent on us being in alert level 1 but dependent on decision - makers in both NNS agreeing to it . NN : VBG back to allowing NNS back into the NN , MD you still recommend they stay at hotels in Christchurch or Auckland or MD you envisage a NN they MD self - isolate at home as we did before ? Dr Ashley Bloomfield : At this point in NN , because the border is so important for us to keep the infection out of the NN , we 're maintaining the position that it requires , either , quarantine or supervised isolation at CD of the facilities that are setup in Auckland or Christchurch . NN : Is is this the JJ NN -- is this the JJ NN there 's been no - CD in hospital for NNP - CD since the NN lockdown began ? Dr Ashley Bloomfield : I VBP it is , absolutely , yes , we 've had a number of NNS in hospital . Never a JJ number but I VBP this is the JJ NN in a couple of months we have n't had someone in hospital . That 's another good position to be in . NN : Yesterday you spoke a bit about exemptions you signed off on . Do you sign off on them all ? How JJ have you signed off on for NNS in the screen industry ? Dr Ashley Bloomfield : The ones in screen industry I do n't sign - off on . They 're signed off by Minister Twyford and they 're related to specific commercial ventures . The very small number I sign off on are IN workers with very particular skills , IN there were some engineers in Europe what came to fix the so - called " poo " pipe here in Wellington . And CD I mentioned yesterday who is here to repair X - ray machines . The ones about commercial ventures are not something I sign off on . However , they have to comply with the very strict JJ NN measures in place for earn else . They -- everyone else . They require the 14 - day quarantine period . NN : Do you VB how JJ have been signed off on ? Dr Ashley Bloomfield : In the latter category ? REPORTER : In both . Dr Ashley Bloomfield : I 've signed off on in a handful . I should VB those are NNS who do n't need to do the 14 - day quarantine , assuming they 've fulfilled a number of requirements . In the NN of the other group , it 's somewhere between CD and 200 but Minister Twyford is the NN who will VB the exact numbers there . NN : On that point of allowing further NNS in , some of the arrangements that these NNS are quarantining overseas rather than quarantining when they VBP here ? Dr Ashley Bloomfield : Not at this point in NN . But that is something we are looking at . You MD need to be comfort in the quarantine arrangements in the - at the destination , where they 're coming from - sorry , at the point of where they 're coming from and be confident they were following the same strict JJ NN measures we have in place here . It is something we 're looking at a possibility . NN : Is that something we MD move to of sort of there being a visa or something requirement and proof that they have managed to self - isolate and / or quarantine in their NN of residence before coming to NNP Zealand and then they MD VB straight into their role ? Dr Ashley Bloomfield : Yes , that 's absolutely an option . Another option - we 're seeing some NNS do this - is requiring testing before NNS depart from their departure point in a timely NN . Both those are options . But at this point in NN , we 're not using either of those options but they are options for the future . NN : Note that the NN 's response to PPE requests internationally is currently no , can you VB which NNS have asked for NN with PPE ? Dr Ashley Bloomfield : No , I do n't VB which NNS have asked that but we can provide that information . NN : You MD have seen NNS wearing makeshift masks over the mouth , nose area . Does that offer any value for NNS taking those measures ? Dr Ashley Bloomfield : I 'm not discouraging NNS from doing it . If you 're VBG to VB a mask or face covering , VB how to do that safely . It makes it RB more careful to VB careful hand hygiene . Because that 's where the potential for using face masks can be , with touching inanimate objects and then touching the face . We have done reviews where NN care staff MD have got infected from - on more than CD occasion we VBP it is from contaminated surfaces RB though they were wearing full PPE . I can't overstate the importance of NNS using good hand hygiene whether using a face covering or not . NN : Are you happy with where testing numbers are at ? It 's dropped off over the last couple of days . Is that to be expected ? Dr Ashley Bloomfield : RB of all , we always VBP a drop over the weekend and that tends to flow through into the Monday and Tuesday numbers . It 's coming up again , I VBP , today . We were 4,279 tests processed yesterday . Yes , we will expect to VB the numbers come down because - for CD reasons . RB of all , through the last couple of months we 've been testing for NNS with NNS . We continue to do that , and that is that the vast majority of the testing that 's happening . Anyone who fits that NN information on our NN , which is very broad still . But secondly , we were doing a lot of testing to try and identify if there was any hidden NN out there in the community . Now that it 's clear it's not , we 'll be shifting the focus for that testing to the border because that 's the area where we 'll have the most NN . There is a very specific plan being developed IN that which CD it has been through cabinet and approved will become in operation from 8 June . It is testing NNS and looking for any breach at the border with more testing there . NN : Because of our success in tackling NN - CD , is it VBG to affect our chances if there 's a NN created internationally , will it affect our chances of getting the NN if we 're a NN as seen as doing well and does n't need it as badly as other NNS ? Dr Ashley Bloomfield : I should n't VB so . It 's still a JJ NN off , for a start . Secondly , as you will have seen in the NN strategy that was publicised earlier in the week we have a number of irons in the fire there to VB sure that we have access to a NN as soon as PRP 's available , and RB planning for making sure that we can vaccinate our population . NN : Following on what you were saying there , JJ testing at the borders , does that mean we MD VB more NNS coming through the borders ? Dr Ashley Bloomfield : Ah , regardless of whether we 're seeing more NNS coming through the borders what we 're looking at is whether we routinely test everyone coming through the border at some point during their quarantine period . But RB , it 's about testing of NNS who are working at the border , either at airports or ports , or in those quarantine facilities . So that will be where the focus of our asymptomatic testing will be . NN : Back to masks , where does the discrepancy lie at the moment ? Dr Ashley Bloomfield : There are a range of views whether widespread mask VBP whether on JJ transport or in other JJ settings by the general NN is worth doing from a sense of that the benefits outweigh the potential risks at this point in NN . But it 's just CD of those things that 's under active conversation . NN : CD question from our sports NN . The Tokyo Olympics have been postponed to the middle of next NN . Do you VB a NN MD be ready by that NN , and do you VB the Olympics should VB ahead if there is n't a NN and you are VBG to have thousands of athletes RB ? Dr Ashley Bloomfield : I 'm prepared to answer most questions but I do n't VB I can offer any sound insights into that particular issue . I 'm sorry . OK . Thank you very much , everybody .

text: There are 102 candidate NNS being explored as a means of ending the NN - CD NN , as of April 30 . Eight of these have already made it to JJ NNS in NNS , and another 94 are in the pre-clinical evaluation stage . These candidates RB fall into eight different categories of NN NN strategy that are being explored . While it still does n’t guarantee success , this is in effect the biological equivalent of hedging our bets in the hope that CD of the strategies will pay off . But if and when a successful NN is VBN , we still have to manufacture enough of it to immunise huge numbers of NNS all IN the NN . And how RB this will take , and what is involved , will depend on which strategy is VBN to work , because different NNS are made in different ways . Despite arguments about lack of preparedness concerning PPE and testing , the UK has been on the front NN when it comes to identifying suitable candidate NNS . It is leading the charge to ramp up production , having invested more than any other NN in doing so , according to the NN secretary , Matt Hancock . The UK’s CD leading candidate NNS , being developed by the NNP of Oxford and Imperial College London respectively , both VBP very different approaches that were already under investigation in the lab for other NNS . Oxford ’s candidate , ChAdOx1 nCoV - CD , uses a genetically modified chimpanzee adenovirus as a “ vector ” to carry the genetic sequence of a NN from the NN - CD NN to the JJ NN . The NN can then learn to recognise the NN and start producing antibodies to fight it . This is the same technique the NN previously developed for the closely related Mers NN , which showed promise in NN and early - stage JJ testing . RB NN NN takes NNS , but JJ JJ NNS for the Oxford NN candidate are underway , just three months after the genetic sequence of the NN was released for NN . This is thanks to a specialist adenovirus NN platform adapted as part of work by the EPSRC UCL - Oxford Future NNP NNP Research Hub ( Vax Hub ) , as well as next - generation gene sequencing methods that have enabled the NN to proceed at breakneck speed . Pharmaceutical NN AstraZeneca has announced it will develop , manufacture and distribute the NN ( if it ’s successful ) IN the NN . But to do this , it will need to find a NN to scale up production without critically affecting the supply of other vital NNS . JJ NN facilities are adept at producing millions of NN doses against influenza , NNS and polio . They have strategies in place to step up production at times of increased demand , such as for the annual winter NN NN . But we are in unprecedented times , and the JJ demand for a safe and effective NN NN will be on a scale never before seen , likely resulting in key production and distribution bottlenecks . NN production requires complex NN processes involving the production of living organisms that , in turn , generate the genetically - modified NN on which the NN is VBN . And we must VB the NN NN . These NNS will be administered to healthy NNS to generate immunity to the NN . Any faults MD VB their safety and a JJ - term loss of JJ confidence . But there is NN for cautious optimism . As we await the JJ NN outcomes for the Oxford NN , behind the scenes there has been a flurry of activity to adapt existing NN technologies and processes to VB the adenovirus vector it relies on . The NN process for the Oxford NN will begin by encoding the NN NN NN into the adenovirus vector . “ Producer NNS ” , RB JJ embryonic kidney ( HEK ) NNS , will then be VBN as mini-factories to produce the vector particles . The producer NNS will be grown at scale in a bioreactor , a vessel that tightly controls the JJ conditions to optimise NN growth . The NNS will then be put through a series of steps to purify and concentrate the final adenovirus vector , including filtration and centrifugation ( spinning it very fast in order to separate different particles ) . Finally , the solution will be formulated into a usable product and kept stable by storing it between 2 °C and 8°C . However , the final concentration of the solution can vary significantly , and it is the lack of an effective NN process to resolve this problem that limits current production on a mass scale . This will be the significant challenge AstraZeneca will face in translating the lab - VBN Oxford process to something akin to industrial NN . Of course , all these efforts will only come into play if the Oxford NN ( or potentially another in the same category ) is VBN to work . Other NN candidates , such as that being developed by Imperial , will require a substantially different NN process . In these unprecedented times , the NN ’s NN experts will have to work with unprecedented speed and innovation to deliver a NN to save potentially millions of lives and start returning society to normal .

text: Full details have been confirmed for the NME Spotify Signing Tent at this weekend ’s Reading and Leeds Festivals . Following the successful launch of the NME app within Spotify , we ’re teaming up once again to VB our annual festival signing tents better than ever . And so far The NNPS , Paramore and Enter Shikari have confirmed to meet fans up close and personal . While you ’re there , be sure to take the most outlandish object you can VB of for the bands to sign , and the best will VB the magazine next week . Tweet or Instagram your pictures to # NMEreading and # NMEleeds . And after you ’ve been to meet your favourite band , be sure to head over to our dedicated hub where you ’ll be able to view , download and share photos taken by an NME photographer and listen to Spotify playlists made by the bands themselves . The Reading and Leeds Festivals take place this weekend ( August 24 - 26 ) at Little John ’s Farm in Reading and Bramham Park in Leeds . The full line - up confirmed so far for the NME Spotify Signing Tent is : Friday Reading / Saturday Leeds Band Lucy Rose The Blackout Saves The Day Coheed And Cambria Paramore The Subways The Hives Spector Sunday Reading / Friday Leeds Tribes All NN Low Pulled Apart By Horses The View Howler Eagles Of Death Metal Band Of Skulls To a read the ultimate Reading And Leeds Festivals preview , pick up the JJ issue of NME , which is on newsstands now or available digitally .

text: NN sources out of NNP Zealand are reporting that CD nurses in Samoa , facing charges over the deaths of CD babies who died shortly after receiving the NNS , mumps , and rubella ( MMR ) NN , have pleaded guilty to manslaughter . CD nurses in Samoa , facing charges over the deaths of CD babies , have pleaded guilty to manslaughter . They had previously denied charges of negligence , manslaughter , and obstruction of justice . The pair appeared today in the Supreme NNP for the start of an expected CD week NN , but their lawyer entered guilty pleas . CD defendant , Luse Emo Tauvale , has admitted to three charges of obstruction of justice and CD of negligence and manslaughter , while Leutogi Te’o has pleaded guilty to CD charge of manslaughter . NNP Impact NNP reported on the original story in 2018 when it made headline NN on TV1 in Samoa . Tala Fou brings you breaking NN on the death of CD JJ NNS both aged 1 - NN - JJ from the villages of Safotu and Sasina in Savaii . Both NNS died within minutes of being vaccinated with the MMR vacine at Safotu Hospital on Friday morning the 6th of July . Our NN Reporter Alisa Faamaoni met with both families in Savaii today . The NNS of the JJ child Marietta and Samuelu Tuisuesue of Sasina explained in detail to Tala Fou that within three minutes of their 1 - NN - JJ daughter Lannacallystah Samuelu being injected with the MMR vacine by a nurse she was dead . • CDC , check YOUR NNS , MMR rates are NOT declining What was so tragic about this story was that the NNS of the second child who died had reportedly already learned about the JJ infant ’s death a couple hours earlier and declined to have their child receive the same NN . The mother reported that the nurse administered the MMR NN against her consent , leading to the child ’s immediate death upon receiving the NN . The second family from Safotu is still coming to grips with the loss of their 1 - NN - JJ son Lameko Siu . The NNS Punipuao and Si’u Timua arrived at the Safotu hospital with their son Lameko on Friday within CD hours of the death of the JJ child once they became aware of what had happend the mother refused to allow her son to be vaccinated . The mother claims that the nurse on duty persisted and without her consent vaccinated her son administering the MMR NN and within a minute he was dead . After the second death , NN authorities immediately confiscated all the remaining doses of the MMR NN , and dismissed the JJ staff , not only to apparently conduct an investigation , but for their own safety from an outraged NN . The Prime Minister of Samoa , Tuilaepa Aiono Sailele Malielegaoi , issued a statement about the tragic events and reported that , as a grandfather , CD of his grandsons had previously suffered something similar , an apparent NN injury that he survived but now can no longer talk . Death leaves a heartache no NN can heal . And I can imagine that there is no NN more far reaching and deeper than losing a child . My heart and prayers VBP out to the grieving families at this most difficult NN . To that effect , I humbly extend my deepest sympathy , condolences and pray that comfort and peace will come to them . As a grandfather and father , I can relate to the grief by the families for their loss . I RB almost lost CD of my grandsons several NNS RB under similar circumstances . But with the Grace of our Father in Heaven my grandson survived with the proper NN but he will never be the same as he has lost the ability to speak . As Prime Minister , I have called a full inquiry into the circumstances leading up to this devastating incident which I do not take lightly . There are already processes that will determine if negligence is a factor . And if so , rest assured those processes will be implemented to the letter to ensure that such a tragedy will not be repeated and those responsible will be made to answer . A Prime Example Why Informed Consent and Parental Rights are Important , and How Forced Vaccinations Endanger the Lives of NNS NNS carry serious risks , and RB the U.S. Supreme NNP has acknowledged these risks by stating that NNS are “ Unavoidably unsafe . ” All across the U.S. pro-vaccine extremists are trying to eliminate NN exemptions and parental choice for NNS . A recent bill passed in Oregon RB gave dentists the NN to vaccinate NNS , as the NN extremists push the agenda of NNP Pharma to try and vaccinate the entire NN , regardless of whether or not some NNS are more susceptible to NN injuries than others . And in California Senator Richard Pan wants California to be the JJ NN in the U.S. to eliminate RB the JJ exemption for NNS , where physicians can best determine whether their patients should receive every NN recommended by the CDC in the childhood NN schedule . Pan wants the politicians , the NN Department of NNP NNP , to approve any JJ exemption to NNS instead of JJ doctors who provide JJ services to California NNS , and their NNS . Of course when NNS die or are injured by NNS in the NNP NNPS , there is no NN attention and JJ outcry IN there was in Samoa . That ’s because the U.S. is the only NN in the NN that has given the pharmaceutical industry immunity from legal consequences due to harm caused by NNS . text: Dr. Stephen Thomas , who helped develop NN candidates for NNS such as Ebola , Zika and MERS , discusses the challenges involved in accelerating NN during a NN . When I served in the U.S. Army as a physician - scientist , I was assigned to Thailand , and there is CD patient I remember vividly . He was only about 8 NNS JJ , lived on a farm in the northern part of the NN , and was in the hospital with a serious brain infection . His infection was caused by the Japanese encephalitis NN ( JEV ) , which he ’d caught from a mosquito . If he survived , he was destined to live his NN with severe and debilitating neurologic abnormalities . RB worse – this tragedy MD have been avoided . Thailand had a safe and effective JEV NN and worked extremely hard to routinely immunize all its NNS , but this child had been missed . The heartbreaking situation reminded me what my friend and mentor , Dr. Bruce Innis , told me as I embarked on a career in NN NN , “ NNS do n’t save lives , NN saves lives . ” He should VB , Dr. Innis has helped successfully develop more than 15 NNS , including the JEV NN licensed in the U.S . Developing NNS is a complex process driven by the fundamentals of biology , biomanufacturing and engineering , and innovation . NN concepts are explored , and prototypes RB tested in the lab . NNS then test the safety of the NN on NNS and , if results are promising , JJ NNS involving NNS begin . It can take NNS to develop a NN , and something that works well in the lab MD not fare as well in NNS . We need to keep this JJ , complicated , uncertain process in mind as we hear NN emerge about NN candidates for the NNP - CD NN . The U.S. Food and NNP Administration reviews and decides whether a NN candidate is suitable for experimentation in NNS . Although the agency does consider the results of NN studies , much of its review focuses on how the NN is manufactured , and whether the process is scalable . NN at scale ( hundreds of millions of doses ) is important because it is not enough to demonstrate a NN is safe and has JJ benefit , you need a NN in place to VB sure the NN is accessible , and NNS are actually vaccinated . The entire process can take up to ten NNS , sometimes longer , and can cost up to a CD U.S. dollars , sometimes more .
