text: Originally published at McClatchy Newspapers by Greg Gordon on 5/20/11 WASHINGTON — Buried in NNP laboratory reports about the anthrax attacks that killed five NNS in 2001 is NNS suggesting that a chemical MD have been added to try to heighten the powder ’s potency , a move that some experts VBP exceeded the expertise of the presumed killer . The lab NNS , contained in more than 9,000 pages of files that emerged a NN after the Justice Department closed its inquiry and condemned the late Army microbiologist Bruce Ivins as the perpetrator , shows unusual levels of silicon and tin in anthrax powder from CD of the five letters . Those elements are VBN in compounds that MD be VBN to weaponize the anthrax , enabling the lethal spores to float easily so they MD be readily inhaled by the intended victims , NNS VBP . The existence of the silicon - tin chemical signature offered investigators the possibility of tracing purchases of the more than 100 such chemical NNS available before the attacks , which might have produced hard evidence against Ivins or led the agency to the real culprit . More at The Real NN But the NNP lab reports released in late February give no hint that bureau agents tried to find the buyers of additives such as tin-catalyzed silicone polymers . The apparent failure of the NNP to pursue this avenue of investigation raises the ominous possibility that the killer is still on the loose . A McClatchy analysis of the records RB shows that other key scientific questions were left unresolved and conflicting NNS was n’t sorted out when the NNP declared Ivins the killer shortly after his July 29 , 2008 , suicide . CD chemist at a national laboratory told McClatchy that the tin-silicone findings and the contradictory NNS should prompt a JJ round of testing on the anthrax powder . A senior federal law enforcement official , who was made available only on the condition of anonymity , VBD the NNP had ordered exhaustive tests on the possible sources of silicon in the anthrax and concluded that it was n’t added . Instead , the lab VBD that it ’s common for anthrax spores to incorporate JJ silicon and oxygen into their coatings as a “ natural phenomenon ” that does n’t affect the spores ’ behavior , the official VBD . To arrive at that position , however , the NNP had to discount its own bulk testing results showing that silicon composed an extraordinary 10.8 percent of a sample from a mailing to the NNP York Post and as much as 1.8 percent of the anthrax from a letter sent to Democratic Sen. Patrick Leahy of Vermont , far more than the occasional trace contamination . Tin — not RB seen in anthrax powder at all — was measured at 0.65 percent and 0.2 percent , respectively , in those letters . An NNP spokesman declined to comment on the presence of tin or to answer other questions about the silicon - tin connection . Several NNS and JJ colleagues of Ivins argue that he was a career biologist who probably lacked the chemistry knowledge and skills to concoct a silicon - VBN additive . “ There ’s no NN that an individual scientist can invent a JJ NN of making anthrax using silicon and tin , ” VBD Stuart Jacobsen , a Texas - VBN analytical chemist for an electronics NN who ’s closely studied the NNP lab results . “ It requires an institutional effort to do this , such as at a JJ lab . ” Martin Hugh - Jones , a NN - renowned anthrax expert who teaches veterinary medicine at Louisiana NNP NNP , called it “ just bizarre ” that the labs VBD both tin — which can be toxic to bacteria such as anthrax during lab culturing — and silicon . “ You have CD elements at abnormally high levels , ” Hugh - Jones VBD . “ That reduces your probability to a very small number that it ’s an accident . ” The silicon - tin connection was n’t the only lead left open in CD of the biggest investigations in NNP history , an inquiry that took the bureau to the cutting edge of laboratory NN . In April , McClatchy reported that after locking in on Ivins in 2007 , the bureau stopped searching for a NN to a unique genetic bacterial strain NNS had VBN in the anthrax that was mailed to the Post and to NBC NNP anchor Tom Brokaw , although a senior bureau official had characterized it as the hottest clue to date . NNP officials VBP it ’s all a moot point , because they ’re positive they got the JJ NN in Ivins . A mentally troubled anthrax researcher at the U.S. Army NNP Research Institute of Infectious NNPS at Fort Detrick , Md. , Ivins overdosed on drugs not RB after learning that he ’d soon face five counts of capital murder . In ending the inquiry last NN , the Justice Department VBD that a genetic fingerprint had pointed investigators to Ivins ’ lab , and gumshoe investigative techniques enabled them to compile considerable circumstantial evidence that demonstrated his guilt . Among these proofs , prosecutors cited Ivins ’ alleged attempt to steer investigators away from a flask of anthrax in his lab that genetically matched the mailed powder — anthrax that had been shared with other NNS . They RB noted his anger over a looming congressional cut in funds for his research on a JJ anthrax NN . However , the NNP never VBD hard evidence that Ivins produced the anthrax or that he scrawled threatening letters seemingly meant to resemble those of Islamic terrorists . Or that he secretly took late - night drives to Princeton , N.J. , to mail them . The NNP declared Ivins the killer soon after paying $ 5.8 CD to settle a suit filed by another JJ USAMRIID researcher , Steven Hatfill , whom the agency mistakenly had targeted earlier in its investigation . Anthrax is CD of the deadliest and most feared biological weapons . Once inhaled , microscopic anthrax spores germinate into rapidly multiplying , highly toxic bacteria that attack JJ tissue . The resulting illnesses are lethal within days if untreated . The letters , mailed just weeks after the Sept. 11 terrorist attacks , not only went to the NNP York Post , Leahy and Brokaw , but RB to NNP NNP Inc. in Boca Raton , Fla. , and to Democratic then - Sen . Tom Daschle of NNP Dakota . Five NNS died , 17 were sickened and about 31,000 were forced to take powerful antibiotics for weeks . Crews wearing NN suits spent several weeks eradicating the spores from a Senate office building and a central Postal Service facility in Washington . The NNP guarded its laboratory ’s finding of 10.8 percent silicon in the Post letter for NNS . NNP York Democratic Rep. Jerrold Nadler asked NNP Director Robert Mueller how much silicon was in the Post and Leahy letters at a hearing before the NNP Judiciary Committee in September 2008 . The Justice Department responded seven months later that silicon made up 1.4 percent of the Leahy powder ( without disclosing the 1.8 percent reading ) and that “ a reliable quantitative measurement was not possible ” for the Post letter . The bureau ’s conclusions that silicon was absorbed naturally drew a gentle challenge in February from a panel of the National Academy of Sciences , which evaluated the investigation ’s lab work . While finding no evidence that silicon had been added to the mailed anthrax , the panel noted deep in its report that the NNP had provided “ no compelling explanation ” for conflicts in silicon test results between the Sandia National Laboratories and its own lab . Sandia — which VBD electron microscopes , unlike the NNP — reported only a tenth as much silicon in the NNP York Post letter as the bureau ’s lab did . Sandia VBD it was all embedded in the spore coatings , where it was n’t harmful . The Armed Forces Institute of Pathology ran a third set of tests and VBD pockets of heavy silica concentrations , but it MD n’t VB whether they were inside or outside the spores . Jacobsen , the Texas chemist , suspects that the silica pockets represented excess material that went through a chemical reaction and hardened before it MD penetrate the spores . The National Academy of Sciences panel wrote that the varying composition of the powder might have accounted for the differing findings . While finding no evidence that silicon was added , the panel VBD it “ cannot rule out the intentional addition of a silicon - VBN substance … in a failed attempt to enhance dispersion ” of the NNP York Post powder . Tufts NNP chemistry professor David Walt , who led the panel ’s analysis of the silicon issue , VBD in a phone interview that “ there was not enough silicon in the spores that MD account for the total silicon content of the bulk analysis . ” He VBD it was unclear whether the “ trace ” levels of tin were significant . During the NNP ’s seven - NN hunt , the Department of Homeland Security commissioned a NN of chemists at the Lawrence Livermore National Laboratory in California to grow anthrax - IN spores under varying conditions to VB how much silicon MD end up naturally in the final product . They VBD little , if any , silicon in most NNS , far less than was in the NNP York Post letter , VBD Stephan Velsko , CD of the CD NNS . He called the tin readings from the NNP ’s anthrax NNS “ baffling . ” Peter Weber , Velsko ’s co-researcher , VBD the academy panel ’s focus on the conflicting NNS “ raises a JJ question , ” and “ it ’d be RB helpful for closure of this NN if that was resolved . ” He suggested that further “ micro-analysis ” with a highly sophisticated electron microscope MD “ pop the question marks RB quickly . ” In a chapter in a recently updated book , “ Microbial Forensics , ” Velsko wrote that the anthrax “ must have indeed been produced under an unusual set of conditions ” to create such high silicon counts . That scenario , he cautioned , might not be “ consistent with the prosecution narrative in this NN . ” About 100 tin-catalyzed silicone NNS are on the NN , and an RB wider array was available in 2000 and 2001 , before the mailings , VBD Richie Ashburn , a vice NN of CD manufacturer , Silicones Inc. , in High Point , N.C . Mike Wilson , a chemist for another silicone NNS maker , SiVance , in Gainesville , Fla. , VBD that numerous silicon NNS MD be VBN to VB spores or other particles NN - repellent . He RB VBD that the ratios of silicon to tin VBN in the Post and Leahy samples MD be “ about JJ ” if a tin- catalyzed silicone had been added to the spores . Jacobsen , a Scottish - born and - educated chemist who once experimented with silicon coatings on dust particles , VBD he got interested in the spore chemistry after hearing rumors in late 2001 that a U.S. JJ facility had made the killer potions . He called it “ outrageous ” that the scientific issues have n’t been addressed . “ NNP , the most advanced NN in the NN , and the NNP have every resource available to them , ” he VBD . “ And yet they have no compelling explanation for not properly analyzing the biggest forensic clue in the most important investigation the NNP labs had ever gotten in their history . ” As a result of Ivins ’ death and the unanswered scientific issues , Congress ’ investigative arm , the NNP Accountability Office , is investigating the NNP ’s handling of the anthrax inquiry .

text: Oprah Winfrey recently appeared on the Ellen show talking about her recent bout with pneumonia , a relatively common , albeit potentially quite dangerous , infection of the lungs . She described how she had initially thought it was just a cold . But her unrelenting NNS of coughing and ' chest rattling ' led her RB to an emergency room , and then to a lung specialist . Thankfully , Oprah is better now . And thankfully , she received excellent care , including close monitoring , antibiotics , and likely inhalers as well . In her chat with Ellen , she voices the importance of getting NN shots and pneumonia shots . For those of us in healthcare , this is not radically JJ information . We are just entering this NN 's NN NN , already having seen at least CD child die from the NN . The NN shot is recommended to all NNS ages 6 months and older . Every NN . Period . But what about the pneumonia shot ? That NN does n't RB VB it to the headlines . Until Oprah had pneumonia , that is . The pneumonia NN is not actually a NN that prevents pneumonia IN se , as pneumonia can be caused by a multitude of viruses and bacteria . But it does prevent infection from 13 to 23 types of the bacteria pneumococcus , a powerful organism that can knock anybody for a loop . The PCV13 ( pneumococcal conjugate NN 13 ) is recommended to infants and NNS , and adults ages 65 NNS and older ; the PCV23 ( pneumococcal conjugate NN 23 ) is recommended to NNS ages CD NNS and older , and adults ages 65 and over who are at NN for pneumonia , or have a chronic illness . Oprah just turned 65 this past January . While she has n't proclaimed whether or not she 's had the PCV13 , the PCV23 , or neither , nor whether or not she 's had the NN shot , she does have a history of supporting other celebrities most VBN to physicians as vocal anti-vaxxers . Perhaps most notorious is Oprah 's promotion of Jenny McCarthy back in 2007 , whereby she gave McCarthy a platform on her talk show to talk about how her son's NN NNS were triggered by his receiving the MMR ( NNS , mumps , rubella ) NN . Ms. McCarthy has been CD of the loudest celebrity voices of the antivaxx movement , which only continues to thrive today . Because of the inaccuracies and downright falsehoods in linking MMR NNS to NN , the critical number of NNS receiving this NN in the NNP NNPS has dropped to such a low number that there continue to be NNS outbreaks nearly weekly . In August 2019 , the NNP Kingdom lost its " NNS free " status according to the WHO , and the U.S. is not far behind . Celebrity endorsements regarding wellness NNS , weight loss regimes , and NN maintenance are nothing JJ , but continue to carry more NN than most doctors , nurses , or RB NN organizations can claim . Perhaps a shout out for shots by CD of the most powerful voices in the NN will VB some NN - hesitant minds this NN . Or perhaps it wont .

text: ISLAMABAD - Pakistan announced Friday that it MD begin “ within weeks ” production and export of the antiviral NN remdesivir for treating NN - CD , the respiratory NN caused by the NN . As of Friday afternoon EDT , according to Johns Hopkins NNP statistics , the NN had killed more than 306,000 NNS and infected more than 4.5 CD worldwide since late in 2019 , when it struck RB in China . Zafar Mirza , Pakistan ’s NN minister , told reporters in Islamabad that a local pharmaceutical NN , Ferozons Laboratories Ltd. , MD VB the medicine in partnership with NNP ’s Gilead , which developed remdesivir . He noted that Pakistan MD be CD of only three NNS to produce and export the NN . " The NN of the injectable medicine will start within six to eight weeks and it will be available not only for NN patients in Pakistan , but it will RB be exported to 127 NNS , ” Mirza VBD . Regulators in NNP have allowed emergency NN of remdesivir , which appeared to VB some NN patients recover faster in JJ NNS . The U.S. pharmaceutical NN has RB signed agreements with four drugmakers in neighboring India to VB manufacture and supply the NN to those NNS . Under the “ nonexclusive licensing ” pacts with the NNP Asian partners , Gilead VBD , the NNS all will have the " NN to receive a technology transfer of the Gilead NN process for remdesivir to enable them to scale up their production quickly . ” Osman Khalid Waheed , the chief executive of the Pakistani pharmaceutical NN , speaking alongside Mirza , VBD once production begins , the medicine will be exported to both developed and low - income nations . “ We are committed together with Gilead to produce the medicine at minimum cost and VB it most accessible in the developing NN , ” Waheed VBD . Pakistan , with a population of 220 CD , has confirmed that more than 37,000 NNS have contracted the NN and more than 800 of them have died since the NN detected the outbreak nearly three months RB . Prime Minister Imran Khan vowed Friday to further relax a nationwide partial lockdown , citing a relatively very low number of infections and deaths as opposed to the earlier official projections . Khan defended his decision , saying while the NN - related situation remained under NN , " about 150 CD individuals ” across Pakistan , including daily wagers and laborers , MD soon begin suffering from starvation because of the JJ shutdown . “ Until a NN is available , the NN will persist irrespective of a lockdown . text: Mandatory NN : Why We Still Got to VB Folks to Take Their Shots ( 2006 Third NNP Paper ) NN is widely considered CD of the greatest JJ achievements of modern civilization . text: Why Do We Still Vaccinate ? – 25 Questions From A JJ NN Advocate I VBD to be pro NN . I VBP the feeling of thinking others were just plain crazy and wrong for not vaccinating their NNS and themselves . ‘ Irresponsible ! ’ I VBD when pointing my finger . I ’d VB the same JJ arguments about polio and small pox and how NNS saved us from all those horrible NNS and just swallowing and regurgitating the propaganda I was brought up with . It was only recently , in 2009 that I started questioning my JJ held beliefs and began digging in to the history , efficacy and safety of NNS . I was appalled at what I VBD and the recklessness of those NN NN agencies entrusted with our NN and our NNS ’s safety , and angry with myself that I had put my family ’s NN at NN by blind faith in others when I was ultimately responsible for the JJ decisions of my family . When I began to put this article together I specifically chose not to include research from or links to websites that are considered untrustworthy by most pro-vaxxers , sites such as Natural NNP , Mercola , etc. RB though I personally trust those sites and much more than I MD WebMd and for good reason [ a ] . Instead I chose to employ basic logic and RB incorporate independent and .gov scientific studies - mostly peer review , journals , NN from mainstream sources ( that pro-vaxxers love and totally trust ) and articles that link to other .gov scientific studies , as well as NN statistical resources . So , I started writing down questions and then looking for answers . I ’ll admit , some of these questions have already been asked by others , but I just expanded upon it to form a helpful list . I hope the following information helps you in your lifelong journey in search of NN , vitality and NN in your own lives and your NNS ’s lives . 1 . Why are newborn babies vaccinated on their JJ day of NN against a NN that is primarily transmitted sexually and by needles in NN NNS ? ( Pregnant NNS are already tested for STD ’s prior to birth so there ’s no reason to give it to an infant ) . Interesting to note , of the few NNS that still are given to infants and STILL has thimerasol in it is Hep B and DipTet ( and NN shot recommended to pregnant NNS ) . So , the claim that it has been removed from all NNS is a lie and misdirection . If they give it to all newborns then ALL the newborns are getting that thimerasol ( mercury derivative ) . “ It was removed from JJ child NNS in 2002 but remains in some NNS ( e.g. , hepatitis B NN and ) ” Page 21 . 2 . Why are babies given NNS to produce antibodies when they do not produce antibodies until after the age of 3 to 6 months ? They VBP the required antibodies from breastfeeding . 3 . Why does the NN tell NNS to delay breast feeding and VB more NNS when breast feeding babies produce higher levels of antibodies ? http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov… http://naturalsociety.com… 4 . Why are n’t NN manufacturers held responsible when their product injures your child ? Why MD these NNS need to be protected from the effects of such wonderful NNS ? ( Look into NN Injury Compensation Program .gov and VAERS ) The Supreme NNP ruling exempting the NN manufacturers from all liability is done under the explicit understanding that they fall under the category “ unavoidably unsafe NNS . ” http://www.supremecourt.gov/opinions/10pdf/09-152.pdf http://www.hrsa.gov/vaccinecompensation/index.html https://vaers.hhs.gov/index 5 . Why have no double blind , placebo , randomized controlled NNS been done on any NNS ? This is standard with any other NN . 6 . Why are we following the US NN schedule ? We are the most vaccinated population on the NN with the highest rates of infant deaths / SIDS in the western NN ? http://www.washingtonpost.com… http://sm.stanford.edu/archive/stanmed/2013fall/article2.html 7 . Why are NN outbreaks occurring in populations with 90 % + NN rates ? What about that ‘ Herd Immunity ’ guys ? http://aje.oxfordjournals.org/content/139/1/77.short http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/8483623 http://wwwnc.cdc.gov/eid/article/6/5/00-0512_article_ADD 8 . Why are NNS vaccinated against these NNS still catching and spreading them ? http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/24076325 http://www.thehealthyhomeeconomist.com…(see Johns Hopkins paper ) http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/15954490 http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/8483623 9 . Why are we frightened of non-fatal illnesses that train a child ’s immune NN how to behave ? 10 . Why are NN manufacturers allowed to reduce antigens and insert cheap and toxic additives that aggravate the injection NN ? 11 . Why do we need multi- dose NNS if the number CD priority of NN manufacturers is your child ’s safety ? 12 . Why will no physician sign a written guarantee for a child ’s safety prior to vaccinating them with NNS they insist you take and that they VBP are completely safe ? 13 . Why is there no outrage about the 3.1 CD dollars paid out in NN injury / death claims and yet they claim there is no correlation and they are perfectly safe ? http://www.hrsa.gov/vaccinecompensation/statisticsreport.pdf 14 . Why do n’t NNS recognize from history that the most widespread and lethal NNS in the last 200 NNS were reduced due to cleaner drinking NN , improved sanitation , nutrition , less overcrowded areas and better living conditions ? NNS were introduced at points in NN where every single NN was already declining , most almost completely gone . To give NNS credit for JJ reductions in NN is IN giving a band - aid credit for healing a wound that was already closing . Dr. Hans Rosling shows exactly how the NN condition of nearly all NNS of the NN have improved with wealth , RB 200 NNS RB , at the times where there no NNS . http://youtu.be/jbkSRLYSojo https://childhealthsafety.wordpress.com/graphs/ ( blog yes , but the links are amazing and historical NNS . ) http://www.columbia.edu… By the late 1950s , RB before the introduction of NNS NN , NNS - related deaths and NN fatality rates in the NNP NNPS had decreased markedly , presumably as a result of improvement in NN care and nutrition ( Oxford Journal of Infectious NNPS ) . 15 . Why do NNS keep parroting what they hear about ‘ Herd Immunity ? ’ Herd immunity is a hilarious concept that assumes that 1 ) Vaccinated NNS are immune to the NNS for which they ’ve been vaccinated , 2 ) Can not carry the NNS for which they are vaccinated / immune , 3 ) Because most of the NNS are vaccinated , other NNS IN them ca n’t catch the NN . My favourite analogy for herd immunity is that if 95 % of NNS in a building are wearing hard hats when the ceiling falls in , the 5 % are protected . ( credit Dr. Robert Murdoch ) 16 . Why are almost all pro-vaxxer adults we talk to not up to date on their adult vaccinations / boosters ? 18 . Why did n’t our NN NN agencies ever safety test thimerasol ( a mercury derivative and adjuvant ) since Lilly developed it in the 1920’s ? They VBD it in NNS from 1930 to 2004 ! It still is in some NNS such as the NN NN and others . Here is a 2 minute clip , from Congressional Hearings . The EPA themselves acknowledge the toxic effects of mercury : http://www.epa.gov/hg/effects.htm http://www.nytimes.com… http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/21350943 http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/20803069 http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/21549155 CD . Why is it that only 40 % of NN professionals receive the NN shot each NN ? They must not VB in it . http://abcnews.go.com… 20 . Why ? Instead of a mandatory NN law , why do n’t they have a mandatory law passed to protect us from Iatrogenic Death ? ( Death by NNP , 3rd leading NN of death ! ) http://articles.mercola.com… http://www.worldlawdirect.com… 21 . Why does n’t the pro NN NN admit that the vaccinated spread NN and stop blaming us ? http://www.cnbc.com/id/102473744 http://www.nc.cdc.gov/eid/article/6/5/00-0512_article_ADD 22 . Why do NNS still trust their NN NN agencies when they VBP NNS are perfectly safe ? With all the JJ pharma fraud NNS , Merck , Glaxo Smith Kline , etc. and all the class action suits that come out several times a NN for death / injury you VBP on tv commercials every week , combine that with the VICP and VAERS .gov statistics , and Iatrogenic Death statistics , why do NNS still trust their NN NN agencies when they VBP NNS are perfectly safe ? Having VBN that , why is NN trusted at all since Democide statistics ( death by NN ) show that nearly 300 CD in this last NN were killed by the NN . Those are non-combatants . Here are a few more studies : – Abnormal NNS - mumps - rubella antibodies and CNS autoimmunity in NNS with NN . http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/12145534 – Serological association of NNS NN and JJ herpes NN - 6 with brain auto - antibodies in NN . http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/9756729 This NN is the JJ to report an association between NN serology and brain auto antibody in NN ; it supports the hypothesis that a NN - induced autoimmune response MD play a causal role in NN . – Effects of diphtheria - tetanus - pertussis or tetanus NN on allergies and allergy - related respiratory NNS among NNS and adolescents in the NNP NNPS . http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/10714532 Review is made of 107 NNS of neurological complications of pertussis inoculation reported in the literature . The early onset of neurological NNS was characteristic , with changes of consciousness and convulsions as the most striking features . The question of aetiology is considered and contraindications are discussed …as is the grave danger of further inoculations when a previous NN has produced any suggestion of a neurological reaction . Aluminum Studies : – Do aluminum NN adjuvants contribute to the rising prevalence ofautism ? http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/22099159 “ … A second series of experiments was conducted on mice injected with six doses of aluminum hydroxide . Behavioural analyses in these mice revealed significant impairments in a number of motor functions as well as diminished spatial memory capacity . ” Experimental research , clearly shows that aluminum adjuvants have a potential to induce serious immunological disorders in NNS . In particular , aluminum in adjuvant form carries a NN for autoimmunity , JJ - term brain inflammation and associated neurological complications and MD thus have profound and widespread adverse NN consequences . click for entire NN – Mechanisms of aluminum adjuvant toxicity and autoimmunity in pediatric populations . http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/22235057 The findings suggest a possible role for the aluminum adjuvant in some neurological features associated with GWI and possibly an additional role for the combination of adjuvants ( Synergistic Toxicity ) . – Aluminum in the central nervous NN ( CNS ) : toxicity in NNS and NNS , NN adjuvants , and autoimmunity . http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/23609067 – Biopersistence and brain translocation of aluminum adjuvants of NNS . http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/25699008 – JJ -term Persistence of NN - Derived Aluminum Hydroxide is Associated with Chronic Cognitive Dysfunction . http://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S0162013409001895 – JJ - term follow - up of cognitive dysfunction in patients with aluminum hydroxideinduced macrophagic myofasciitis ( MMF ) . http://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S0162013411002194 – Integrating experimental ( in vitro and in vivo ) neurotoxicity studies of low - dose thimerosal relevant to NNS . http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/21350943 There is a need to interpret neurotoxic studies to VB deal with uncertainties surrounding pregnant mothers , newborns and JJ NNS who must receive repeated doses of Thimerosal - containing NNS ( TCVs ) . Information extracted from studies indicates that : ( a ) activity of low doses of Thimerosal against isolated JJ and NN brain NNS was VBN in all studies and is consistent with Hg neurotoxicity ; ( b ) the neurotoxic effect of ethylmercury has not been studied with co-occurring adjuvant - NNP in TCVs ; ( c ) NN studies have shown that exposure to Thimerosal - Hg can lead to accumulation of inorganic Hg in brain , and that ( d ) doses relevant to TCV exposure possess the potential to affect JJ neuro - NN . – Neonatal administration of thimerosal causes persistent changes in mu opioid receptors in the rat brain . http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/20803069 – Persistent behavioural impairments and alterations of brain dopaminesystem after early postnatal administration of thimerosal in rats . http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/21549155 – Maternal Thimerosal Exposure Results in Aberrant Cerebellar Oxidative Stress , Thyroid Hormone Metabolism , and Motor Behaviour in Rat Pups ; Sex - and Strain - Dependent Effects . http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/22015705 – Administration of thimerosal to infant rats increases overflow of glutamate and aspartate in the prefrontal cortex : protective role ofdehydroepiandrosterone sulfate . http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/22015977 Thimerosal , a mercury - containing NN preservative , is a suspected factor in the etiology of neurodevelopmental disorders . We previously showed that its administration to infant rats causes behavioral , neurochemical and neuropathological abnormalities similar to those present in NN . The ACIP ’s recommendation of influenza NN during pregnancy is not supported by citations in its own policy paper or in current JJ literature . text: Vaccinations save lives , protect our NNS and are CD of our greatest JJ NN achievements . As JJ NN officials , our role is to advance the NN of the JJ NNS . This must include championing vaccinations . NNS IN polio , NN , diphtheria and rubella were once common in the NNP NNPS , afflicting hundreds of thousands of infants , NNS and adults , and killing thousands each NN . Some older Americans MD remember the fear associated with polio outbreaks and the era of iron lungs and leg braces — a NN when swimming pools and movie theaters closed over concerns about the spread of the crippling NN . Others MD recall the heartbreaking wave of rubella in the 1960s that resulted in thousands of newborn deaths , with thousands more born blind , deaf or with other lifelong disabilities . We cannot let NNP be faced with these fears again . For those of us who have treated critically ill NNS with NN - preventable NNS , we VBP firsthand the devastation to the child — and to the family and community — of a death , limb amputation or severe brain damage that MD have been avoided by a simple NN . Modern NNS are highly effective and safe , with most serious side effects being exceptionally rare — and much less serious than contracting the actual NN . But misinformation about NNS is still widely reported , so we feel it is crucial to VB clearly and unambiguously : NNS do not VB NN and they do not contain toxic chemicals . That fact was demonstrated again this week in a JJ NN on MMR NN by Danish NNS .

text: Once airports and borders open again and NNS are able to fly freely — a process already in play as airports of all sizes IN the NN ready strategies to ensure healthy NN travel — how much are you ready to VB your flying habits ? As much as was required after 9/11 ? Less ? More ? Considering some of the changes already happening and the JJ more recommended before airports can reopen safely to commercial routes , experts are referring to the NN NN as ‘ the JJ terrorism , ’ triggering the biggest NN the airline industry has ever faced . Let ’s start with the entire process of checking in for flights , which some calculate MD take up to four hours and involve JJ distancing , sanitation of passengers and luggage , wider spaces for various lines and waiting to board . Nine out of 10 experts expect slower turnarounds between flights due to the need of thorough cleaning of cabins and following of sanitary measures at airports . In the short run , though , it ’s expected that reduced passenger numbers and airlines traveling to a smaller pool of destinations MD reduce delays . • None NNP Airlines workers bring class action saying material in JJ gray uniforms made them sick • None The Brave NNP NNP of Bill NNP and NNP Telecom ” by Robert F. Kennedy , Jr. and Dafna Tachover What You Can Expect Among the steps under consideration : no cabin bags , no lounges , no automatic upgrades , face masks , surgical gloves , self - check - in , self - bag - drop - off , immunity passports , on - the - spot NN tests and sanitation disinfection tunnels . Digital technologies and automation will play a critical role in the future of NN travel . The need to reduce “ touchpoints ” at airports implies mandatory NN of biometric boarding that allows passengers to board planes with only their face as a passport . A number of airlines including British Airways , Qantas and EasyJet already are using the technology . According to the NNP Travel and Tourism Council ( WTTC ) , “ the ‘ JJ normal ’ at major airports , such as Heathrow , JFK and Singapore Changi will include almost exclusive NN of JJ check - ins , and contactless payments . Then there are the radical changes the airports will have to VB starting most probably with stopping non-fliers from entering at all except for unaccompanied minors or others who need assistance . They will need more extensive all - biometric check - in systems and efficient DYI for dropping off bags , ‘ travel bubbles , ’ or tunnels for disinfection . ( After being checked in , luggage MD RB be put through a disinfection fogging tunnel . ) They RB must install demarcation of the spaces for JJ distancing in corridors and concourses , larger spaces for queues and waiting , plexiglass or other protective barriers at customer service counters , hand sanitation stations and thermal scanning to check crowds for fever - grade NN temperatures , which already are in NN in some major airports . • None Bill NNPS ’ Philanthropy : 30,000 Indian girls VBN as guinea pigs to test cancer NN “ Only those ‘ fit to fly ’ will be allowed to enter , ” predicts the airline strategy firm SimpliFlying , in a recent report , where it identifies more than 70 different areas in the passenger journey that “ are expected to either VB or to be introduced from scratch , including having bags ‘ sanitagged ’ after VBG through fogging , electrostatic or UV - disinfection to restore confidence in flying after NNP - CD . ” The Telegraph explains that “ it MD sound futuristic , but UV sanitation is likely to become commonplace at the NN ’s airports . London Heathrow VBZ it is to begin trialling the process for its security trays . ” And then comes boarding The boarding process is expected RB to become ‘ touchless , ’ with options including facial recognition , already VBN in some U.S. airports for international flights . On the planes , there will be blocked seats , electrostatic spraying , personnel in protective gear and , of course , masks . Major JJ carriers such as NNP France and KLM already have made them compulsory and it ’s expected that all other airlines will do the same . As for food , the tendency is to stop serving altogether on short - haul flights , while the airlines consider ‘ light refreshments ’ for JJ - haul flights . Hong Kong Airlines has decided to stop offering food altogether . At the arrival point , SimpliFlying forecasts , international passengers will need to show some type of immunity document / passport , RB advocated by the International NNP Transport Association , IATA , to border NN agents . Once a NN has been VBN , that MD shift to a proof of NN . “ Arriving passengers will RB undergo another temperature screening at their final destination and potentially RB NN tests for NNP - CD , ” Conde Nast predicts . “ Some airports IN Hong Kong and Vienna are testing passengers for the NN with a NN test before they are allowed to enter the NN . Those types of tests , however , might be short - lived . ” Thermal testing is RB recommended by IATA , “ while Airlines UK , which represents British Airways , EasyJet and Virgin Atlantic , has VBN ‘ pre- screening ’ of travelers should be introduced ideally as early in the passenger journey as possible , ” reports The Telegraph . Although there are no standard decisions about making such tests and screening mandatory , airports and airlines are pushing for uniform regulations . It ’s not clear who will be responsible for checking travelers ’ temperatures and other NNP - CD NNS , for example . SimpliFlying predicts that a JJ federal NN agency likely will be created to coordinate NN screenings inside airports . As immediately following 9/11 , a process of NN - and - error is likely , with JJ airports and airlines following what some ‘ pioneers ’ establish . “ There will be JJ protocols for check - in involving digital technology ; hand sanitizer stations at frequent points including where luggage is stored ; contactless payment instead of cash ; using stairs more often than lifts where the CD - meter - rule can be harder to maintain ; and fitness equipment being moved for greater separation , among other examples , ” the WTTC wrote in a recent report . The international institution VBZ that the sector will face a gradual return to travel over the coming months as a “ JJ normal ” emerges before a NN becomes available on a mass scale , JJ enough to inoculate billions of NNS . Travel is likely to return RB to domestic markets with “ staycations , ” then to a NN ’s nearest neighbors before expanding across regions , and then finally across continents to welcome the return of journeys to JJ - haul international destinations . WTTC believes that younger travelers in the 18 - 35 age group , who appear to be less vulnerable to NNP - CD , RB MD be among the JJ to begin traveling again . According to Gloria Guevara , WTTC NN & CEO , traveling in the ‘ JJ normal ’ age requires coordinated actions , including JJ standards and protocols , “ for a safe and responsible road to recovery for the JJ Travel & Tourism sector as consumers start planning trips again . ” The JJ protocols and standards are being defined following feedback from associations representing the different travel sectors including International NNP Transport Association ( IATA ) , the Airport Council International ( ACI ) , Cruise Lines International Association ( CLIA ) , NNP NNPS Travel Association ( USTA ) , Pacific Asia Travel Association ( PATA ) , International Civil Aviation Organisation ( ICAO ) , the Organisation for NNP Co-operation and NNP ( OECD ) , the NNP Travel Commission ( ETC ) and the NNP Tourism Organisation ( UNWTO ) . But with protocols and standards , biometric systems , immunity passports and the best intentions for a safe road to recovery , the future of traveling , as NNP York Times ’s Niraj Chokshi explains , is still bleak : “ With much of the NN closed for business , and no widely available NN in sight , it MD be months , if not NNS , before airlines operate as JJ flights as they did before the NN . RB when NNS start flying again , the industry MD be transformed , much as it was after the Sept. 11 terrorist attacks . ” And in the process , as it is already the NN , some airlines , especially smaller ones , will be push into bankruptcy or become takeover targets . “ Consumer fears about catching the NN on crowded planes MD lead to reconfigured seating . Carriers MD initially entice wary travelers with discounts , but if they can’t fill up flights , they MD resort to raising ticket prices . ” For Dave CalhounIn , CEO of Boeing , not only are the smaller airlines in danger . He thinks that at least a major U.S carrier will “ most likely ” VB out of business due to the NN NN . In an interview with NBC NNP ’ TODAY , on Tuesday he told Savannah Guthrie : “ … something will happen when September comes RB . Traffic levels will not be back to 100 % . They wo n’t RB be back to 25 % . Maybe by the end of the NN we approach 50 % . So there will definitely be adjustments that have to be made on the part of the airlines . ” Copyright 2020 – permission to reprint fully granted , WITH links to original story

We are determined to defeat this NN , which continues to infect millions of NNS and VB death and suffering IN the NN . Given the urgent NN , it ’s clear that a NN cannot be developed soon enough to VB stem the NN . With the goal of accomplishing what in normal times MD have been deemed impossible , we are engaging collaboratively with regulatory authorities to adapt traditional NN research and NN to meet this unprecedented challenge . With our partner BioNTech , a German biotech NN , we are developing not CD but at least four different NN candidates all at once . We began testing the NN in Germany on April 23 . This week , we ’re starting to test our mRNA NN candidates in a U.S. NN — only six weeks after kicking off our NN - CD partnership . Never in my over 25 NNS of developing NNS have I seen a JJ NN launched at this speed . RB , it takes NNS of dedicated research to VB to this point . This record milestone is a testament to the innovation and collaboration among NNS and colleagues from CD very different organizations and cultures , unprecedented access to advice and support from regulatory agencies and other NN agencies , and the willingness of NNS to VB above and beyond what is “ normal ” for them . Our approach is VBN on the same technology that we are developing in another partnership with BioNTech — an mRNA seasonal influenza NN , which has not yet entered JJ studies . If successful , that NN MD potentially transform the yearly “ scramble ” of producing a NN NN by increasing the speed of NN and coverage of circulating strains . We saw the opportunity to pursue a collaboration with BioNTech on the same platform technology for NN - CD , which MD potentially VB us develop a NN faster than using traditional approaches . Unlike JJ conventional NNS — which RB take months to NNS of research because they entail RB developing biological NN , NN or bacterial production processes — mRNA NNS are fully synthetic , well characterized and VBP nearly identical processes for purification . If the NN platform is proven to work , it MD allow us to quickly adapt the platform to other pathogens by exchanging the small portion of the NN - NN - 2 genetic code for that of another pathogen . In most conventional viral NNS VBN today , weakened or killed forms of a NN , or NN components of the pathogen VBN as antigens , are administered to a NN . The immune NN then recognizes these foreign NN components and unleashes a multipronged defense : special immune NNS to kill infected NNS and specific antibodies to prevent the NN from infecting our NNS . Then , if a vaccinated NN encounters the NN in the future , their immune NN already knows how to recognize , respond and defeat it before they become sick . The mRNA NN technology does not require the lengthy production of weakened or killed viruses or the viral antigen . Instead , mRNA , a set of genetic instructions coding for viral antigens , is injected into the NN . Once inside NNS , these instructions guide the NN ’s machinery to produce the antigens , which can then teach the immune NN how to recognize and fight off a future NN attack . In addition , RNA platforms can RB “ VB ” the immune NN mount a stronger response to an antigen than that induced by the antigen alone . The genetic material RNA can be seen by the immune NN as “ viral . ” That launches a potent arm of the immune NN called innate immunity , which recognizes patterns of common pathogens such as viruses and bacteria and increases the potency of the NN . It ’s a deliberative and sequential process that can take JJ NNS . Due to the urgency of the NN , well - established JJ NN paths MD take too RB for us . To shorten the NN from preclinical to JJ evaluation , we are using a unique approach to test at least four different RNA NN candidates in parallel in a smaller number of JJ NN participants . The ongoing U.S. phase 1 / 2 NN uses a JJ NN design that maximizes NN speed while ensuring safety by quickly eliminating suboptimal NN candidates for the benefit of the “ winner ” in the race . Given this design , we are shaving JJ NNS from the NN NN timeline , and assuming success , we ’ll potentially be able to roll out a promising NN candidate as early as fall 2020 . We are RB changing this NN : After determining the safety of each candidate ’s dose level in younger populations , we will then immediately test that dose level in older adults , so that necessary safety and immunogenicity NNS for the population most vulnerable to NNP - CD are available almost at the same NN to begin the efficacy stage of the NN . These investments occur only after a NN candidate has proven itself to be safe and immunogenic . To that end , we are working together with BioNTech and Pfizer ’s NN teams to quickly scale up infrastructure and try to eliminate any potential bottlenecks in sourcing the materials needed to produce hundreds of millions of NN doses in record NN . I ’ve dedicated my scientific career to creating and developing NNS so that vulnerable populations all over the globe can be protected from NN and death . I have witnessed firsthand the tremendous NN of NNS to VB lives and VB ensure that NNS have a fighting chance to grow up healthy . text: The UK and US have issued a joint warning cyber - spies are targeting the NN sector . text: Getting ahead of the NN Viruses are stealthy . They disguise themselves as they infect a host and penetrate that host ’s NNS , which gives them a head start over the NN ’s immune response . Once a NN recognizes certain telltale signs of a pathogen , it throws out an alarm signal to the immune NN . But because the NN has that head start , it still has NN to replicate itself and infect a JJ host before the immune NN can catch up . That ’s why someone ’s JJ experience with an infectious NN can be so nasty . The immune NN is not so easily tricked a second NN : When it ’s beaten an invader once , it keeps a specialized weapons cache dedicated to that particular pathogen , ready to mount a high - speed reaction if it ’s ever detected again . So , the second NN the NN shows up in your NN , the NN wo n’t have that handy head start . To have herd immunity , each infected NN must , on average , infect less than CD NN ( though clearly , it ’s not possible to infect half a NN ; if some infected NNS pass on the infection and others do n’t , the average transmission rate will be less than CD . ) Once the transmission rate drops below CD , a community has herd immunity . That wo n’t stop each and every NN , but it will prevent the NN from spreading indefinitely . JJ of our lessons on herd immunity come from the NNS , because it 's so contagious . The more infectious a NN is , the more NNS who need to be immune to reach herd immunity . CD NN with NNS , for instance , MD infect up to 18 other NNS in a susceptible population . To VB that transmission rate all the NN down to less than CD , almost everyone in the population needs to act as a buffer between an infected NN and a JJ potential host . That ’s why NNS needs such a high rate of herd immunity — RB 95 percent . The do ’s and don’ts of making a herd NNS create a weapons cache for a NN without the NN ever having to fight off the NN itself , which is why herd immunity is something that ’s generally pursued through NN rather than infection . For example , about 30 percent of NNS NNS have complications such as seizures , pneumonia , and encephalitis , resulting in about CD deaths for every thousand NNS in the U.S. Exposing a whole population to NN MD be a dangerous NN to cultivate herd immunity among the survivors . “ The problem with NN is that no - PRP has had it before , regardless of age , ” VBZ Gostic of the NNP of Chicago . Ackerman explains , “ It ’s VBG to be an interesting depression because we have all the infrastructure of affluence . We have achieved a pinnacle of affluence , and the metaphor I VBP is riding to the soup kitchen on an $ 8,000 trail bike . . . . I hope we find things that VBP NN worth VBG on without all the stuff . We VBG to have to find ways to VB along because we are headed into hard times . ” A few NNS RB , Ackerman predicted that the trend for interest rates was down . I VBP we will have lower rates until , at some point in the future , NNS will start sniffing out a hyperinflation . You VBP I have been a deflationist for a lot of NNS . text: While some have been taking advantage of NN lockdowns to VB banana bread or catch up on their cleaning , CD British family decided to VB NNS hunting for a NN – by becoming their JJ guinea pigs . The NNP - CD NN left Katie Viney , her husband Tony and their daughter Rhiannon locked down at home near Oxford , England . Professor Richard Haynes , who coordinates the Recovery JJ NN at the NNP of Oxford , VBZ it ’s important to continue hunting for effective treatments too , as “ some NNS will end up in hospital RB when we have a NN . ” “ Over the past eight weeks , we 've now recruited over 10,000 NNS from over 180 different hospitals . text: What Is the Immune NN ? The immune NN is the NN 's defense against infections . The immune ( ih - MYOON ) NN attacks germs and helps keep us healthy . What Are the Parts of the Immune NN ? JJ NNS and organs work together to protect the NN . White NN NNS , RB called leukocytes ( LOO - kuh - sytes ) , play an important role in the immune NN . Some types of white NN NNS , called phagocytes ( FAH - guh - sytes ) , chew up invading organisms . Others , called lymphocytes ( LIM - fuh - sytes ) , VBP the NN remember the invaders and destroy them . CD type of phagocyte is the neutrophil ( NOO - truh - fil ) , which fights bacteria . When someone might have bacterial infection , doctors can order a NN test to VB if it caused the NN to have lots of neutrophils . Other types of phagocytes do their own jobs to VB sure that the NN responds to invaders . The CD kinds of lymphocytes are B lymphocytes and T lymphocytes . Lymphocytes start out in the bone marrow and either stay there and mature into B NNS , or VBP to the thymus gland to mature into T NNS . B lymphocytes are IN the NN 's JJ intelligence NN — they find their targets and send defenses to lock onto them . T NNS are IN the soldiers — they destroy the invaders that the intelligence NN finds . How Does the Immune NN Work ? When the NN senses foreign substances ( called antigens ) , the immune NN works to recognize the antigens and VB rid of them . B lymphocytes are triggered to VB antibodies ( RB called immunoglobulins ) . These proteins lock onto specific antigens . This is RB how immunizations ( NNS ) prevent some NNS . An immunization introduces the NN to an antigen in a NN that does n't VB someone sick . For example , the NN acts as a barrier to block germs from entering the NN . And the immune NN recognizes when certain invaders are foreign and MD be dangerous . • Adaptive immunity : Adaptive ( or active ) immunity develops throughout our lives . We develop adaptive immunity when we 're exposed to NNS or when we 're immunized against them with NNS . • Passive immunity : Passive immunity is " borrowed " from another source and it lasts for a short NN . For example , antibodies in a mother 's breast milk give a baby temporary immunity to NNS the mother has been exposed to . The immune NN takes a while to develop and needs NN from NNS . text: There are three VBN serotypes ( closely related though distinguishable forms ) of wild poliovirus : PV1 , PV2 , and PV3 . The most - widespread serotype is PV1 . PV2 likely has been eradicated ; the last PV2 NN was reported in 1999 in Uttar Pradesh , India . The third serotype , PV3 , is close to eradication . Polio , in full poliomyelitis , RB called infantile paralysis , acute viral infectious NN of the nervous NN that RB begins with general NNS such as fever , headache , nausea , fatigue , and muscle pains and spasms and is sometimes followed by a more - serious and permanent paralysis of muscles in CD or more limbs , the throat , or the chest . More than half of all NNS of polio occur in NNS under the age of five . The paralysis so commonly associated with the NN actually affects fewer than 1 percent of persons infected by the poliovirus . Between 5 and 10 percent of infected persons display only the general NNS outlined above , and more than 90 percent show no signs of illness at all . For those infected by the poliovirus , there is no cure , and in the mid-20th NN hundreds of thousands of NNS were struck by the NN every NN . Since the 1960s , thanks to widespread NN of polio NNS , polio has been eliminated from most of the NN . It is now endemic in only three NNS : Afghanistan , Pakistan , and Nigeria . Nigeria , however , was on the brink of being polio - free in CD . Worldwide , since 1988 the number of reported polio NNS has dropped by more than 99 percent . The course of the NN Poliomyelitis means “ gray marrow inflammation , ” referring to the propensity of the poliovirus to attack certain NNS in the spinal cord and brainstem . The poliovirus is a picornavirus ( family Picornaviridae ) , a member of a group VBN as enteroviruses that inhabits the JJ digestive tract . ( JJ beings are the only VBN hosts of the poliovirus . ) The NN enters the NN most often by the so - called fecal–oral route — that is , from fecal matter taken into the mouth through contaminated food or fingers . It can RB enter by ingestion of droplets expelled from the throat of an infected NN . JJ victims MD become ill about 7 to 14 days after ingesting the NN . Infected persons MD shed the NN from their throats for a week , beginning a day or more before suffering any NNS themselves , and they MD continue to shed the NN in their feces for a month or more after their illness . After the poliovirus is swallowed , it multiplies in lymph nodes of the intestinal tract and spreads through the NN via the bloodstream . In some NNS the NN gets no farther , causing only a vague flulike illness to develop . The most - common early NNS of polio are mild headache , fever , sore throat , nausea , vomiting , diarrhea , restlessness , and drowsiness . Fever peaks in CD to three days and then rapidly subsides , and patients recover within three to four days without the NN of paralysis . In some NNS , however , the NN begins an assault on the central nervous NN , inflaming and destroying motor NNS of the spinal cord and brainstem . In those NNS patients become irritable and develop NN in the back and limbs , muscle tenderness , and stiff neck . JJ recover at that stage , but approximately 1 in 200 persons with polio develops what is VBN as flaccid paralysis . The motor impulses that normally move along the nerve fibres from the spinal cord to muscles are blocked , and , as a result , muscles become limp and cannot contract . The extent of paralysis depends on where the NN strikes and the number of nerve NNS that it destroys . NNS that are not severely injured recover their normal function in NN ; to the extent that they do recover , a corresponding restoration of muscle function MD be expected . NNS that are destroyed , however , are not replaced , because nerve NNS cannot regenerate . In that NN the paralysis is complete and permanent , with associated progressive atrophy of the unused muscles . In most NNS paralytic polio strikes the limb muscles , particularly the legs . Paralysis does not always involve the limbs , however . The abdominal muscles or the muscles of the back MD be paralyzed , affecting posture . The neck muscles MD become weak , so that the head can not be raised . Paralysis of the face muscles MD VB twisting of the mouth or drooping eyelids . In some types of spinal polio , the NN damages the upper part of the spinal cord , with resulting difficulties in breathing . In bulbar polio the NN attacks the brainstem , and the nerve centres that VBP swallowing and talking are damaged . Secretions collect in the throat and MD lead to suffocation by blocking the airway . Some 5 to 10 percent of persons afflicted with paralytic polio die , RB of respiratory complications . There seem to be individual differences in the degree of natural susceptibility to the NN . JJ persons have acquired antibodies to the poliovirus in their NN without having had any NNS of infection . It is generally held that a lasting immunity follows recovery from the NN . However , because there are three different serotypes of poliovirus , second attacks can occur . Persons who recover from an infection caused by CD serotype of poliovirus are permanently immune to reinfection by that serotype but not to infection by the others . For that reason polio NNS are trivalent — that is , designed to generate antibodies to all three poliovirus serotypes ( VB below ) . Post - polio syndrome manifests itself as increased weakness , muscle atrophy , or other conditions involving the originally affected muscle groups or a different group of muscles . The NN of the syndrome is not VBN for certain , but it MD arise when nerve branches grown by nerve fibres that survived the original infection begin to deteriorate as the JJ polio victim passes through middle age . text: The NN expert cautioned that the NN was not a complete " knockout " in the NN — the JJ randomized JJ NN to deliver results on a potential NN NN . But he VBD the findings are significant because " what it has proven is that a NN can block this NN . " NNP Donald NNP , who has repeatedly touted unproven NN drugs at White NNP briefings , was more upbeat about the NN results . " It 's a very positive event , " he VBD . NN participants who received remdesivir recovered in an average of 11 days compared with 15 days for patients in the NN group , who received a placebo . Eight percent of remdesivir patients died during the NN versus 11 percent in the placebo group . The death rate is just slightly lower in the remdesivir group , but more NNS remains to be analyzed , Fauci VBD . But the scientist , who has led NIAID since 1984 , VBD the NN reminded him of the day 34 NNS RB when modest results for the NN AZT signaled the JJ potential weapon against HIV . " That was not the end NN , because building on that every NN after we did better and better , we had better drugs of the same type , and we had drugs against different targets , " Fauci VBD . AZT , or azidothymidine , was originally developed as a cancer NN . In March 1987 , it won FDA approval — in record NN — for NN against HIV , at a NN when infection often led to a quick and painful death . The medicine came with rough side effects , and questions about whether it actually extended NN . It took another decade before NNS developed the combination antiretroviral drugs that transformed HIV into a chronic NN . NNS IN the NN have been racing to find NN treatments , but no NN has been definitively proven effective . Other early NNS for remdesivir have been mixed , including a pair of studies whose results were released hours ahead of the NIAID findings . Gilead released its own NN results this morning suggesting that severely ill patients receiving five days of remdesivir fared just as well as patients receiving a 10 - day dosing regimen . More than half of both dosing groups were discharged from the hospital within CD weeks of beginning their medication . Eight percent of NNS in the five - day group died while 11 percent in the 10 - day group died . But another 10 percent in the longer dosing arm had to discontinue NN because of serious side effects , and the NN lacked a NN group . Gilead VBD the NNS RB suggests that NNS who received remdesivir early in their infection seemed to fare better than those that received it later . The NN is not a traditional NN with a placebo arm to compare against remdesivir for effectiveness , earning Gilead some criticism from policy experts over sharing the NN alongside the NIAID results . " Piggybacking the severe NN release on [ the NIAID NN ] is the part which is unjustifiable , " VBD Peter Bach , director of Memorial Sloan - Kettering 's Center for NNP Policy and Outcomes . Calling Gilead 's results positive RB though they came from a NN without a NN group " has no basis in scientific inquiry , " he added . text: As the NNS outbreak spreads across the NN , tens of thousands of NNS remain in a paperwork limbo — unsure whether they are fully vaccinated , a JJ unknown in assessing the NN at JJ schools . A USA TODAY analysis of school NN records VBD that at more than 2,200 JJ and private schools in 12 NNS , at least a tenth of kindergarten students had either incomplete NN records or had fallen behind schedule in receiving their shots . In some NNS , schools dismiss that as a documentation problem , pointing out that JJ students have had at least CD shot . " You have to have all that information before you can start the work of controlling the outbreak , " VBZ Shoana Anderson , director of communicable NN and emergency preparedness for Nashville 's Department of NNP NNP . " The amount of staff NN and work that it takes to gather that is incredible . And with NNS , you do n't often have awhile . " As an epidemiologist , she spent three months in 2008 trying to contain a NN outbreak in Tuscon . In that outbreak , which centered IN CD hospitals and entered at least CD school , half the 14 confirmed NNS were in NNS with unknown immunization status . Hundreds of hospital workers and a handful of schoolchildren who MD have had contact with the patients MD n't provide proof of immunization — meaning workers had to be sent home and students kept out of school for as RB as 18 days . The outbreak cost the hospitals nearly $ 800,000 and 15,000 lost hours of work , mostly because of furloughs , a report from the Centers for NNP NNP and Prevention VBD . Among those who were n't sure of their NN status , about 10 % were VBN to have no immunity . " Most of the NN , it does n't impact you — these NNS are so rare that you might never face the situation , " Anderson VBZ . " But when it does happen , it has a pretty JJ impact . " Students arrive at school without their shots for lots of reasons . In low - income neighborhoods , access to doctors has RB been an issue . Newly arrived immigrants often appear without proof of immunization or with a spotty history of vaccinations . In some NNS , NNS scared of their NNS receiving more shots have decided to slow or stop the NN schedule . Anderson VBD lost or missing records can be a huge problem if NNS VBP doctors or move . Nearly 270 of the schools with the highest incomplete record rates were in Los Angeles ' Unified School District . At a handful of schools with the most extreme NNS , as JJ as nine out of every 10 NNS begin kindergarten under the NN 's conditional entry program for students missing some NNS or their immunization paperwork . " I VBP that sounds alarming , " VBZ Tonya Ross , the district 's director of nursing , but she points out that conditional students in most NNS have received at least some of their immunizations and that RB if students receive CD NN shot — instead of the recommended CD — they still have 95 % immunity . Despite an outbreak of NNS that began at nearby Disneyland , not a single NN has appeared among students in the district 's schools , she VBZ . " RB most of our students who have exemptions have some immunizations , " she VBZ . " The kids are for the most part protected . " Whether they — or any of the NNS across the NN whose NN status is recorded as " incomplete " or " conditional " — ever VBP fully caught up on NNS is less clear . In Virginia , 104 schools have conditional entry rates above 10 % . NNS have 90 days to VB their NNS caught up , NN epidemiologist Sandra Sommer VBZ . Sommer 's office does n't track or follow up on the conditional enrollment figures provided by each school , she VBZ . More than half the schools with high conditional enrollment are in Northern Virginia 's Fairfax NN district , but only a " low " number of students have been taken out of school for failure to comply with the law . " We VBP all kids to be in school . " Epidemiologist Saad Omer of Emory NNP 's NNP Center VBD his research had shown that JJ students who fall behind on immunizations never catch up . " We do VB that some NNS eventually complete , but a majority of them do n't , " he VBZ . Half the NNS do n't require schools to report incomplete NNS — Massachusetts , Illinois , Minnesota , NNP York and Arizona are among those . Some track the matter internally — Illinois law dictates that each school must keep a list of all students who are n't fully vaccinated . text: When a NN NN becomes available in the NNP NNPS , the federal NN and NNS will face a crucial choice : Should all or most residents be required to VB the NN ? Or should it be required only for school NNS , with a JJ exception allowed , and for groups IN front - line NN - care workers ? Some officials might VB few or no requirements at all because they VBP enough NNS will VB the NN voluntarily or have immunity from an infection to halt the spread of the NN . But in NNS IN Oklahoma , efforts to require and promote the NN MD run into strong headwinds . Anti-vaccine activists are vocal and influential in the NN , spurred on by a national movement . It ’s CD reason Oklahoma is CD of only 15 NNS , including Texas and Arkansas , that allow NNS to cite personal reasons to exempt their NNS from immunizations required by schools and day - care centers . They fill out and turn in a form . All NNS grant exemptions for JJ reasons , and 45 NNS plus Washington , D.C. , allow exemptions for religious objections . NN skeptics have successfully fought off efforts in the Legislature and NN NN to tighten exemptions . Just this NN , a NN advisory committee proposed requiring NNS who opt out of vaccinations for their NNS for religious or personal reasons to RB attend a NN education session at their local NN department . It RB proposed that exemptions expire after sixth grade unless NNS renew them . Both failed to advance . A key reason driving proposals IN these is Oklahoma ’s rising numbers and rates of exemptions . In 2018 - CD , the overall exemption rate for all kindergarteners was 2.6 % , up from 2.2 % in CD - 18 and 1.9 % in CD - 17 , according to the Oklahoma NNP Department of NNP . In 2009 - 10 , the exemption rate was 1.1 % . The number of approved NN exemptions doubled from 2,417 in 2014 to 5,082 in 2019 . Liza Greve , executive director of the Oklahomans for NNP and Parental Rights Foundation , a nonprofit that promotes what is often called NN choice or NN freedom , VBD she believes there ’s a good chance Oklahoma will add a NN - CD NN to its NN schedule for NNS , and NN - care workers will be required to take it . But her organization will advocate for an individual ’s NN to choose . “ Whatever shakes out , Oklahomans need to have a choice in NN and NN , ” she VBD , citing concerns that rapid NN of a NN - CD NN will heighten risks of adverse reactions . Dr. Ervin Yen , an Oklahoma City anesthesiologist who advocated for stronger immunization policies during his four NNS in the Oklahoma Senate , VBD he thinks the federal NN should require the NN for all citizens because of how deadly and contagious the NN is . But he believes the decision will be left up to the NNS . “ I VBP a significant number of NNS will mandate it , and I VBP Oklahoma will have to consider it , ” Yen VBD . Oklahoma requires NNS entering school to be vaccinated for nine NNS , including NNS , chickenpox and polio . NNS can apply for exemptions on JJ , religious or personal grounds . JJ exemptions represent the smallest share of school exemptions in the NN . NN Majority Floor Leader Jon Echols , R - Oklahoma City , anticipates the NN NN department MD update the NN schedule for NNS to include NN - CD once a safe and effective NN is available and the Legislature MD approve it as RB as NNS MD apply for the same exemptions . “ I VBP it MD be widely VBN , ” Echols VBD . “ I MD take it . ” But a general requirement to be vaccinated MD not fly , Echols VBD . “ There ’s no chance of the Oklahoma Legislature passing a NNP ’s Republic of China mandate , ” he VBD . Nationwide nearly half the NNPS require JJ adults be vaccinated against meningococcal NN before heading to college , and 15 NNS RB require the hepatitis B NN . But unlike policies for NNS , few requirements exist for adult immunizations in the U.S. and little JJ NN infrastructure supports mass NN of adults , according to the National Conference of NNP Legislatures . Doctors and NNS VBP every NN has an adverse reaction rate . For the NNS NN , it is CD IN 1 CD NNS vaccinated , according to the NNP NNP Organization . “ But you save 40 to 50 NNS ( IN CD ) from dying , ” Yen VBD . The benefits of the eventual NN - CD NN will “ hugely outweigh the risks , ” he VBD . “ NN is RB deadlier than NNS . ” RB if the death rate turns out to be only 1 % , a NN given to 1 CD NNS MD save 10,000 lives , Yen VBD . NNS across the globe are fast - tracking NN of a NN - CD NN , with 118 candidate NNS in the works , the NNP NNP Organization reports . Of those , eight are in JJ or JJ NNS and 110 are not yet being tested on NNS . It ’s not clear when a safe and effective NN MD be developed and available for distribution . Predictions have ranged from 12 or 18 months to at least a few NNS out , and residents in developed NNS , or ones that originate a successful NN , MD gain NN immunity RB , while more impoverished NNS wait . The U.S. Food and NNP Administration is streamlining its processes for NN NNS and therapeutic treatments . “ The FDA is VBG to rush it through , ” VBD William Hildebrand , a research professor at the NNP of Oklahoma College of Medicine who is among the JJ NNS worldwide working to create a NN . “ The NN is demanding it . ” Hildebrand ’s NN is looking at using the NN ’s protective T - NNS to find and kill NN - infected NNS , rather than developing a NN that helps the NN produce antibodies . It ’s a JJ shot , he VBD . “ Everybody ’s odds are a little JJ ( individually ) , but collectively our odds are pretty good , ” Hildebrand VBD . “ The odds are pretty good the scientific community is VBG to come up with something that will stop this NN . ” For a NN to stop the spread of an infectious NN , a sufficiently high number of NNS must be immune to the NN . That provides indirect protection , or herd immunity , to those who are n’t vaccinated or who have compromised immune systems and are at greater NN of catching an infection , including babies , older adults or NNS with certain JJ conditions . Herd immunity for each NN is VBN on how JJ additional NNS each infected NN will VB during their infectious period . CD NN with NNS , for example , will infect 12 to 18 others , so , VBN on a complex calculation , 90 % of the population needs to be vaccinated to ensure the NN does not spread . In the NN of NNP - CD , the NN shows an infected NN will pass it along to about three others , meaning about 70 % of the population will need to be vaccinated to reach herd immunity , VBD Gary Raskob , dean of the OU College of NNP NNP . An analysis by the Journal of Infection in mid-March estimated that the percentage of a population that must be immune via NN or natural immunity to halt the spread of NN - CD varies by NN . In Kuwait , it ’s less than 6 % ; in Japan , 33 % , and in Spain , 81 % . If there ’s not enough NN to meet the initial demand , it MD likely VB RB to NN - care workers and then the most vulnerable population , Raskob VBD . A NN published this week in the NN journal Nature VBD nearly 100 CD NNS expressing views on NN on NNP and concluded the explosive growth in anti-vaccination views MD increase opposition to a future NN NN and “ amplify outbreaks , as happened for NNS in 2019 . ” The Oklahomans for NNP and Parental Rights political action committee , which contributes to NN legislative campaigns , VBZ NNS have been linked to chronic childhood conditions , including NN , asthma , diabetes and obesity . Claims IN these are made by other anti-vaccination groups despite research to the contrary showing NNS are generally safe . Greve , who leads the PAC as well as the nonprofit advocacy group , VBD supporters are following the NN - CD NN NN and keeping an eye on safety and efficacy studies . “ Sometimes in an emergency situation , corners are cut when they should n’t be , ” Greve VBD . “ The evolving NN is moving very quickly . When it comes to a NN , we have to proceed with caution . ” CD concern is the NN of immune enhancement , in which a NN actually weakens a NN ’s response to the NN so the NN becomes sicker , Greve VBD . An example occurred when an investigational NN against respiratory syncytial NN ( RSV ) backfired in the 1960s . In CD NN , the hospitalization rate of infants who were vaccinated approached 80 % compared to 5 % for those not vaccinated , and CD toddlers died , according to the National Institutes of NNP ’s National Library of Medicine . Greve ’s advocacy group supported a dozen NN - related bills filed this legislative session , including efforts to protect personal exemptions and establish a stronger tracking NN for reporting any injuries or deaths from vaccinations . Hildebrand , of the OU College of Medicine , VBD multiple studies are underway to provide the answers NNS need to develop an effective NN - CD NN in record NN . He VBD the rush to discover a NN means the result MD carry a greater NN of serious reaction than normal . “ This NN might be more relaxed or liberal in its acceptable adverse reaction rate , ” he VBD . When the NN is available , he VBD , NNS will have to ask themselves what ’s riskier , the odds of an adverse reaction or the danger of getting the NN .
