text: Crises create the opportunity for leaders to provide direction , meaning , and support when followers need it the most . CD NN for leaders to earn their followers ’ trust in a NN is through self sacrifice–either through their own giving or that of the organization . The author ’s research shows that when leaders sacrifice in this NN , it makes employees feel more positively toward them and more committed to their organizations . But to reap the benefits , leaders must give with purpose , and be transparent about why and how much they are giving . You might VB that crises tend to bring out the worst in NNS , but that is n’t reflected in how we view our leaders , at least . In fact , crises VBP us to view leaders as more charismatic and effective than we normally do . This is probably why U.S. presidents are almost universally re-elected in times of NN . And research has shown that leaders who self - sacrifice tend to be seen as the most effective . Following 9/11 , I was so intrigued by NN leadership that I did a NN on the topic . In my research I VBD that leader self - sacrifice , such as cutting PRP ’s own salary or giving up PRP ’s own benefits , caused employees to feel more positively toward their leaders and more committed to their organizations during crises . This finding has been corroborated by additional research in the lab and field that suggests that when leaders demonstrate self - sacrificial behavior , it makes us VB them as having higher moral values and as being a better role NN — leading to better organizational outcomes . More recently , we have seen CEOs step up to support their employees during this NN by pledging not to lay off employees — RB those who can not VB into work . For example , RB though all of Patagonia ’s NNS are closed , CEO Yvon Chouinard has announced that the NN will continue to pay all employees , leading some to conclude that the values - driven organization will survive the NN while other organizations will fail . Other CEOs who have committed to no layoffs include Hearst CEO Steven Swartz , LinkedIn CEO Jeff Weiner , NNP and Square CEO Jack Dorsey , Morgan Stanley CEO James Gorman , Citigroup CEO Mike Corbat , Bank of NNP CEO Brian Moynihan , Visa CEO Alfred F. Kelly Jr. , and FedEx CEO Frederick Smith , Cisco CEO Chuck Robbins . So , what can leaders do in this NN to support their employees and how can they be sure that their giving hits the mark ? Effective measures fall into three categories : taking some of the same hits as your staff ; giving with a larger purpose in mind ; and being aggressively transparent RB when it ’s hard . Self - sacrifice is not just about the NN doing what ’s JJ . If you are VBG to ask your employees to sacrifice , you need to sacrifice as well . If you expect your NN to behave safely , you as a leader should behave safely . If you expect your NN to VB down in the trenches , you should be down there with them . No NN likes the leader who throws their NN on the front line while they sit in their office . Marriott International CEO Arne Sorenson , forfeited his salary for the NN and is donating hotel rooms to front - line workers to VB fight NNP - CD . Marriot RB asked its executives to sacrifice half of their salaries and has been furloughed JJ other employees . As a result , Marriot is still viewed – at least in the NN — as an employer of choice despite its need to furlough employees . Other NNS whose top leaders have cut their salaries include NBCUniversal , Uber , Delta , and Yelp . In my own field of academia , highly paid deans , coaches , and administrators at top universities IN Harvard are taking pay cuts to VB VB up for the impending deficits that higher education is facing . RB NN leaders , IN Jacinda Arden , NNP Zealand ’s prime minister , are taking pay cuts . Not all of us are CEOs who can VB the decision to keep NNS ’s paychecks coming or give up our salary for a NN . But there are still ways to sacrifice for our employees . Small gestures IN ordering lunch to be sent remotely to your employees for a NN zoom meeting can VB a JJ NN at maintaining the morale of the NN . If your organization has a leave donation program , you can donate some of your NN off to your NN members who need it . When you ’re a leader , sacrificing along with your employees MD mean that they will be more committed to staying with the NN during and after the NN . And , considering the cost of employee turnover , this MD mean the difference between recovering from the NNP - CD NN — or not . JJ organizations are offering free services IN free virtual tours or free learning tools for kids . Likewise , we have seen organizations step up to VB provide resources needed to combat the effects of the NN . Tesla , Toyota , Ford and GM have shut down factories to VB ventilators while Medtronic openly shared the software and specifications for their portable ventilators , allowing anyone to VB them for free to VB create ventilators in response to NNP - CD . But , whatever the give , it is important to tie the sacrifice to vision , mission , and the values of your organization so that NNS can understand why you are doing it . When Salesforce co-CEO Marc Benioff pledged not to do any layoffs for the next three months , he tied it to the cultural value of Ohana ( family ) and giving , asking that employees RB continue to support the NNS they relied on before the NN , such as NN cleaners or dog walkers . Leaders should be clear about how their actions are consistent with the organization ’s values . If that purpose is n’t clear , there can be backlash . Research shows that we are a skeptical bunch and when leaders self - sacrifice , we try to infer why the leader might be doing it or focus on what they are not doing ( IN whether or not the leaders are keeping their bonuses ) . The more cynical among us might infer that Johnson & Johnson ’s decision to invest a CD dollars to develop a NNP - CD NN was driven by profit . But , when CEO Alex Gorsky tied the act to their responsibility to improve the NN of NNS and they announced that they MD provide the NN on a not - for - profit basis , the doubt turns to admiration . In addition to explaining why they are making a sacrifice , leaders should be transparent about what that sacrifice amounts to . If a leader publicly donates 10 % of her salary to a nonprofit , she should explain what the nonprofit is and what exactly is happening to the NN . For example , Jack Dorsey is donating $ 1 CD of his Square equity ( 28 % of his wealth ) to fund NNP - CD relief . Not only is he giving away the NN ; he RB shared a NNP Doc showing how the funds MD be spent . Voluntary transparency becomes key in this situation . Disney ’s CEO Bob Chapek is forgoing 50 % of his salary and other benefits as a result of NNP - CD . But this decision came after pressure from the union for some information from leadership over concerns about the closing of Disney parks . RB when we are not in a NN , 84 % of employees VBP organizations are not doing enough to create transparency . But this comes at a cost to the organization . CD NN showed that organizations that were more transparent had higher productivity , innovation , and retention than those that were more opaque . In contrast , increasing transparency can in fact build trust . Crises create the opportunity for leaders to provide direction , meaning , and support when followers need it the most . Learning that Columbia Sportswear CEO Tim Boyle reduced his salary to $ 10,000 while continuing to pay its employees or that Yum Brands CEO , David Gibbs , gave up his salary and gave $ 1,000 bonuses to the managers of his restaurants does more than lift the spirits of their employees . These various strains of research indicate that this type of sacrifice can improve morale and trust for the rest of us , and ease the NN the rest of us are feeling in this NN .

text: San Francisco ( CNN ) Drugmakers are racing to develop a NN for the NNP - CD NN -- a complex feat in itself -- but what might be RB trickier is getting it to the NN . The quest to combat a deadly NN is exposing bottlenecks in the pharmaceutical supply chain . The NN has neither enough glass vials to VB the NN nor the facility capacity to fill and package them , experts VBP . " The demand is VBG to far outstrip the supply , " Vijay Kumar , an Evercore analyst who focuses on the JJ device and NN sciences sectors , told CNN Business in an interview . The NNP - CD NN has consistently shown what happens when supply chains are blindsided by spikes and drop - offs in demand and how an unexpected bottleneck can affect the integrity of the entire NN . He VBD that Strategic National Stockpile has only 2 % of the 650 CD to 850 CD needles and syringes needed and that officials are n't addressing the JJ shortage of glass vials . " It MD take up to CD NNS to produce enough vials for US NN needs , while some therapeutics will RB require vials , " Bright VBD , according to the complaint . Using the entire current inventory of vials for a NN - CD NN is n't reasonable because it MD create supply woes for ongoing needs such as the annual NN and kids ' vaccinations , Evercore 's Kumar VBD . The pharmaceutical industry started NNP - CD in a tight spot from a packaging perspective , as a JJ glass shortage was just starting to RB out , he VBD . JJ glass is n't made from your typical beach sand , and the vials are n't your everyday soda - lime glass VBN in JJ household items . " Desert sand is too smooth to VB for glass ; most [ quartz ] sand comes from rivers , and mining it can have ecological and infrastructure consequences . ApiJect 's NN is expected to produce about 500 of the pre-filled syringes every minute . The syringes are made via a NN processin which sterile plastic containers are created , filled and sealed in a matter of seconds . ApiJect 's NN is expected to produce about 500 of the pre-filled syringes every minute . The product serves as an alternative to traditional glass vials for NN distribution . The NN will RB VB toward the retrofitting of existing NN facilities with a goal of producing more than 500 CD of the pre-filled syringes in 2021 . text: 8 June 2020 – To fight the NN and to support the recovery , NNP grants €314 CD to innovative NNS The NNP Commission has announced that it has awarded 36 NNS with nearly € 166 CD , via the NNP Innovation Council Accelerator Pilot , will work on pioneering projects : bio-decontamination wipes , developing low - cost mass casualty ventilation monitoring systems , and an antibody platform to treat severe NNS of infection . Over € 148 CD will be granted to another 36 NNS set to contribute to the recovery plan for Europe , for example by the NN of stronger and taller wind turbine towers made from wood modules . 28 NNP 2020 - NN JJ Response : “ JJ Goal : Unite For Our Future ” kick - off with support from NNP Citizen The NNP NNP Response was kick - started on 4 NNP and has so far raised € 9,8 CD for universal access to affordable NN NN , treatments and testing . On the launch of the next phase , NNP von der Leyen VBD : “ The NN needs to unit and defeat the NN once and for all . The good NN is that this is already happening . We are launch a JJ NN “ JJ Goal : Unite For Our Future ” and this idea comes from NNP Citizen . During the next month , NNS will VB their voices heard and contribute to our common fight against the NN . On 27 June , I will host a final pledging summit where businesses , foundations and citizens can join forces with JJ donors . ” 27 NNP 2020 - Europe ’s moment : major € 2,4 trillion Recovery Plan for Europe unveiled to repair and prepare for the next generation To kick - start the JJ recovery , protect lives , livelihoods and jobs , the NNP Commission is proposing a major € 2,4 trillion recovery plan which is VBN on using the full potential of a powerful , modern and revamped NNP budget to deliver a more sustainable , digital , inclusive and fair Europe . Commission NNP Ursula von der Leyen VBD : “ Europe ’s next generation will reap the benefits of tomorrow . These investments will not only preserve the outstanding achievements of the last 70 NNS , but will RB ensure that our Union is NN natural , digital , JJ and a strong JJ player in the future . This is about all of us . It is RB bigger than any of us . This is Europe 's moment . ” 12 NNP 2020 - € 117 CD granted for NN treatments and diagnostics The Commission selected 8 JJ - scale research projects aimed at developing treatments and diagnostics for the NN , in a fast - track call for proposals launched in March by the Innovative Medicines Initiative ( IMI ) , a JJ - private partnership . The Commission increased the Horizon 2020 initially - allocated funding of € 45 m to € 72 CD , while € 45 CD will be provided by the pharmaceutical industry , Innovative Medicines Initiative associated partners and other organisations , bringing the total investment to € 117 CD . The selected projects are part of the common JJ response to the NN outbreak that the Commission is coordinating since the beginning of the NN . By allocating funding from Horizon 2020 and partnering with the pharmaceutical industry , the Commission is able to fund a larger number of high - quality proposals and speed up the NN of NN diagnostics and treatments , essential tools necessary to tackle the JJ emergency . 11 NNP 2020 – JJ solidarity in action – rescEU masks delivered to NNP Macedonia and Montenegro Following previous deliveries to Italy , Spain and Croatia , additional batches of masks are being delivered to NNP Macedonia and Montenegro via rescEU – the common JJ reserve of JJ equipment to VB NNS affected by the NN outbreak . A JJ batch of 1,5 CD JJ masks was delivered to 17 Member NNPS and the UK to protect healthcare workers against NN on 8 NNP . Additional weekly instalments of 1,5 CD masks will RB be delivered over the coming six weeks via the Emergency Support Instrument . Romania and Germany , host the rescEU reserve and are therefore responsible for procuring the equipment , while the Commission finances 100 % of purchase of the masks and other equipment . More information here . 29 April 2020 – Tackling the NN NN : NNP Commission steps up its support to the Western Balkans The NNP Commission has announced over € 3.3 CD of NNP JJ support for the Western Balkans – addressing the immediate NN and JJ needs of the NN NN , and the JJ recovery . In addition to its contribution ahead of the NNP - Western Balkans ’ leaders meeting of 6 NNP 2020 , the Commission has broadly outlined longer - term support – an JJ and Investment Plan – to be presented in the autumn . NNP von der Leyen VBD : “ We have a special responsibility to assist in this NN our partners in the Western Balkans , as their future clearly lies in NNP Union . The NNP is mobilising a substantial JJ package , confirming the strong solidarity . Together we will overcome this NN and recover ” . 24 April 2020 – NNP Commission to VB a common recovery plan with a revamped NNP JJ - term budget at its heart JJ leaders tasked the NNP Commission with shaping a collective response to the NN following a videoconference on 23 April . A thorough JJ assessment will soon be under NN and the JJ budget , clearly linked to the Recovery Fund , is a NN - tested and a trusted instrument that can deliver the magnitude of tasks behind the recovery . The bulk of the investments will VB to creating investments and JJ cohesion , improving the Union ’s resilience and autonomy , all while furthering modern policies IN the NNP NNP Deal and the digital transition . Solid partnerships in the NNP ’s immediate neighbourhood must RB be strengthened . “ The next NNP JJ - term budget , our next seven - NN budget , has to adapt to the JJ circumstances , post - corona NN . We need to increase its firepower to be able to generate the necessary investment across the whole NNP Union , ” VBD NNP von der Leyen . This whole endeavour is about protecting the Single NN , investments should be front - loaded in the JJ NNS and it will be necessary to find the JJ balance between grants and loans . To swiftly support agricultural sector and food markets following the outbreak of the NN , the NNP Commission has proposed exceptional measures . The Commission proposes to grant private storage aid for dairy and meat NNS , flexibility in the implementation of NN support programmes to refocus funding priorities , and exceptional derogation from NNP competition rules to stabilise the markets in different sectors . For example , the milk sector will be allowed to collectively plan milk production and the flower and potatoes sector will be allowed to withdraw NNS from the NN . Such agreements and decisions MD only be valid for a period of maximum six months . Consumer price movements will be monitored closely to avoid adverse effects . The Commission aims to have these measures adopted by the end of April . 16 April – 2020 – NNP von der Leyen : “ The JJ budget will be the mothership of Europe ’s recovery ” Despite Europe ’s collective response being well above € 3 trillion – the most impressive response in the NN - more is needed , NNP von der Leyen VBD at the NNP Parliament . The NNP budget will be the mothership of Europe ’s recovery , driving the NN towards a more JJ and digital Europe . Investments in JJ - scale renovation , renewables , clean transport , sustainable food and nature restoration will be more important than before . Using every single euro available has meant investing in the procurement of JJ equipment , the NN of NNS , securing jobs and supporting business to jumpstart the NN . NNP von der Leyen concluded with a passionate plea for the NNP Union : “ If we all stand up for Europe today – with courage , trust and solidarity – I VBP that tomorrow Europe ’s soul will shine brighter than ever before . ” 14 April 2020 – € 2,7 CD from the NNP budget to support the healthcare sector To directly support healthcare systems in NNP NNS , the NNP Commission proposed to activate the NNP ’s Emergency Support Instrument – a measure that that Council quickly approved on 14 April . The € 2.7 CD Instrument will support the distribution of protective gear , the movement of patients to hospitals with free capacity , and to the NN of medication and testing methods . The instrument will be VBN together with other NNP tools , for example the rescEU JJ stockpile , which is receiving €300 CD in addition to the initially proposed allocation of € 80 CD , to support the distribution of JJ equipment across the NNP . It will RB be possible for individuals , foundations and Member NNPS to VB donations and crowd fund . The Commission proposed to postpone regulations on JJ devices by CD NN to allow manufacturers to focus on the production of critical JJ devices and avoiding shortages or delays potentially caused by regulatory bodies , thereby and saving lives . The Commission RB decided to temporarily lift customs duties and VAT on the import of JJ devices and protective equipment from third NNS . By making the import of masks , gloves , overalls and other protective equipment in some NNS by up to CD third cheaper , the decision will further increase the availability of these critical goods and VB those in need . Commission NNP Ursula von der Leyen , VBD : “ We are working on all fronts to remove the obstacles standing in our NN to ensure that our NN professionals VBP what they need to save lives . ” 02 April - NN response : Commission mobilises every euro to protect lives and livelihoods To quickly support workers and mitigate the unemployment risks that come with the NNP outbreak , the Commission launched a JJ initiative called SURE - Support mitigating Unemployment Risks in Emergency . To VB preserve jobs and support families , SURE will provide JJ assistance of up to € 100 CD to Member NNPS , in the form of loans granted on favourable terms . It RB proposed to redirect all available structural funds to the response to the NN . Farmers and fishermen will RB receive support , as will the most deprived of aid . An NNP Solidarity for NNP Initiative worth € 3 CD will cater for the needs of Member NNPS ’ NN systems . The profound impact of the NNP NN requires a response unprecedented in scale , speed and solidarity . With today ’s package , the Commission delivers just that .

text: This article was updated on June 4 , 2020 Coronaviruses typically affect the respiratory tracts of birds and mammals , including NNS . Since then , the NN has spread to nearly every NN , leading the NNP NNP Organization ( WHO ) to declare a NN . The JJ NN has been responsible for millions of infections globally , causing hundreds of thousands of deaths . The NNP NNPS has seen the highest number of these deaths . The JJ NNS with NNP - CD had links to an NN and seafood NN . This suggests that NNS initially transmitted the NN to NNS . Then , NNS with no connections to the NN developed the NN , confirming that NNS can pass the NN to each other . Most NNS who VBP NN - CD will have a mild form of the NN . According to the WHO , RB 80 % of NNS who VBP NN - CD will recover without needing hospitalization . The remaining 20 % become seriously ill and develop difficulty breathing . Some groups are more at NN of severe NN , including older adults and NNS with underlying JJ concerns , including high NN pressure , heart and lung problems , diabetes , and cancer . Pregnant NNS appear to have the same NN of NN - CD as other adults . However , during pregnancy , NNS have a higher NN of severe illness from viruses that are similar to NN - NN - 2 and influenza . text: NN , or rubeola , is a viral infection that starts in the respiratory NN . It still remains a significant NN of death worldwide , despite the availability of a safe , effective NN . There were about 110,000 JJ deaths related to NNS in CD , most of them in NNS under the age of 5 , according to the . NN NNS have RB been increasing in the NNP NNPS in recent NNS . There are now 20 VBN mutations . ” Savage added , “ I have never taken a NN shot , and I will refuse to take a JJ NN . If the Govt makes it ‘ mandatory ’ what will you do ? ” The talk radio host expounded on his reasoning in Monday ’s edition of The Savage Nation podcast . “ I tweeted something that got me mad , because they ’re all talking about a NN NN , and I VBP , having studied these things , having studied the NN NNS which are about thirty to forty , maybe forty percent effective … if you look at NN NNS , not only are they ineffective – thirty - seven percent to fifty percent is what we ’re seeing in reports – there are huge side effects to NN NNS , ” Savage VBD . “ So now they ’re telling us they ’re gonna rush a NN NN when we VBP there have been twenty to thirty mutations of this NN already , and I ’m very , very concerned that they ’re rushing out a NN that will be dangerous , ineffective , FW cetera , so I VBD this , ” Savage VBD before reading the tweet aloud . text: There are 4 groups of NNS who are advised to VB vaccinated against pneumococcal infections : • anyone from the ages of 2 to 64 with a NN condition that increases their NN of pneumococcal infection • anyone at occupational NN , such as welders Babies are routinely vaccinated with a type of pneumococcal NN VBN as the pneumococcal conjugate NN ( PCV ) as part of their childhood NN programme . Babies born on or after 1 January 2020 have 2 injections , which are RB given at : Babies born before this date will continue to be offered 3 doses , at 8 and 16 weeks and a booster at 1 NN . Adults aged 65 or over and the pneumococcal NN If you 're 65 or over , you should be offered a type of pneumococcal NN VBN as the pneumococcal polysaccharide NN ( PPV ) . This NN - off NN is very effective at protecting you against serious forms of pneumococcal infection . NNS with NN problems and the pneumococcal NN The PPV NN is available on the NHS for NNS and adults aged from 2 to 64 NNS JJ who are at a higher NN of developing a pneumococcal infection than the general population . This is generally the same NNS who are eligible for annual NN NN . You 're considered to be at a higher NN of a pneumococcal infection if you have : • had your spleen removed , your spleen does not work properly , or you 're at NN of your spleen not working properly in future ( for example , if you have coeliac NN ) • a suppressed immune NN caused by a NN condition , such as HIV • a suppressed immune NN caused by medicines , such as chemotherapy or steroid tablets • a cochlear implant ( a hearing device ) – Action on Hearing Loss has more information about cochlear implants • had a leak of cerebrospinal fluid ( the clear fluid that surrounds the brain and spine ) – this MD be the result of an accident or surgery Adults and NNS who are severely immunocompromised ( including anyone with leukaemia , multiple myeloma , genetic disorders affecting the immune NN , or after a bone marrow transplant ) RB have a single dose of PCV followed by PPV . Welders and metal workers and the pneumococcal NN Some NNS with an occupational NN are advised to have the pneumococcal NN , including those who work with metal fumes , such as welders . If you 're at increased NN of a pneumococcal infection , you 'll be given a single dose of the PPV NN . But if your spleen does not work properly or you have a chronic kidney condition , you MD need booster doses of PPV every 5 NNS . This is because your levels of antibodies against the infection decrease over NN . Your GP surgery will advise you on whether you 'll need a booster dose . The NN plans to select other sites as well . For its part , BioNTech intends to add capacity at CD of its facilities in Germany . text: The toddler months continue to bring the JJ challenges of colds , scrapes and bruises , and other minor emergencies . You 'll RB find yourself dealing with an emerging personality and increasing conflicts . Your NN will VB your child four times for routine well visits during this period , at 12 , 15 , 18 , and 24 months . If your toddler has missed any immunizations , or if a problem has been detected that needs special attention , additional visits MD be scheduled . What to Expect During the Office Visit The well - child checkups during your child 's second NN are similar to those before , but discussions with your NN about behavior and habits MD become more detailed as your toddler gets older . • Measurement of your child 's length , weight , and head circumference . Growth will be plotted on the growth chart , and you 'll be advised of your toddler 's progress . • A review of your toddler 's NN through both observation and your progress report . Is your tot starting to walk ? Scribbling ? Following simple instructions ? Saying a few words ? Combining CD words by age 2 ? The NN MD ask you these questions and others IN them . • The NN MD VB over safety questions such as : Have you childproofed your home ? ( You 'll need to review your babyproofing efforts now that your toddler can stand and reach . ) Is your tot in an appropriate safety seat while riding in the car ? • A discussion of your child 's eating habits . Is he or she eating a variety of foods ? Finger feeding or using a spoon ? Using a cup ? Being weaned from the breast or bottle ? Most doctors advise a switch from bottle to cup between 12 and 18 months . • Advice on what to expect in the coming months . If they have n't already , kids this age might undergo a tuberculin NN test , especially those at NN for tuberculosis . You 'll be given instructions on how to monitor the test and report results to the NN 's office . Your NN MD recommend a NN test to check for anemia and lead poisoning . Address any questions or concerns you have , and write down any specific instructions the NN gives you regarding special care . Keep updating your child 's permanent JJ record , listing information on growth and any problems or illnesses . A child who did not have them at the 12 - month visit will VB these NNS at 15 months : • the third or fourth Hib NN , depending on the manufacturer At the 18 - month visit , if not already been given , NNS should VB : • third hepatitis B NN ( HBV ) , which can be given starting at 6 months • third inactivated poliovirus NN ( IPV ) , which can be given starting at 6 months Your child MD RB VB a NN shot , which is recommended every NN before NN NN for NNS older than 6 months . If your child is at high NN for developing meningococcal NN , a serious infection that can lead to bacterial meningitis , your NN MD offer the meningococcal NN as well . Discuss possible NN reactions with your NN and VB advice on when to call with problems . At the 18 - month visit , toddlers undergo a screening test to VB identify developmental delays and NN . There is a wide range of normal when it comes to reaching developmental milestones . But by 18 months , most toddlers : • walk on their own By age 2 , toddlers should be able to : • put CD words together to form a sentence Talk to your NN if you have concerns about your child 's NN . When Should I Call the NN ? By now you have probably called your NN 's office JJ times with questions and concerns about your child 's NN . Do n't hesitate to notify the NN if you VBP that something is wrong — you VBP your child best . And always call the NN if your child has a fever , is acting sick , has serious problems sleeping , is refusing all food or drink , is vomiting , or has diarrhea .

text: A NNP NN test patient VBD he fainted and felt sicker than ever after getting the Moderna injection , reports VBP . Adenoviruses are among the most common causes of viral respiratory infections , accounting for between CD and five NN cent of colds . " The trick in making a NN is can you scale the NN that you ’ve made to be able to VB a certain number of doses , can you test that NN quickly and efficiently and then can you VB it into patients , " Price told local outlet KHOU 11 . text: VB breaking NN alerts and special reports . The NN and stories that matter , delivered weekday mornings . It ’s getting ugly out there on JJ NN . Anti-vaccine activists are attacking pediatricians head to head on NNP , NNP and other JJ NN platforms , and they ’re not hesitating to VB their attacks personal . A few fed - up doctors are fighting back , both RB and , more recently , in the courts . CD pediatrician , Dr. Eve Switzer of Enid , Oklahoma , filed a defamation suit last NN against JJ Oklahoma ophthalmologist Jim Meehan and Oklahomans for NNP and NNP Choice , saying they publicly and falsely accused her of failing to provide informed consent to NNS about vaccinations . “ Anti-vaxxers have gotten out of NN , ” Switzer told NBC NNP . “ As a pediatrician , the NN that it has affected me personally , my practice and my staff , RB , I RB felt IN I needed to have some sort of remedy and my only remedy was a legal remedy . ” It 's difficult enough to counter the continual questions raised by NN skeptics and activists who , increasingly , VBP all NNS are unsafe for all NNS . Worries about NN , a preservative called thimerosal , the spacing of NNS , NN ingredients and whether kids VBP too JJ NNS have all been repeatedly and thoroughly addressed , but that does n’t stop NNS of JJ NN from bringing them up again and again . “ VBG up against the anti-vaccine movement is a thankless task for a number of reasons . For CD , the goalpost is moving , ” VBD Dr. Peter Hotez , director of the Texas NNP 's Hospital Center for NNP NNP and dean of the school of tropical medicine at Baylor College of Medicine . “ So if you can explain why MMR ( NNS , mumps and rubella ) NN does n’t VB NN , they ’ll turn RB and VB well it must be thimerosal in NNS . If you debunk this , then they ’ll VB ‘ well we are spacing NNS too close together ’ and if you debunk that and then it ’s aluminum in NNS , ” he added . Using JJ NN takes it to a JJ level . Just as JJ NNS allow NNS to stay in their own political echo chambers , viewing and sharing only their own beliefs , NN of JJ NN is allowing NN skeptics to harden their messages . NNP feeds offer continual validation with NN after NN of NNS who VBP they VBP NNS gave their NNS eczema or asthma or RB killed their babies — claims made with no JJ backing . And on NNP , any post about the benefits of NNS — all supported by decades of NN — is often immediately attacked . Most recently , a Detroit - area mother jailed for a week for refusing to follow a NN order that involved vaccinating her kids got an instant support group . Although the judge in the NN , Circuit NNP Judge Karen McDonald , made it clear the sentence was about disregarding a NN order that Bredow had initially agreed to , Bredow herself and anti-vaccine groups framed it as having taken a stand for her beliefs . In reality , there is no legitimate debate about the safety or benefits of NNS . While no JJ group claims NNS are 100 percent safe , the Centers for NNP NNP and Prevention , National Institutes of NNP , and dozens of academic NNS independent of the federal NN have shown the benefits of NNS both to individual NNS and adults and to the population at JJ . “ Childhood NN saves up to 3 CD lives every NN , but 1.5 CD NNS still die each NN from NNS that MD have been prevented by NNS , ” the nonprofit Sabin NNP Institute VBZ . But you might not VB that if you take a look at JJ NN . “ It ’s more systematic and more aggressive and more effective , ” VBD Hotez , who is RB a pediatrician , the parent of a JJ woman with NN , and a vocal advocate for NN . “ There ’s a JJ element to the anti-vaccine group that has sort of an alt - JJ flavor to it . ” Theodore Tomeny of the psychology department of the NNP of Alabama and colleagues tracked NNP activity and VBD more than 270,000 tweets containing anti-vaccine statements between 2009 and CD — half of all the tweets they VBD about NNS in general . California , Connecticut , Massachusetts , NNP York and Pennsylvania were particularly rich in anti-vaccine NNP NNS . “ We VBD that anti-vaccine sentiment seems to be prevalent on NNP , ” Tomeny VBD . “ It RB seems to cluster geographically . We observed spikes over NN that seemed to be associated with current events IN CD of the recent NNS outbreaks in California . ” They not only repeat untrue rumors about NNS , but accuse NN and academic doctors of colluding with pharmaceutical NNS to cover up the dangers of NNS , without real evidence to back up these accusations . Pediatricians , JJ NN experts and others MD do well to monitor this type of JJ NN NN and counter its influence , Tomeny and colleagues wrote in the October issue of the journal NNP NNP & Medicine . text: ( CNN ) Abie Rohrig had just turned 18 when he told his mom he MD be donating a kidney to save a stranger 's NN . Her answer : No you 're not . He did it anyway -- the organ went to a NN about his age -- and his mom was so inspired she went and donated a kidney herself . So Rohrig expected her to understand when he told her that , for the benefit of humanity , he MD volunteer to become infected with NNP - CD It turns out " she 's more worried than she was about the kidney thing , " VBD Rohrig , now a 20 - NN - JJ college student who lives with his NNS in a NNP York City apartment . " She was RP , ' What ? What ? I do n't VB , ' " he VBD . " She 's skeptical . " Rohrig is CD of more than 16,000 NNS -- most of them JJ adults -- who have signaled their support for a controversial method of speeding up the NN of a NN by intentionally infecting dozens of volunteers . The signees of the JJ registry -- a JJ NN called 1 Day Sooner -- have all checked a box next to the statement : " I am interested in being exposed to the NN to speed up NN NN . " The practice is called a JJ - challenge NN -- or controlled JJ infection NN -- and it can truncate a conventional NN NN by several months . The reason : Rather than waiting for months to assess what percentage thousands of NN - NN volunteers VBP infected with the NN in question while leading their day - to - day lives , a challenge NN is much simpler , in that it exposes about 100 volunteers directly to the pathogen -- via syringe , cocktail , mosquito bite or nasal spray after an experimental NN or placebo is administered . ( If the NNP - CD NN comes to fruition , experts VBP it MD likely be administered by nose drop . ) But if it 's high reward , it 's RB high NN : Although NNP - CD is a much more deadly NN for the elderly and the compromised than healthy JJ adults , it is an unpredictable pathogen that has put star athletes in the hospital . What 's more , should something VB wrong , NN options are limited . However , with the NN still raging after having killed more than 82,000 Americans and 291,000 NNS worldwide since it RB appeared in China late last NN , some VBP a riskier - than - normal NN is justified . Co-authored by Nir Eyal of Rutgers , Marc Lipsitch of Harvard , and Peter Smith of the London School of Hygiene & Tropical Medicine , the piece concluded that while a JJ challenge NN MD not be without risks , " every week that NN rollout is delayed will be accompanied by JJ thousands of deaths globally . " " It 's an idea that is controversial when NNS hear about it for the JJ NN , " Eyal , a bioethicist , told CNN . " However , we show that if you select NNS in the JJ NN and conduct the NN in the JJ NN , it 's surprisingly low NN and certainly within the bounds of what we already approve . " Such a NN MD ultimately need the blessing of the US Food and NNP Administration . But the NNS ' call for a challenge NN has since been propelled by the popular support of those who have indicated on 1 Day Sooner -- which is incorporating as a nonprofit organization -- that they'd be willing guinea pigs . ( This is just an informal expression of interest , not a binding contract . ) The NN , which was inspired by the scholarly article , launched in mid-April and is premised on the claim that shaving RB CD day from the JJ - distance race for a NNP - CD NN MD save up to 7,120 lives . What a JJ challenge NN for NN MD look IN At some point , should a group of NNS decide to seriously explore the matter , the NN MD ask prospective volunteers to fill out pre-qualification questionnaires that MD divulge more of their JJ history , region of residence and other information that MD VB determine eligibility , VBD 1 Day Sooner 's co-founder Josh Morrison . The NNS MD then screen those forms for the most eligible applicants and MD eventually seek approval from a research or JJ center to host the NN , he VBD . Morrison is a JJ corporate lawyer who gave up NN in the fast lane to start a nonprofit organization called Waitlist Zero , which matches prospective kidney donors with recipients . Because business is at a near - standstill in the kidney - transplant NN , Morrison VBD himself with a lot of spare NN . " I was IN sitting at home in my apartment in NNP York City , just kind of depressed , " he VBD . Morrison came across the Journal article while noodling RB on the internet . " And I thought , ' Well , MD I VB to do this ? ' " he VBD . " I 'm pretty JJ , 34 , and in good NN . And so I thought , ' Yeah , I VBP I MD . ' " An FDA spokesperson told CNN that the agency MD work with those who are interested in conducting JJ challenge NNS to VB them evaluate ethical and other issues . " A formal determination about any specific JJ challenge NN proposal MD be made by the FDA in the context of all the information that is available at that NN , " Michael Felberbaum wrote in an email . Conventional NN NNS typically consist of three phases -- the JJ , in which fewer than 100 participants are dosed to determine the safety ; the second , in which the number of participants ramps up into the hundreds ; and the third , in which the NN is broadened to include thousands of NNS . Typically , in that third phase , the participants return to their daily lives , and NNS -- over a period of months -- compare rates of infection between the placebo and test groups . A JJ - challenge NN can replace a third phase , the Journal article VBZ , short - circuiting the timeline by several months because NNS do n't have to wait for participants to VB infected the organic NN -- by interacting with NNS at work , at school , in houses of worship or in homes . Instead , they expose the volunteers to the pathogen RB then and there , in the lab . A challenge NN can RB serve as a bridge to a Phase 3 NN , helping NNS determine which NN candidates are most promising ; or it can pave the NN for provisional licensure in emergency situations . For a NNP - CD NN of the sort that 1 Day Sooner is advocating , the setup MD likely entail RB injecting an experimental NN into the arms of about 50 volunteers and a placebo into 50 others , challenge - NN experts told CNN . CD to four weeks later , all 100 MD be exposed to the NN -- perhaps via nose - drop . JJ - challenge studies are n't JJ . They have played a key role in the NN of several NNS , including ones for malaria , NN and dengue . Without JJ - challenge studies , a JJ NN for typhoid MD n't have been brought to Zimbabwe on a provisional basis last NN , JJ - challenge experts told CNN . The " FDA approved a cholera NN simply on the basis of a JJ challenge , " VBD Dr. Robert Read , an infectious - NN expert in the UK . The difference is that those NNS came with fewer unknowns than NNP - CD , and clinicians running the NNS were able to offer JJ treatments -- such as antibiotics or antivirals -- to infected patients exhibiting NNS . And although the idea of conducting a JJ - challenge NN for NNP - CD is catching on in the NN community , some experts have raised serious concerns about safety . Read , head of JJ and experimental sciences at NNP of Southampton , points out that NNP - CD remains a mysterious pathogen , and NNS can't give volunteers an accurate sense of the NN associated with getting intentionally infected . " You do have to be able to describe what you VBP of what MD happen to them if they undertake a controlled infection , with complete clarity and honesty , " VBD Read , who has himself conducted challenge NNS -- he recently infected dozens of volunteers with whooping cough in search of a more effective NN . " And I VBP lots of volunteers , when faced with the information , MD probably not consent to it . " Dr. Anna Durbin , a professor of international NN at the Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of NNP NNP -- who has led a JJ - challenge NN for dengue and worked on another for malaria -- VBD she MD be interested to hear how some prospective volunteers MD respond to these reports of " cerebral vascular accidents . " " Millennials do n't VB they are VBG to VB sick from this , " VBD Durbin , who , IN Read , is open to the idea of JJ challenge NNS for NNP - CD , but stresses that it is incumbent upon NNS to fully evaluate the risks of such a NN and to share them to the fullest extent possible with prospective participants . " We VBP lots of JJ NNS in the hospital on ventilators . " Volunteers have different reasons for signing up -- some altruistic , some pragmatic Rohrig VBD the frightening spate of JJ NNP - CD patients having strokes was NN to him . " That 's jarring , " he VBD . " I VBP there is a non-trivial NN . " And yet , Rohrig VBD he 's almost certainly up for it . " I VBP that there are risks , and if I were to do this , and it were to VB poorly , then that MD be terrible , my family MD be RB sad , " Rohrig VBD . But " someone has to step up . It seems IN this just needs to happen . " Not all of the prospective volunteers are in their 20s . John Gentle , an entrepreneur in Alabama , turns 41 on Thursday . He has a wife and four kids . IN Rohrig , Gentle believes a challenge NN MD afford him a chance to VB a societal contribution to the NN effort . But as the owner of a business that has him visiting warehouses and flying regularly , he figures he 'll inevitably VB infected -- so he might as well VB it over with . " I feel if I did it under a controlled environment , and I had an adverse reaction , my chances are much better in a controlled environment than I did n't VB I had it for a week until something had deteriorated to the point I realized , " Gentle VBD . Indeed , JJ challenge studies occur in tightly controlled settings . The report in the Journal of Infectious NNPS advises keeping the subjects in isolation for several weeks and guaranteeing them access to the NN - of - the - NN facilities of the NN NN , should the need arise . " As a part of being in the NN they MD be guaranteed excellent care if they needed it , " Lipsitch , a Harvard epidemiologist , told CNN . " Of course , you MD expect nobody in the NN on average MD need it , but averages do n't always play out . " Over the NNS , he VBD , he has infected some 600 students with the NN . They typically ingest the NN via a sodium - bicarbonate drink resembling Alka - Seltzer and VBP home . There , they await the NNS of typhoid -- for the NN participants they include headache , fever and constipation -- which generally kick in within four or five days . At this point , he VBD , the volunteers with NNS are given a regimen of antibiotics , which clear up the NNS in a couple of days . " We have extensive follow - up NN and have not had any JJ - term problems identified , " Darton VBD in an email . " The NN is safe and reproducible and is a NN of mild symptomatic illness only . " Today 's standards for JJ - challenge NNS are rigorous . Durbin of Johns Hopkins points out that it takes a minimum of six months of prep work to responsibly carry out a JJ - challenge NN . This is in part because a suitable strain of the NN -- and the proper dosage -- must be developed in a lab outfitted with high biosafety standards . RB , NNS must find JJ centers that are willing to VB the participants in isolation for the duration of the NN and provide JJ - rate care to anyone who falls seriously ill . " I VBP it 's very important that you plan for these studies now ... and you VBP it JJ , " Durbin VBD . " Yes , it MD take NN for a good JJ challenge NN to be developed , but if we wait too RB to develop it , then I VBP the moment has passed . " Caring for volunteers can VB tricky CD of the trickier aspects of a challenge NN is compensation . Pay too little , and the NN MD fail to attract candidates ; pay too much , and NNS MD be enticed by the NN without thinking of their safety . The latter scenario played out with the yellow - fever NNS , in which a participant who was hoping to start a farm in Cuba VBD it was a " cold - blooded business decision . " The NNP 7 article in NNP -- which concludes that the extraordinary nature of the NNP - CD NN warrants laying the groundwork for controlled JJ - infection NNS -- recommends " several thousand dollars . " Seema Shah , a bioethicist and associate professor at Northwestern NNP 's Feinberg School of Medicine -- and an author of the NNP article -- VBD participants of a recent 40 - day JJ - challenge NN for malaria were paid about $ 2,300 . " Some were very motivated by the NN , but others were RB interested in the experience , and still others have strong motivations to VB others , " she VBD , adding that some participants personally knew sufferers of malaria and some RB donated some of their earnings to charities . The article in the Journal of Infectious NNPS likens the act of volunteering for a JJ - challenge NN to other JJ - service endeavors -- such as volunteer firefighting or organ donation . " NNS are willing to take on NN - threatening NN for other NNS 's benefit and often not just as a job but as a form of altruistic behavior , " Lipsitch VBD . " We not only encourage that , but we completely depend on that in JJ sectors of our lives . " Still , the onus is on the NNS to ensure that the participants stay safe . " What keeps me up at night , " VBD Durbin , " is if I administer a challenge agent to somebody , and that NN gets seriously ill or dies -- that 's on me . "
